## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-115">Ogiltig förklara alla dynamiska poster i ARP-cachen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-115">Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-116">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-116">Prototype</span></span>     

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-117">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-117">Description</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-118">I den här tjänsten inaktive ras alla dynamiska ARP-poster i ARP-cachen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-118">This service invalidates all dynamic ARP entries currently in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-119">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-120">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-121">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-122">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförde ARP-cachen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-122">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP cache invalidate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ARP har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) anroparen är inte en tråd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-126">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-126">Allowed From</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-127">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-127">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-128">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-128">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-129">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-129">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-130">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-130">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the dynamic ARP entries were
   successfully invalidated. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-148">Ange dynamisk ARP-post</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-148">Set dynamic ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-149">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-149">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);  
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-150">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-150">Description</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-151">Den här tjänsten allokerar en dynamisk post från ARP-cachen och ställer in den angivna IP-adressen till fysisk adress mappning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-151">This service allocates a dynamic entry from the ARP cache and sets up the specified IP to physical address mapping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-152">Om en fysisk adress på noll anges skickas en faktisk ARP-begäran till nätverket för att den fysiska adressen ska kunna matchas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-152">If a zero physical address is specified, an actual ARP request is sent to the network in order to have the physical address resolved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-153">Observera också att den här posten tas bort om ARP-åldrande är aktiv eller om ARP-cachen är slut och det här är den minst nyligen använda ARP-posten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-153">Also note that this entry will be removed if ARP aging is active or if the ARP cache is exhausted and this is the least recently used ARP entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-154">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-154">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-155">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-155">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-156">**ip_address** IP-adress att mappa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-156">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-157">**physical_msw** De 16 främsta bitarna (47-32) av den fysiska adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-157">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-158">**physical_lsw** Lägre 32 bitar (31-0) av den fysiska adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-158">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-159">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-159">Return Values</span></span>    

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-160">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) en dynamisk ARP-post uppsättning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-160">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP dynamic entry set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0X17) inga fler ARP-poster är tillgängliga i ARP-cachen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-instans pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-166">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-166">Allowed From</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-167">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-167">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-168">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-168">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-169">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-169">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-170">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-170">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a dynamic ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                  0x1022, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a dynamic mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   10:22:00:00:12:34. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-184">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-184">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-187">nx_arp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-187">nx_arp_enable</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-188">Aktivera adress matchnings protokoll (ARP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-188">Enable Address Resolution Protocol (ARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-189">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-189">Prototype</span></span>    

```c
UINT nx_arp_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    VOID *arp_cache_memory,
    ULONG arp_cache_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-190">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-190">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-191">Den här tjänsten initierar ARP-komponenten i NetX Duo för den speciella IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-191">This service initializes the ARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-192">ARP-initieringen innefattar konfiguration av ARP-cachen och olika ARP-bearbetnings rutiner som krävs för att skicka och ta emot ARP-meddelanden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-192">ARP initialization includes setting up the ARP cache and various ARP processing routines necessary for sending and receiving ARP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-193">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-193">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-194">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-194">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-195">**arp_cache_memory** Pekare till minnes området för att placera ARP-cache.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-195">**arp_cache_memory** Pointer to memory area to place ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-196">**arp_cache_size** Varje ARP-post är 52 byte, det totala antalet ARP-poster är därför att storleken dividerat med 52.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-196">**arp_cache_size** Each ARP entry is 52 bytes, the total number of ARP entries is, therefore, the size divided by 52.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-197">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-197">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-198">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförde ARP-aktivering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-198">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP eller minnes pekare för cache.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) den TILLHANDAHÅLLna ARP-cache-minnet är för litet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) User supplied ARP cache memory is too small.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) den här komponenten har redan Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-203">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-203">Allowed From</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-204">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-204">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-205">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-205">Preemption Possible</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-206">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-206">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-207">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-207">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ARP and supply 1024 bytes of ARP cache memory for
   previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_enable(&ip_0, (void *) pointer, 1024);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP was successfully enabled for this IP
instance.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-225">Ta bort en ARP-post</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-225">Delete an ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-226">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-227">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-228">Den här tjänsten tar bort en ARP-post för den tilldelade IP-adressen från dess IP-interna ARP-tabell.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-228">This service removes an ARP entry for the given IP address from its IP internal ARP table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-229">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-229">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-230">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-230">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-231">**ip_address** ARP-post med den angivna IP-adressen ska tas bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-231">**ip_address** ARP entry with the specified IP address should be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-232">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-232">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-233">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförde ARP-aktivering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-233">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Det går inte att hitta någon post med den angivna IP-adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) No entry with the specified IP address can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP eller minnes pekare för cache.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-237">Den angivna IP-adressen för **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) är ogiltig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Specified IP address is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-238">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-238">Allowed From</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-239">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-239">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-240">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-240">Preemption Possible</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-241">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-242">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete the ARP entry with the IP address 1.2.3.4. */
status = nx_arp_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4));

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP entry with the specified IP address
   is deleted.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_gratuitous_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-260">Skicka en kostnads fria ARP-begäran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-260">Send gratuitous ARP request</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-261">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-261">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_gratuitous_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*response_handler)(NX_IP *ip_ptr, NX_PACKET *packet_ptr));
```                               
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-262">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-263">Den här tjänsten går igenom alla fysiska gränssnitt för att överföra AntiArp-begäranden så länge som gränssnittets IP-adress är giltig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-263">This service goes through all the physical interfaces to transmit gratuitous ARP requests as long as the interface IP address is valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-264">Om ett ARP-svar sedan tas emot, anropas den tillhandahållna svars hanteraren för att bearbeta svaret till den kostnads fria ARP-filen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-264">If an ARP response is subsequently received, the supplied response handler is called to process the response to the gratuitous ARP.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-265">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-266">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-266">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-267">**response_handler** Pekare till funktionen för svars hantering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-267">**response_handler** Pointer to response handling function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-268">Om NX_NULL anges ignoreras svaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-268">If NX_NULL is supplied, responses are ignored.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-269">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad överföring av kostnads fria ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gratuitous ARP send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0X01) inget paket tillgängligt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ARP har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-273">Den aktuella IP-adressen för **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) är ogiltig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Current IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) anroparen är inte en tråd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-276">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-276">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-277">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-277">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-278">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-278">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-279">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-279">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-280">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-280">Example</span></span>

```
/* Send gratuitous ARP without any response handler. */
status = nx_arp_gratuitous_send(&ip_0, NX_NULL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the gratuitous ARP was successfully
   sent. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_hardware_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-298">Hitta en fysisk maskin varu adress med en IP-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-298">Locate physical hardware address given an IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-299">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-299">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_hardware_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-300">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-300">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-301">Den här tjänsten försöker hitta en fysisk maskin varu adress i ARP-cachen som är associerad med den angivna IP-adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-301">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied IP address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-302">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-302">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-303">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-303">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-304">**ip_address** IP-adress att söka efter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-304">**ip_address** IP address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-305">**physical_msw** Pekare till variabeln för att returnera de översta 16 bitarna (47-32) av den fysiska adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-305">**physical_msw** Pointer to the variable for returning the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-306">**physical_lsw** Pekare till variabeln för att returnera de lägre 32 bitarna (31-0) för den fysiska adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-306">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the variable for returning the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-307">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-307">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-308">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad ARP-maskinvara Sök.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-308">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP hardware address find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-309">Det gick inte att hitta **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** -mappningen (0x16) i ARP-cachen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-309">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-eller minnes pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-316">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-316">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-317">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-317">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-318">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-318">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the hardware address associated with the IP address of
   1.2.3.4 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_hardware_address_find(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                      &physical_msw,
                                      &physical_lsw);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables physical_msw and
   physical_lsw contain the hardware address.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-335">nx_arp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-335">nx_arp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-336">Hämta information om ARP-aktiviteter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-336">Retrieve information about ARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-337">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-337">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *arp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *arp_requests_received,
    ULONG *arp_responses_sent,
    ULONG *arp_responses_received,
    ULONG *arp_dynamic_entries,
    ULONG *arp_static_entries,
    ULONG *arp_aged_entries,
    ULONG *arp_invalid_messages);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-338">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-338">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-339">Den här tjänsten hämtar information om ARP-aktiviteter för den associerade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-339">This service retrieves information about ARP activities for the associated IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-340">*Om en mål pekare är NX_NULL returneras inte den informationen till anroparen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-340">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-341">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-341">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-342">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-342">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-343">**arp_requests_sent** Pekare till målet för de totala ARP-begäranden som skickats från den här IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-343">**arp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-344">**arp_requests_received** Pekare till målet för de totala ARP-begäranden som tagits emot från nätverket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-344">**arp_requests_received** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-345">**arp_responses_sent** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet ARP-svar som skickas från den här IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-345">**arp_responses_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP responses sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-346">**arp_responses_received** Pekar till målet för det totala antalet ARP-svar som tagits emot från nätverket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-346">**arp_responses_received** Pointer to the destination for the total ARP responses received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** Pekar mot målet för det aktuella antalet dynamiska ARP-poster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of dynamic ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-348">**arp_static_entries** Pekar mot målet för det aktuella antalet statiska ARP-poster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-348">**arp_static_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of static ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-349">**arp_aged_entries** Pekar till målet för det totala antalet ARP-poster som har föråldrats och blivit ogiltiga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-349">**arp_aged_entries** Pointer to the destination of the total number of ARP entries that have aged and became invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-350">**arp_invalid_messages** Pekar till målet för de totala ogiltiga ARP-meddelanden som tagits emot.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-350">**arp_invalid_messages** Pointer to the destination of the total invalid ARP messages received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-351">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-351">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades Hämta ARP-information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-356">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-357">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-357">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-358">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-358">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-359">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-359">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-360">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-360">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Pickup ARP information for ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_info_get(&ip_0, &arp_requests_sent,
                         &arp_requests_received,
                         &arp_responses_sent,
                         &arp_responses_received,
                         &arp_dynamic_entries,
                         &arp_static_entries,
                         &arp_aged_entries,
                         &arp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the ARP information has been stored in
   the supplied variables. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-378">Hitta IP-adress till en fysisk adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-378">Locate IP address given a physical address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-379">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-379">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw, 
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-380">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-380">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-381">Den här tjänsten försöker hitta en IP-adress i ARP-cachen som är associerad med den angivna fysiska adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-381">This service attempts to find an IP address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-382">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-382">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-383">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-383">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-384">**ip_address** Pekare för att returnera IP-adress, om en sådan finns, som har mappats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-384">**ip_address** Pointer to return IP address, if one is found that has been mapped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-385">**physical_msw** De 16 främsta bitarna (47-32) i den fysiska adressen som du vill söka efter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-385">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-386">**physical_lsw** Lägre 32 bitar (31-0) för den fysiska adressen att söka efter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-386">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-387">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-387">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckade ARP IP-adress Sök</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP IP address find</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-389">Det gick inte att hitta **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** -mappningen (0x16) i ARP-cachen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-389">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-eller minnes pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw och physical_lsw är båda 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-394">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-394">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-395">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-395">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-396">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-396">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-397">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-397">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-398">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-398">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the IP address associated with the hardware address of
   0x0:0x01234 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address, 0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables ip_address contains the
   associated IP address. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entries_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-416">Ta bort alla statiska ARP-poster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-416">Delete all static ARP entries</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-417">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-417">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entries_delete(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-418">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-418">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-419">Den här tjänsten tar bort alla statiska poster i ARP-cachen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-419">This service deletes all static entries in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-420">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-420">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-421">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-421">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-422">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-422">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-423">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) statiska poster tas bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-423">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Static entries are deleted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig ip_ptr pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-427">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-427">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-428">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-428">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-429">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-429">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-430">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-431">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-431">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete all the static ARP entries for IP Instance 0, assuming
   "ip_0" is the NX_IP structure for IP Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entries_delete(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS all static ARP entries in the ARP cache
   have been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-449">Skapa statisk IP-adress för maskin varu mappning i ARP-cache</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-449">Create static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-450">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-450">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-451">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-451">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-452">Den här tjänsten skapar en statisk IP-till-fysisk-adress mappning i ARP-cachen för den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-452">This service creates a static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-453">Statiska ARP-poster omfattas inte av regelbundna ARP-uppdateringar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-453">Static ARP entries are not subject to ARP periodic updates.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-454">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-454">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-455">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-455">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-456">**ip_address** IP-adress att mappa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-456">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-457">**physical_msw** De 16 främsta bitarna (47-32) av den fysiska adressen som ska mappas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-457">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-458">**physical_lsw** Nedre 32 bitar (31-0) av den fysiska adressen som ska mappas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-458">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to map.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-459">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-459">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00)-statisk post har skapats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0X17) inga fler ARP-poster är tillgängliga i ARP-cachen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw och physical_lsw är båda 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-467">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-467">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-468">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-468">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-469">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-469">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-470">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-470">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-471">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-471">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_create(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a static mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   0x00:0x1234. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span> 
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-489">Ta bort statisk IP-adress till maskin varu mappning i ARP-cache</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-489">Delete static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-490">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-490">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-491">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-492">Den här tjänsten hittar och tar bort en tidigare skapad statisk IP-till-fysisk-adress mappning i ARP-cachen för den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-492">This service finds and deletes a previously created static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-493">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-493">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-494">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-494">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-495">**ip_address** IP-adress som har mappats statiskt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-495">**ip_address** IP address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-496">**physical_msw** De 16 16 bitarna (47-\* \* 32) för den fysiska adress som har mappats statiskt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-496">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47 - \*\*32) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-497">**physical_lsw** Lägre 32-bitar (31-\* \* 0) för den fysiska adress som har mappats statiskt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-497">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31 - \*\*0) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-498">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-498">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-499">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckade ARP-post borttagning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-499">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-500">Det gick inte att hitta den statiska ARP-posten **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) i ARP-cachen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-500">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Static ARP entry was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw och physical_lsw är båda 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-506">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-506">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-507">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-507">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-508">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-508">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-509">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-509">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-510">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-510">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created static ARP entry
   was successfully deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-527">nx_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-527">nx_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-528">Aktivera Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-528">Enable Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-529">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-529">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-530">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-530">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-531">Den här tjänsten aktiverar ICMP-komponenten för den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-531">This service enables the ICMP component for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-532">ICMP-komponenten ansvarar för hantering av Internet fel meddelanden och ping-förfrågningar och svar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-532">The ICMP component is responsible for handling Internet error messages and ping requests and replies.</span></span> 

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-533">\*Den här tjänsten aktiverar endast ICMP för IPv4-tjänsten. Om du vill aktivera både ICMPv4 och ICMPv6 använder program tjänsten \*\*nxd_icmp_enable\*\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-533">*This service only enables ICMP for IPv4 service. To enable both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6, applications shall use the **nxd_icmp_enable** service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-534">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-534">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-535">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-535">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-536">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförde ICMP-aktivering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) ICMP har redan Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) ICMP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-541">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-541">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-542">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-542">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-543">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-543">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-544">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-544">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-545">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-545">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ICMP on the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP is enabled. */
```

## <a name="nx_icmp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-554">Hämta information om ICMP-aktiviteter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-554">Retrieve information about ICMP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-555">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-555">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *pings_sent,
    ULONG *ping_timeouts,
    ULONG *ping_threads_suspended,
    ULONG *ping_responses_received,
    ULONG *icmp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *icmp_unhandled_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-556">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-556">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-557">Den här tjänsten hämtar information om ICMP-aktiviteter för den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-557">This service retrieves information about ICMP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-558">*Om en mål pekare är NX_NULL returneras inte den informationen till anroparen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-558">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-559">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-559">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-560">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-560">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-561">**pings_sent** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet pingar som skickats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-561">**pings_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of pings sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-562">**ping_timeouts** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet ping-tidsgräns.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-562">**ping_timeouts** Pointer to destination for the total number of ping timeouts.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-563">**ping_threads_suspended** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet trådar som har inaktiverats för ping-begäranden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-563">**ping_threads_suspended** Pointer to destination of the total number of threads suspended on ping requests.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-564">**ping_responses_received** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet ping-svar som tagits emot.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-564">**ping_responses_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of ping responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-565">**icmp_checksum_errors** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet fel i ICMP-kontrollsumma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-565">**icmp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of ICMP checksum errors.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet ohanterade ICMP-meddelanden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of un-handled ICMP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-567">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-567">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-568">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades Hämta ICMP-information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-568">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-569">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-569">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-572">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-573">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-573">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-574">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-574">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-575">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-575">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-576">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-576">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve ICMP information from previously created IP
   instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_info_get(&ip_0, &pings_sent, &ping_timeouts,
                          &ping_threads_suspended,
                          &ping_responses_received,
                          &icmp_checksum_errors,
                          &icmp_unhandled_messages);
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP information was retrieved. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-577">Se även</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-577">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-579">nx_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-579">nx_icmp_ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-580">nxd_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-580">nxd_icmp_enable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-581">nxd_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-581">nxd_icmp_ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-582">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-582">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-583">nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-583">nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_icmp_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-584">nx_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-584">nx_icmp_ping</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-585">Skicka ping-begäran till angiven IP-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-585">Send ping request to specified IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-586">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-586">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    CHAR *data, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-587">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-588">Den här tjänsten skickar en ping-begäran till den angivna IP-adressen och väntar på den angivna tiden för ett ping-svarsmeddelande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-588">This service sends a ping request to the specified IP address and waits for the specified amount of time for a ping response message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-589">Om inget svar tas emot returneras ett fel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-589">If no response is received, an error is returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-590">Annars returneras hela svarsmeddelandet i variabeln som pekas av response_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-590">Otherwise, the entire response message is returned in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-591">Om du vill skicka en ping-begäran till ett IPv6-mål använder program tjänsten \***nxd_icmp_ping** _ eller _ \*_nxd_icmp_source_ping_\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-591">To send a ping request to an IPv6 destination, applications shall use the ***nxd_icmp_ping** _ or _ *_nxd_icmp_source_ping_** service.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-592">*Om NX_SUCCESS returneras ansvarar programmet för att släppa det mottagna paketet när det inte längre behövs*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-592">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-593">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-594">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-594">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-595">**ip_address** IP-adress i byte ordning för värden till ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-595">**ip_address** IP address, in host byte order, to ping.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-596">**data** Pekare till data arean för ping-meddelande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-596">**data** Pointer to data area for ping message.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-597">**data_size** Antal byte i ping-data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-597">**data_size** Number of bytes in the ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-598">**response_ptr** Pekare till paket pekare för att returnera meddelandet ping-svar i.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-598">**response_ptr** Pointer to packet pointer to return the ping response message in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-599">**wait_option** Definierar antalet ThreadX timer-Tick som ska vänta på ett ping-svar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-599">**wait_option** Defines the number of ThreadX timer ticks to wait for a ping response.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-600">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-600">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="170ea-601">Vänte alternativ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-601">Wait Option</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="170ea-602">Värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-602">Value</span></span>                           |
| -----------------------|---------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="170ea-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span></span>             | <span data-ttu-id="170ea-604">0x00000000</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-604">(0x00000000)</span></span>                    |
| <span data-ttu-id="170ea-605">timeout-värde i Tick</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-605">timeout value in ticks</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="170ea-606">(0x00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-606">(0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="170ea-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="170ea-608">0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-608">0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>                      |

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-609">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-609">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-610">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-610">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-611">Svars meddelandets pekare placerades i variabeln som pekades på av response_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-611">Response message pointer was placed in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-612">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0X01) Det gick inte att allokera ett ping Request-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-612">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Unable to allocate a ping request packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-613">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) det angivna data utrymmet överskrider standard paket storleken för den här IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-613">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Specified data area exceeds the default packet size for this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-614">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0X29) begärda IP-adressen svarade inte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-614">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Requested IP did not respond.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-615">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av ett anrop till tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-615">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-eller svars pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-620">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-620">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-621">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-621">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-622">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-622">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-623">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-623">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-624">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-624">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Issue a ping to IP address 1.2.3.5 from the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_ping(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5), "abcd", 4,
                      &response_ptr, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, a ping response was received from IP
   address 1.2.3.5 and the response packet is contained in the
   packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same "abcd"
   four bytes of data. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-632">nx_igmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-632">nx_igmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-633">Aktivera IGMP (Internet Group Management Protocol)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-633">Enable Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-634">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-634">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-635">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-635">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-636">Den här tjänsten aktiverar IGMP-komponenten på den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-636">This service enables the IGMP component on the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-637">IGMP-komponenten ansvarar för att ge stöd för hanterings åtgärder för IP-multicast-grupper.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-637">The IGMP component is responsible for providing support for IP multicast group management operations.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad IGMP-aktivering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-642">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-642">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-643">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-643">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-644">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) den här komponenten har redan Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-644">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>
