## <a name="nx_igmp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-662">nx_igmp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-662">nx_igmp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-663">Hämta information om IGMP-aktiviteter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-663">Retrieve information about IGMP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-664">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-664">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *igmp_reports_sent,
    ULONG *igmp_queries_received,
    ULONG *igmp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *current_groups_joined);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-665">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-665">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-666">Den här tjänsten hämtar information om IGMP-aktiviteter för den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-666">This service retrieves information about IGMP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-667">*Om en mål pekare är NX_NULL returneras inte den informationen till anroparen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-667">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-668">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-668">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-669">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-669">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-670">**igmp_reports_sent** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet ICMP-rapporter som skickats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-670">**igmp_reports_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of ICMP reports sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-671">**igmp_queries_received** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet frågor som tagits emot av multicast-router.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-671">**igmp_queries_received** Pointer to destination for the total number of queries received by multicast router.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-672">**igmp_checksum_errors** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet fel i IGMP-kontrollsumma för mottagna paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-672">**igmp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of IGMP checksum errors on receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-673">**current_groups_joined** Pekare till målet för det aktuella antalet grupper som anslöts via den här IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-673">**current_groups_joined** Pointer to destination of the current number of groups joined through this IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-674">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-674">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-675">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad IGMP-informations hämtning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-675">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-676">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-676">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-677">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-677">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-678">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-678">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-679">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-679">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-680">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-680">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-681">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-681">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-682">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-682">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-683">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-683">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve IGMP information from previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_igmp_info_get(&ip_0, &igmp_reports_sent,
                          &igmp_queries_received,
                          &igmp_checksum_errors,
                          &current_groups_joined);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IGMP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_loopback_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-696">nx_igmp_loopback_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-696">nx_igmp_loopback_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-697">Inaktivera IGMP loopback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-697">Disable IGMP loopback</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-698">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-698">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_loopback_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-699">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-699">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-700">Den här tjänsten inaktiverar IGMP loopback för alla efterföljande multicast-grupper som anslutits.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-700">This service disables IGMP loopback for all subsequent multicast groups joined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-701">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-701">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-702">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-702">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-704">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades IGMP loopback-inaktive ring.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-704">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP loopback disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-705">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) IGMP är inte aktiverat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-705">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-706">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-706">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-707">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) anroparen är inte en tråd eller initiering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-707">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-708">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-708">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-709">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-709">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-710">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-710">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-711">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-711">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-712">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-712">Example</span></span>

```c
   joined. */

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS IGMP loopback is disabled. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_loopback_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-725">nx_igmp_loopback_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-725">nx_igmp_loopback_enable</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-727">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-727">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_loopback_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-728">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-728">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-729">Den här tjänsten aktiverar IGMP loopback för alla efterföljande multicast-grupper som är anslutna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-729">This service enables IGMP loopback for all subsequent multicast groups joined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-730">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-730">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-731">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-731">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-732">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-732">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-733">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades IGMP loopback-inaktive ring.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-733">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP loopback disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-734">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) IGMP är inte aktiverat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-734">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-735">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-735">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-736">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) anroparen är inte en tråd eller initiering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-736">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-738">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-738">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-739">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-739">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-741">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-741">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IGMP loopback for all subsequent multicast
   groups joined. */

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS IGMP loopback is enabled. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-753">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-753">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-754">Ansluta IP-instans till angiven multicast-grupp via ett gränssnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-754">Join IP instance to specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-755">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-755">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-756">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-756">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-757">Den här tjänsten ansluter en IP-instans till den angivna multicast-gruppen via ett angivet nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-757">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-758">En intern räknare upprätthålls för att hålla reda på hur många gånger samma grupp har anslutits.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-758">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-759">När du har anslutit till multicast-gruppen tillåter IGMP-komponenten mottagning av IP-paket med den här grupp adressen via det angivna nätverks gränssnittet och rapporterar till routrar som den här IP-adressen är medlem i den här multicast-gruppen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-759">After joining the multicast group, the IGMP component will allow reception of IP packets with this group address via the specified network interface and also report to routers that this IP is a member of this multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-760">IGMP-medlemskapet Anslut, rapportera och lämna meddelanden skickas också via det angivna nätverks gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-760">The IGMP membership join, report, and leave messages are also sent via the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-761">Om du vill ansluta en IPv4-multicast-grupp utan att skicka rapporter om IGMP-gruppmedlemskap använder programmet tjänsten ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-761">To join an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-762">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-762">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-763">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-763">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-764">**group_address** Klass D IP multicast-gruppadress att ansluta till i värdens byte ordning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-764">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-765">**interface_index** Index för det gränssnitt som är kopplat till NetX Duo-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-765">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-766">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-766">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-767">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) multicast-gruppanslutningen är klar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-767">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-768">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Det går inte att ansluta fler multicast-grupper, maximalt antal har överskridits.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-768">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-769">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-769">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-770">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) enhets index pekar på ett ogiltigt nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-770">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-771">Den tillhandahållna **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) multicast-gruppadressen är inte en giltig klass D-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-771">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-772">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-772">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-773">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) stöd för IP-multicast är inte aktiverat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-773">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP multicast support is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-774">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-774">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-775">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-775">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-776">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-776">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-777">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-777">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-778">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-778">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance joins the multicast group
   244.0.0.200, via the interface at index 1 in the IP interface
   list. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join
                                 (&ip IP_ADDRESS(244,0,0,200),
                                  INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully joined
   the multicast group. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-790">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-790">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-791">Lämna den angivna multicast-gruppen via ett gränssnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-791">Leave specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-792">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-792">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-793">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-793">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-794">Den här tjänsten lämnar den angivna multicast-gruppen via ett angivet nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-794">This service leaves the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-795">En intern räknare upprätthålls för att hålla reda på antalet gånger samma grupp har varit medlem i.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-795">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been a member of.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-796">När du har lämnat multicast-gruppen kommer IGMP-komponenten att skicka ut rätt medlemskaps rapport och kan lämna gruppen om det inte finns några medlemmar från den här noden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-796">After leaving the multicast group, the IGMP component will send out proper membership report, and may leave the group if there are no members from this node.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-797">Om du vill lämna en IPv4-multicast-grupp utan att skicka rapporter om IGMP-gruppmedlemskap, ska programmet använda tjänsten ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-797">To leave an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-798">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-798">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-799">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-799">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-800">**group_address** Klass D IP multicast-gruppens adress att lämna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-800">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to leave.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-801">IP-adressen är i byte-ordning för värden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-801">The IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-802">**interface_index** Index för det gränssnitt som är kopplat till NetX Duo-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-802">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-803">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-803">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-804">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) multicast-gruppanslutningen är klar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-804">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-805">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0X16) Det gick inte att hitta den angivna multicast-gruppadressen i den lokala multicast-tabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-805">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) The specified multicast group address cannot be found in the local multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-806">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-806">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-807">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) enhets index pekar på ett ogiltigt nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-807">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-808">Den tillhandahållna **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) multicast-gruppadressen är inte en giltig klass D-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-808">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-809">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-809">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-810">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) stöd för IP-multicast är inte aktiverat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-810">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP multicast support is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-811">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-811">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-812">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-812">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-813">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-813">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-814">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-814">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-815">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-815">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Leave the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave
                                (&ip IP_ADDRESS(244,0,0,200),
                                 INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully leaves
   the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-827">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-827">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-828">Anslut IP-instans till angiven multicast-grupp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-828">Join IP instance to specified multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-829">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-829">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG group_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-830">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-830">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-831">Den här tjänsten ansluter en IP-instans till den angivna multicast-gruppen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-831">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-832">En intern räknare upprätthålls för att hålla reda på hur många gånger samma grupp har anslutits.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-832">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-833">Driv rutinen anropas för att skicka en IGMP-rapport om detta är den första anslutnings förfrågan som finns i nätverket och som anger värden för att ansluta till gruppen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-833">The driver is commanded to send an IGMP report if this is the first join request out on the network indicating the host's intention to join the group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-834">När du har anslutit till IGMP-komponenten kan IGMP-komponenten ta emot IP-paket med den här grupp adressen och rapportera till routrar som den här IP-adressen är medlem i den här multicast-gruppen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-834">After joining, the IGMP component will allow reception of IP packets with this group address and report to routers that this IP is a member of this multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-835">Om du vill ansluta en IPv4-multicast-grupp utan att skicka rapporter om IGMP-gruppmedlemskap använder programmet tjänsten ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-835">To join an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-836">*Använd tjänsten nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join om du vill ansluta en multicast-grupp på en icke-primär enhet **.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-836">*To join a multicast group on a non-primary device, use the service **nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-837">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-838">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-838">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-839">**group_address** Klass D IP multicast-grupp adress att ansluta till.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-839">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-840">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-840">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-841">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) multicast-gruppanslutningen är klar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-841">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-842">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Det går inte att ansluta fler multicast-grupper, maximalt antal har överskridits.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-842">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-843">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) enhets index pekar på ett ogiltigt nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-843">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-844">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IP-gruppadress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-844">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP group address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-845">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-845">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-846">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-846">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-847">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-847">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-848">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-849">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-849">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-850">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-850">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-851">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-851">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-852">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-852">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance ip_0 joins the multicast group
   224.0.0.200. */
status = nx_igmp_multicast_join(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, this IP instance has successfully
   joined the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-865">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-865">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-866">Orsak till att IP-instansen lämnar angiven multicast-grupp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-866">Cause IP instance to leave specified multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-867">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-867">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG group_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-868">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-868">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-869">Den här tjänsten gör att en IP-instans lämnar den angivna multicast-gruppen, om antalet tjänstledighets-equests matchar antalet anslutnings begär Anden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-869">This service causes an IP instance to leave the specified multicast group, if the number of leave equests matches the number of join requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-870">Annars minskas antalet interna anslutningar helt enkelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-870">Otherwise, the internal join count is simply decremented.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-871">Om du vill lämna en IPv4-multicast-grupp utan att skicka rapporter om IGMP-gruppmedlemskap, ska programmet använda tjänsten ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-871">To leave an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-872">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-872">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-873">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-873">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-874">**group_address** Multicast-grupp att lämna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-874">**group_address** Multicast group to leave.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-875">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-875">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-876">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) multicast-gruppanslutningen är klar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-876">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-877">Det gick inte att hitta den tidigare kopplings förfrågan för **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-877">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Previous join request was not found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-878">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) enhets index pekar på ett ogiltigt nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-878">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-879">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IP-gruppadress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-879">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP group address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-880">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-880">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-881">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-881">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-882">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-882">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-883">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-883">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-884">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-884">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-885">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-885">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-886">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-886">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-887">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-887">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Cause IP instance to leave the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
status = nx_igmp_multicast_leave(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, this IP instance has successfully left
   the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_change_notifiy"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-900">nx_ip_address_change_notifiy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-900">nx_ip_address_change_notifiy</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-901">Meddela program om IP-adressen ändras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-901">Notify application if IP address changes</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-902">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-902">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_change_notify(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID(*change_notify)(NX_IP *, VOID *),
    VOID *additional_info);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-903">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-903">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-904">Den här tjänsten registrerar en program meddelande funktion som anropas när IPv4-adressen ändras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-904">This service registers an application notification function that is called whenever the IPv4 address is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-905">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-905">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-906">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-906">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-907">**change_notify** Pekare till funktionen IP-ändrings meddelande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-907">**change_notify** Pointer to IP change notification function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-908">Om den här parametern är NX_NULL inaktive ras meddelandet om ändring av IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-908">If this parameter is NX_NULL, IP address change notification is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-909">**additional_info** Pekare till valfri ytterligare information som också tillhandahålls till meddelande funktionen när IP-adressen ändras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-909">**additional_info** Pointer to optional additional information that is also supplied to the notification function when the IP address is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-910">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-910">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-911">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) avisering om ändring av IP-adress har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-911">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address change notification.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-912">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-912">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-913">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-913">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-914">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-914">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-915">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-915">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-916">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-916">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-917">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-918">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-918">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Register the function "my_ip_changed" to be called whenever the
   IP address is changed. */
status = nx_ip_address_change_notify(&ip_0, my_ip_changed,
                                      NX_NULL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "my_ip_changed" function will be
   called whenever the IP address changes. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-943">nx_ip_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-943">nx_ip_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-944">Hämta IPv4-adress och nätverks mask</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-944">Retrieve IPv4 address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-945">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-945">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-946">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-946">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-947">Den här tjänsten hämtar IPv4-adressen och nät masken för det primära nätverks gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-947">This service retrieves IPv4 address and its subnet mask of the primary network interface.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]   
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-948">\* Om du vill hämta information om den sekundära enheten använder du tjänsten \* \* nx_ip_interface_address_get \* \* \*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-948">\*To obtain information of the secondary device, use the service \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_get\*\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-949">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-949">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-950">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-950">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-951">**ip_address** Pekare till mål för IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-951">**ip_address** Pointer to destination for IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-952">**network_mask** Pekare till målet för nätverks masken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-952">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-953">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-953">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-954">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) IP-adress hämtades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-954">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-955">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-eller RETUR variabel pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-955">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return variable pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-956">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-956">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-957">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-957">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-958">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-958">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-959">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-959">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-960">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-960">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-961">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-961">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the IP address and network mask from the previously created
   IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_address_get(&ip_0, &ip_address, &network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables ip_address and
   network_mask contain the IP and network mask respectively. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-986">nx_ip_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-986">nx_ip_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-987">Ange IPv4-adress och nätverks mask</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-987">Set IPv4 address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-988">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-988">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-989">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-989">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-990">Den här tjänsten anger IPv4-adressen och nätverks masken för det primära nätverks gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-990">This service sets IPv4 address and network mask for the primary network interface.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-991">\* Om du vill ange IP-adress och nätverks mask för den sekundära enheten använder du tjänsten \* \* nx_ip_interface_address_set \* \* \*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-991">\*To set IP address and network mask for the secondary device, use the service \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_set\*\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-992">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-992">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-993">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-993">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-994">**ip_address** Ny IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-994">**ip_address** New IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-995">**network_mask** Ny nätverks mask.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-995">**network_mask** New network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-996">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-997">Den angivna IP-adressen för **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-999">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-999">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1000">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1000">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1001">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1001">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1002">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1002">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1003">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1003">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1004">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1004">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1005">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1005">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the IP address and network mask to 1.2.3.4 and 0xFFFFFF00 for
   the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_address_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                           0xFFFFFF00UL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance now has an IP address of
   1.2.3.4 and a network mask of 0xFFFFFF00. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1030">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1030">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1031">Konfigurera en tilläggs paket pool</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1031">Configure an auxiliary packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1032">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1032">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *aux_pool);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1033">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1033">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1034">Den här tjänsten konfigurerar en tilläggs paket-pool i IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1034">This service configures an auxiliary packet pool in the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1035">För ett minnes begränsat system kan användaren öka minnes effektiviteten genom att skapa en standardpool med paket storlek för MTU och skapa en tilläggs paket pool med mindre paket storlek för IP-tråden för att överföra små paket med.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1035">For a memory-constrained system, the user may increase memory efficiency by creating the default packet pool with packet size of MTU, and creating an auxiliary packet pool with smaller packet size for the IP thread to transmit small packets with.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1036">Den rekommenderade paket storleken för den extra poolen är 256 byte, förutsatt att IPv6 och IPsec båda är aktiverade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1036">The recommended packet size for the auxiliary pool is 256 bytes, assuming IPv6 and IPsec are both enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1037">Som standard accepterar IP-instansen inte en tilläggs paket-pool.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1037">By default the IP instance does not accept the auxiliary packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1038">Om du vill aktivera den här funktionen måste *NX_DUAL_PACKET_POOL_ENABLE* definieras när du kompilerar netx Duo-biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1038">To enable this feature, *NX_DUAL_PACKET_POOL_ENABLE* must be defined when compiling the NetX Duo library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1039">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1039">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1040">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1040">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1041">**aux_pool** Den extra Packet-pool som ska konfigureras för IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1041">**aux_pool** The auxiliary packet pool to be configured for the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1042">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1042">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1043">Den angivna IP-adressen för **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1043">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1044">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) funktionen för dubbel pool av paket är inte kompilerad i biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1044">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The dual packet pool feature is not compiled in the library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1045">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare eller pool pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1045">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer or pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1046">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1046">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1047">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1047">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1048">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1048">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1049">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1049">Preemption Possible</span></span>  

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1050">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1050">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1051">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1051">Example</span></span>

```c
#define SMALL_PAYLOAD_SIZE 256
NX_PACKET small_pool;

nx_packet_pool_create(&small_pool, "small pool", SMALL_PAYLOAD_SIZE,
                       small_pool_memory_ptr, small_pool_size);

/* Add the small packet pool to the IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set(&ip_0, &small_pool);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance now is able to use the
   small pool for transmitting small datagram. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1065">nx_ip_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1065">nx_ip_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1066">Skapa en IP-instans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1066">Create an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1067">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1067">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    CHAR *name, ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask, 
    NX_PACKET_POOL *default_pool,
    VOID (*ip_network_driver)(NX_IP_DRIVER *),
    VOID *memory_ptr, 
    ULONG memory_size,
    UINT priority);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1068">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1068">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1069">Den här tjänsten skapar en IP-instans med användaren angiven IP-adress och nätverks driv rutin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1069">This service creates an IP instance with the user supplied IP address and network driver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1070">Dessutom måste programmet ange en tidigare skapad modempool för IP-instansen som ska användas för intern paket tilldelning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1070">In addition, the application must supply a previously created packet pool for the IP instance to use for internal packet allocation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1071">Observera att den angivna program nätverks driv rutinen inte anropas förrän den här IP-tråden körts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1071">Note that the supplied application network driver is not called until this IP's thread executes.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1072">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1072">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1073">**ip_ptr** Pekare för att kontrol lera block för att skapa en ny IP-instans.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1073">**ip_ptr** Pointer to control block to create a new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1074">**namn** Namnet på den nya IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1074">**name** Name of this new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1075">**ip_address** IP-adress för den här nya IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1075">**ip_address** IP address for this new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1076">**network_mask** Mask för att avgränsa nätverks delen av IP-adressen för under näts tycken och Super-nett användning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1076">**network_mask** Mask to delineate the network portion of the IP address for sub-netting and super-netting uses.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1077">**default_pool** Pekare för att kontrol lera blockeringen av tidigare skapade NetX Duo-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1077">**default_pool** Pointer to control block of previously created NetX Duo packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1078">**ip_network_driver** Nätverks driv rutin som anges av användaren som används för att skicka och ta emot IP-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1078">**ip_network_driver** User-supplied network driver used to send and receive IP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1079">**memory_ptr** Pekare till minnes området för IP Helper-trådens stack Area.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1079">**memory_ptr** Pointer to memory area for the IP helper thread’s stack area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1080">**memory_size** Antal byte i minnes området för IP Helper-trådens stack.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1080">**memory_size** Number of bytes in the memory area for the IP helper thread’s stack.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1081">**prioritet** Prioritet för IP Helper-tråd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1081">**priority** Priority of IP helper thread.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1082">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1082">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1083">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) en lyckad IP-instans skapas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1083">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP instance creation.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1084">**NX_NOT_IMPLEMENTED** (0X4A) netx Duo-biblioteket är felaktigt konfigurerat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1084">**NX_NOT_IMPLEMENTED** (0x4A) NetX Duo library is configured incorrectly.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1085">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP, nätverks driv rutin funktion pekare, adresspool eller minnes pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1085">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP, network driver function pointer, packet pool, or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1086">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0X09) den angivna stack storleken är för liten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1086">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) The supplied stack size is too small.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1087">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1087">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1088">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) den angivna IP-adressen är ogiltig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1088">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) The supplied IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1089">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X21) den angivna prioriteten för IP-tråd är ogiltig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1089">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x21) The supplied IP thread priority is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1090">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1090">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1091">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1091">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1092">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1092">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1093">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1093">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1094">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1094">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create an IP instance with an IP address of 1.2.3.4 and a network
   mask of 0xFFFFFF00UL. The "ethernet_driver" specifies the entry
   point of the application specific network driver and the
   "stack_memory_ptr" specifies the start of a 1024 byte memory
   area that is used for this IP instance’s helper thread. */
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance ip_0",
                      IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4),
                      0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0, ethernet_driver,
                      stack_memory_ptr, 1024, 1);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has been created. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1119">nx_ip_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1119">nx_ip_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1120">Ta bort den tidigare skapade IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1120">Delete previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1121">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1121">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_delete(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1122">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1122">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1123">Den här tjänsten tar bort en tidigare skapad IP-instans och släpper alla system resurser som ägs av IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1123">This service deletes a previously created IP instance and releases all of the system resources owned by the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1124">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1124">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1125">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1125">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1126">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1126">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1127">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IP-borttagning har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1127">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP deletion.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1128">**NX_SOCKETS_BOUND** (0X28) den här IP-instansen har fortfarande UDP-eller TCP-Sockets kopplade till sig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1128">**NX_SOCKETS_BOUND** (0x28) This IP instance still has UDP or TCP sockets bound to it.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1129">Alla Sockets måste vara obundna och tas bort innan IP-instansen tas bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1129">All sockets must be unbound and deleted prior to deleting the IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1130">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1130">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1131">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1131">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1132">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1132">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1133">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1133">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1134">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1134">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1135">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1135">Yes</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_driver_direct_command"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1161">nx_ip_driver_direct_command</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1161">nx_ip_driver_direct_command</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1162">Issue-kommando för nätverks driv rutin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1162">Issue command to network driver</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1163">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1163">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_driver_direct_command
    (NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT command,
    ULONG *return_value_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1164">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1164">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1165">Den här tjänsten tillhandahåller ett direkt gränssnitt till programmets primära nätverks gränssnitts driv rutin som anges under ***nx_ip_create*** -anropet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1165">This service provides a direct interface to the application's primary network interface driver specified during the ***nx_ip_create*** call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1166">Programspecifika kommandon kan användas för att tillhandahålla ett numeriskt värde som är större än eller lika med NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1166">Application-specific commands can be used providing their numeric value is greater than or equal to NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1167">Om du \*vill utfärda kommando för den sekundära enheten använder du tjänsten \*\*nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command\*\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1167">*To issue command for the secondary device, use the **nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command** service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1168">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1168">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1169">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1169">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1170">**kommando** Numerisk kommando kod.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1170">**command** Numeric command code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1171">Standard kommandon definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1171">Standard commands are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1172">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1172">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1173">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1173">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1174">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1174">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1175">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1175">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1176">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1176">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1177">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1177">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1178">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1178">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1179">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1179">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1180">**return_value_ptr** Pekare som returnerar variabeln i anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1180">**return_value_ptr** Pointer to return variable in the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1181">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1181">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1182">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) enhets direkt kommando för nätverks driv rutin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1182">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful network driver direct command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1183">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) ohanterad eller ej implementerad nätverks driv rutin kommando.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1183">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) Unhandled or unimplemented network driver command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1184">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-eller RETUR värdes pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1184">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return value pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1185">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1185">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1186">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) ogiltigt gränssnitts index.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1186">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1187">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1187">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1188">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1188">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1189">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1189">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1190">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1190">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1191">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1191">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Make a direct call to the application-specific network driver
   for the previously created IP instance. For this example, the
   network driver is interrogated for the link status. */
status = nx_ip_driver_direct_command(&ip_0, NX_LINK_GET_STATUS,
                                     &link_status);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link_status variable contains a
   NX_TRUE or NX_FALSE value representing the status of the
   physical link. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1218">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1218">Prototype</span></span>  

```c

    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT command,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *return_value_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1219">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1219">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1220">Den här tjänsten tillhandahåller ett direkt kommando för programmets nätverks enhets driv rutin i IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1220">This service provides a direct command to the application's network device driver in the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1221">Programspecifika kommandon kan användas för att tillhandahålla ett numeriskt värde som är större än eller lika med *NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1221">Application-specific commands can be used providing their numeric value is greater than or equal to *NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND*.</span></span>

    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1226">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1226">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1227">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1227">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1228">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1228">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1229">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1229">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1230">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1230">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1231">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1231">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1232">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1232">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1233">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1233">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1246">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1246">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Make a direct call to the application-specific network driver
   for the previously created IP instance. For this example, the
   network driver is interrogated for the link status. */

/* Set the interface index to the primary device. */
UINT interface_index = 0;

status = nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command(&ip_0,
                                               NX_LINK_GET_STATUS,
                                               interface_index,
                                               &link_status);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link_status variable contains a
   NX_TRUE or NX_FALSE value representing the status of the
   physical link. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_forwarding_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1271">nx_ip_forwarding_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1271">nx_ip_forwarding_disable</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1273">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1273">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_forwarding_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1274">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1274">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1275">Den här tjänsten inaktiverar vidarebefordring av IP-paket i NetX Duo IP-komponenten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1275">This service disables forwarding IP packets inside the NetX Duo IP component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1276">Den här tjänsten inaktive ras automatiskt när du skapar IP-uppgiften.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1276">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1277">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1277">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1278">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1278">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1279">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1279">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1280">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00)-slutförd IP-vidarebefordring inaktivera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1280">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP forwarding disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1284">Initiering, trådar, timers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1284">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1286">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1286">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1287">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1287">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable IP forwarding on this IP instance. */

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP forwarding has been disabled on the
   previously created IP instance. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1316">Den här tjänsten aktiverar vidarebefordring av IP-paket i NetX Duo IP-komponenten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1316">This service enables forwarding IP packets inside the NetX Duo IP component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1317">Den här tjänsten inaktive ras automatiskt när du skapar IP-uppgiften.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1317">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span></span>
