### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1441">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1441">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1442">Den här tjänsten tar bort IPv4-gateway-adressen som kon figurer ATS i instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1442">This service clears the IPv4 gateway address configured in the instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1443">Om du vill rensa en yttre IPv6-standardinställning från IP-instansen använder program tjänsten ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1443">To clear an IPv6 default outer from the IP instance, applications shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete.***</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1446">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1446">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1447">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har RENSAT IP-gateway-adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1447">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully cleared the IP gateway address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1448">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltigt IP Control Block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1448">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1449">Tjänsten **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) anropas inte från system initiering eller tråd kontext.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1449">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1457">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1457">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1459">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1459">Prototype</span></span>  

```c

    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1460">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1461">Den här tjänsten hämtar IPv4-gateway-adressen som kon figurer ATS i IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1461">This service retrieves the IPv4 gateway address configured in the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1462">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1462">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1463">**ip_ptr** Pekare för IP Control Block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1463">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1464">**ip_address** Pekar på det minne där gateway-adressen lagras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1464">**ip_address** Pointer to the memory where the gateway address is stored</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1465">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1465">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1466">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1466">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1467">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare för IP Control eller IP-adress pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1467">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or ip address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1468">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0X4E) gateway-adressen hittades inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1468">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Gateway address not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1469">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) S servicenivåmå anropas inte från system initiering eller tråd kontext.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1469">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1487">Ange IP-adress för gateway</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1487">Set Gateway IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1488">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1488">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1489">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1490">Den här tjänsten anger IPv4-gatewayens IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1490">This service sets the IPv4 gateway IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1491">All trafik utanför nätverket dirigeras till den här gatewayen för överföring.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1491">All out-of-network traffic are routed to this gateway for transmission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1492">Gatewayen måste vara direkt tillgänglig via ett av nätverks gränssnitten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1492">The gateway must be directly accessible through one of the network interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1493">Använd tjänsten nxd_ipv6_default_router_add om du vill konfigurera IPv6-gateway-adressen ***.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1493">To configure IPv6 gateway address, use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_add.***</span></span> 

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1494">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1494">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1495">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1495">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1496">**ip_address** IP-adressen för gatewayen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1496">**ip_address** IP address of the gateway.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1497">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1497">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1498">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) GATEWAYens IP-adress har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1498">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful Gateway IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-instans pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1500">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1500">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1501">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1501">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1502">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1502">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1503">Initiering, tråd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1503">Initialization, thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1504">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1504">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1505">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1505">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1506">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1506">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup the Gateway address for previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,99);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, all out-of-network send requests are
   routed to 1.2.3.99. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1519">Hämta information om IP-aktiviteter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1519">Retrieve information about IP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1520">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1520">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_received,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_received,
    ULONG *ip_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *ip_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_receive_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *ip_send_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_received);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1521">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1521">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1522">Den här tjänsten hämtar information om IP-aktiviteter för den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1522">This service retrieves information about IP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1523">*Om en mål pekare är NX_NULL returneras inte den informationen till anroparen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1523">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1524">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1524">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1525">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1525">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1526">**ip_total_packets_sent** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet skickade IP-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1526">**ip_total_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of IP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet byte som har skickats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1528">**ip_total_packets_received** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet IP-mottagna paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1528">**ip_total_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet mottagna IP-byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1530">**ip_invalid_packets** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet ogiltiga IP-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1530">**ip_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid IP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet mottagna paket som har tagits bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1532">**ip_receive_checksum_errors** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet fel i kontroll summor i mottagna paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1532">**ip_receive_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of checksum errors in receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet skickade paket som släppts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of send packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet fragment som skickats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent** Pointer to destination of the total number of fragments sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1535">**ip_total_fragments_received** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet fragment som tagits emot.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1535">**ip_total_fragments_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of fragments received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1536">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) hämtning av IP-information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1538">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1538">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1540">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1540">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1541">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1541">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1542">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1542">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1543">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1543">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1544">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1544">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve IP information from previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_ip_info_get(&ip_0,
                        &ip_total_packets_sent,
                        &ip_total_bytes_sent,
                        &ip_total_packets_received,
                        &ip_total_bytes_received,
                        &ip_invalid_packets,
                        &ip_receive_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_receive_checksum_errors,
                        &ip_send_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_total_fragments_sent,
                        &ip_total_fragments_received);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1570">Hämta gränssnittets IP-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1570">Retrieve interface IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1571">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1571">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_get (
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1572">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1572">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1573">Den här tjänsten hämtar IPv4-adressen för ett angivet nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1573">This service retrieves the IPv4 address of a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1574">För att hämta IPv6-adress använder programmet tjänsten ***nxd_ipv6_address_get***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1574">To retrieve IPv6 address, application shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_address_get***</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1575">*Den angivna enheten måste, om den inte är den primära enheten, vara tidigare ansluten till IP-instansen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1575">*The specified device, if not the primary device, must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1576">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1576">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1577">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1577">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1578">**interface_index** Gränssnitts index, samma värde som indexet till nätverks gränssnittet som är kopplat till IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1578">**interface_index** Interface index, the same value as the index to the network interface attached to the IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1579">**ip_address** Pekare till målet för enhets gränssnittets IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1579">**ip_address** Pointer to destination for the device interface IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1580">**network_mask** Pekare till målet för enhets gränssnittets nätverks mask.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1580">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for the device interface network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1581">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1581">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1582">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) IP-adress hämtades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1582">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1583">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) det angivna nätverks gränssnittet är ogiltigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1583">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1586">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1586">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1587">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1587">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1588">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1588">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1589">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1589">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1590">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1590">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Get device IP address and network mask for the specified
   interface index 1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_get(ip_ptr,INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                     &ip_address,
                                     &network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface address was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1605">Konfigurera om adress mappning krävs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1605">Configure whether address mapping is needed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1606">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1606">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT mapping_needed);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1607">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1607">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1608">Den här tjänsten konfigurerar om IP-adress till MAC-adress mappning behövs för det angivna nätverks gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1608">This service configures whether IP address to MAC address mapping is needed for the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1609">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligt vis från gränssnittets enhets driv rutin för att meddela IP-stacken om det underliggande gränssnittet kräver IP-adress till Layer två (MAC)-adress mappning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1609">This service is typically called from the interface device driver to notify the IP stack whether the underlying interface requires IP address to layer two (MAC) address mapping.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1610">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1611">**ip_ptr** Pekare för IP Control Block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1611">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1612">**interface_index** Index till nätverks gränssnittet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1612">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1613">**mapping_needed** NX_TRUE--adress mappning krävs NX_FALSE-adress mappning behövs inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1613">**mapping_needed** NX_TRUE -- address mapping needed NX_FALSE -- address mapping not needed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1614">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1614">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1615">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) har kon figurer ATS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1615">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful configure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1616">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) enhets indexet är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1616">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare för IP Control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1618">Tjänsten **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) anropas inte från system initiering eller tråd kontext.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1619">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1619">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1620">Trådtoken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1620">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1621">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1621">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1622">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1622">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1623">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1623">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
UCHAR mapping_needed = NX_TRUE;

/* Configure address mapping needed specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(&ip_0,
                                             PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                             mapping_needed);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the address mapping needed was
   successfully configured. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1637">nx_ip_interface_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1637">nx_ip_interface_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1638">Ange gränssnittets IP-adress och nätverks mask</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1638">Set interface IP address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1639">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1639">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1640">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1640">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1641">Den här tjänsten anger IPv4-adressen och nätverks masken för det angivna IP-gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1641">This service sets the IPv4 address and network mask for the specified IP interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1642">För att konfigurera IPv6-gränssnitts adress, ska programmet använda tjänsten ***nxd_ipv6_address_set***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1642">To configure IPv6 interface address, application shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_address_set***.</span></span> 
 
> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1643">*Det angivna gränssnittet måste vara kopplat till IP-instansen tidigare*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1643">*The specified interface must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span> 

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1644">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1644">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1645">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1645">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1646">**interface_index** Index för det gränssnitt som är kopplat till NetX Duo-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1646">**interface_index** Index of the interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1647">**ip_address** Nytt IP-adress för nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1647">**ip_address** New network interface IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1648">**network_mask** Nätverks mask för nytt gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1648">**network_mask** New interface network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1649">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1649">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1650">Den angivna IP-adressen för **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1650">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1651">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) det angivna nätverks gränssnittet är ogiltigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1651">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1652">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1652">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1653">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltiga pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1653">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1654">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IP-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1654">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1655">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1655">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1656">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1656">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1657">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1657">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1658">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1658">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1659">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1659">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Set device IP address and network mask for the specified
   interface index 1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_set(ip_ptr, INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                     ip_address,
                                     network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface IP address and mask was
   successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1673">nx_ip_interface_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1673">nx_ip_interface_attach</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1674">Koppla nätverks gränssnitt till IP-instans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1674">Attach network interface to IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1675">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1675">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_attach(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    CHAR *interface_name,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask,
    VOID(*ip_link_driver)(struct NX_IP_DRIVER_STRUCT *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1676">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1676">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1677">Den här tjänsten lägger till ett fysiskt nätverks gränssnitt i IP-gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1677">This service adds a physical network interface to the IP interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1678">Observera att IP-instansen skapas med det primära gränssnittet så att varje ytterligare gränssnitt är sekundärt till det primära gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1678">Note the IP instance is created with the primary interface so each additional interface is secondary to the primary interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1679">Det totala antalet nätverks gränssnitt som är kopplade till IP-instansen (inklusive det primära gränssnittet) får inte överskrida **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1679">The total number of network interfaces attached to the IP instance (including the primary interface) cannot exceed **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1680">Om IP-tråden inte har körts än kommer de sekundära gränssnitten att initieras som en del av start processen för IP-tråd som initierar alla fysiska gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1680">If the IP thread has not been running yet, the secondary interfaces will be initialized as part of the IP thread startup process that initializes all physical interfaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1681">Om IP-tråden inte körs ännu initieras det sekundära gränssnittet som en del av ***nx_ip_interface_attachs*** tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1681">If the IP thread is not running yet, the secondary interface is initialized as part of the ***nx_ip_interface_attach*** service.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1682">*ip_ptr måste peka på en giltig netx Duo IP-struktur. **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** måste konfigureras för antalet nätverks gränssnitt för IP-instansen. Standardvärdet är ett*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1682">*ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure. **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** must be configured for the number of network interfaces for the IP instance. The default value is one*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1683">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1683">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1684">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1684">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1685">**INTERFACE_NAME** Pekare till gränssnittets namn sträng.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1685">**interface_name** Pointer to interface name string.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1686">**ip_address** Enhetens IP-adress i byte ordningen för värden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1686">**ip_address** Device IP address in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1687">**network_mask** Enhetens nätverks mask i byte ordningen för värden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1687">**network_mask** Device network mask in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1688">**ip_link_driver** Ethernet-drivrutin för gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1688">**ip_link_driver** Ethernet driver for the interface.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1689">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1689">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1690">**NX_SUCCESS** -posten (0x00) läggs till i den statiska routningstabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1690">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry is added to static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1691">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0X17) Max antal gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1691">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Max number of interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1692">NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES har överskridits.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1692">NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES is exceeded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1693">Om IPv6 är aktiverat kan det här felet också indikera att driv rutinen kanske inte har tillräckligt med resurs för att hantera IPv6-multicast-åtgärder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1693">If IPv6 is enabled, this error may also indicate that the driver may not have enough resource to handle IPv6 multicast operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1694">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0X52) den angivna IP-adressen används redan på den här IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1694">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) The supplied IP address is already used on this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1695">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1695">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1696">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare inmatade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1696">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1697">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IP-adress för indata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1697">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address input.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1698">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1698">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1699">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1699">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1700">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1700">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1701">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1701">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1702">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1702">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Attach secondary device for device IP address 192.168.1.68 with
   the specified Ethernet driver. */
status = nx_ip_interface_attach(ip_ptr, “secondary_port”,
                                IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,68),
                                0xFFFFFF00UL,
                                nx_etherDriver);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface was successfully added to
   the IP instance interface table. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_capability_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1716">nx_ip_interface_capability_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1716">nx_ip_interface_capability_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1717">Hämta funktioner för gränssnitts maskin vara</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1717">Get interface hardware capability</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1718">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1718">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_capability_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *interface_capability_flag);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1719">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1719">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1720">Den här tjänsten hämtar funktions flaggan från det angivna nätverks gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1720">This service retrieves the capability flag from the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1721">Om du vill använda den här tjänsten måste NetX Duo-biblioteket skapas med alternativet ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** aktiverat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1721">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1722">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1722">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1723">**ip_ptr** Pekare för IP Control Block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1723">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1724">**interface_index** Index för nätverks gränssnittet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1724">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1725">**interface_capability_flag** Pekare till minnes utrymme för funktions flaggan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1725">**interface_capability_flag** Pointer to memory space for the capability flag</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1726">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1726">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har hämtat gränssnitts kapacitets information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully obtained interface capability information.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1728">Gränssnitts funktionen **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) stöds inte i den här versionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1728">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Interface capability feature is not supported in this build.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1729">Gränssnitts indexet för **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1729">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare eller ogiltig flagga för funktions flagga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or Invalid capability flag pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1731">Tjänsten **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) anropas inte från system initiering eller tråd kontext.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1732">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1733">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1733">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1734">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1734">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1735">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1735">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1736">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1736">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       capability_flag;

/* Get the hardware capability flag of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_capability_get(&ip_0,
                                        PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                        &capability_flag);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the capability flag from the primary
   interface was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_capability_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1750">nx_ip_interface_capability_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1750">nx_ip_interface_capability_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1751">Ange maskin varu funktions flagga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1751">Set the hardware capability flag</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1752">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1752">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_capability_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG interface_capability_flag);
```                           
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1753">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1753">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1754">Den här tjänsten används av nätverks enhets driv rutinen för att konfigurera funktions flaggan för ett angivet nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1754">This service is used by the network device driver to configure the capability flag for a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1755">Om du vill använda den här tjänsten måste NetX Duo-biblioteket kompileras med alternativet ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** definierat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1755">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be compiled with the option ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1756">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1756">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1757">**ip_ptr** Pekare för IP Control Block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1757">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1758">**interface_index** Index för nätverks gränssnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1758">**interface_index** Index of network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1759">**interface_capability_flag** Funktions flagga för utdata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1759">**interface_capability_flag** Capability flag for output</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1760">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1760">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1761">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett en flagga för gränssnittets maskin varu kapacitet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1761">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set interface hardware capability flag.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1762">Gränssnitts funktionen **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) stöds inte i den här versionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1762">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Interface capability feature is not supported in this build.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1763">Gränssnitts indexet för **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1763">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1764">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare för IP Control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1764">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1765">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) S servicenivåmå anropas inte från system initiering eller tråd kontext.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1765">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1767">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1767">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1768">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1768">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1770">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1770">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG capability_flag = \
                 NX_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY_IPV4_TX_CHECKSUM |\
                 NX_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY_IPV4_RX_CHECKSUM;
UINT device_index = 0;

/* Set the hardware capability flag of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_capability_set(&ip_0,
                                        PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                        capability_flag);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the hardware capability flag was
   successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_detach"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1784">nx_ip_interface_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1784">nx_ip_interface_detach</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1785">Koppla från det angivna gränssnittet från IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1785">Detach the specified interface from the IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1786">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1786">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1787">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1787">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1788">Den här tjänsten kopplar bort det angivna IP-gränssnittet från IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1788">This service detaches the specified IP interface from the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1789">När ett gränssnitt kopplas från, tas alla anslutna TCP-Sockets-stängda och ND cache och ARP-poster för det här gränssnittet bort från deras respektive tabeller.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1789">Once an interface is detached, all connected TCP sockets closed, and ND cache and ARP entries for this interface are removed from their respective tables.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1790">IGMP-medlemskap för det här gränssnittet tas bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1790">IGMP memberships for this interface are removed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1791">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1791">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1792">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1792">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1793">**index** Index för det gränssnitt som ska tas bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1793">**index** Index of the interface to be removed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1794">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1795">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) tog bort ett fysiskt gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1795">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully removed a physical interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1796">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) det angivna nätverks gränssnittet är ogiltigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1796">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1797">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltiga pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1797">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1798">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1798">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1799">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1799">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1800">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1800">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1801">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1801">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1802">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1802">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Detach interface 1. */
status = nx_ip_interface_detach(&IP_0, INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface is successfully detached
   from the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1816">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1816">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1817">Hämta nätverks gränssnitts parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1817">Retrieve network interface parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1818">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1818">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    CHAR **interface_name,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask,
    ULONG *mtu_size,
    ULONG *physical_address_msw,
    ULONG *physical_address_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1819">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1819">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1820">Den här tjänsten hämtar information om nätverks parametrar för det angivna nätverks gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1820">This service retrieves information on network parameters for the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1821">Alla data hämtas i byte ordning för värden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1821">All data are retrieved in host byte order.</span></span> 

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1822">*ip_ptr måste peka på en giltig netx Duo IP-struktur. Det angivna gränssnittet, om inte det primära gränssnittet, måste vara tidigare kopplat till IP-instansen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1822">*ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure. The specified interface, if not the primary interface, must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1823">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1823">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1824">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1824">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1825">**interface_index** Index som anger nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1825">**interface_index** Index specifying network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1826">**INTERFACE_NAME** Pekar på den buffert som innehåller namnet på nätverks gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1826">**interface_name** Pointer to the buffer that holds the name of the network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1827">**ip_address** Pekar till målet för gränssnittets IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1827">**ip_address** Pointer to the destination for the IP address of the interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1828">**network_mask** Pekare till målet för nätverks masken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1828">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for network mask.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1829">**mtu_size** Pekare till målet för den maximala överförings enheten för det här gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1829">**mtu_size** Pointer to destination for maximum transfer unit for this interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1830">**physical_address_msw** Pekare till målet för de 16 främsta bitarna i enhetens MAC-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1830">**physical_address_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1831">**physical_address_lsw** Pekare till målet för nedre 32 bitar av enhetens MAC-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1831">**physical_address_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1832">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1832">Return Values</span></span>   

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1833">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) gränssnitts information har hämtats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1833">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Interface information has been obtained.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1834">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare inmatade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1834">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1835">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1835">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1836">Tjänsten **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) anropas inte från system initiering eller tråd kontext.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1836">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1837">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1837">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1838">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1838">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1839">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1839">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1840">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1840">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1841">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1841">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve interface parameters for the specified interface (index
   1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ip_interface_info_get(ip_ptr, INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                  &name_ptr, &ip_address,
                                  &network_mask,
                                  &mtu_size,
                                  &physical_address_msw,
                                  &physical_address_lsw);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface information is
   successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_mtu_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1855">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1855">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1856">Ange MTU-värdet för ett nätverks gränssnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1856">Set the MTU value of a network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1857">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1857">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_mtu_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG mtu_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1858">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1858">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1859">Den här tjänsten används av enhets driv rutinen för att konfigurera IP MTU-värdet för det angivna nätverks gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1859">This service is used by the device driver to configure the IP MTU value for the specified network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1860">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1861">**ip_ptr** Pekare för IP Control Block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1861">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1862">**interface_index** Index till nätverks gränssnittet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1862">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1863">**mtu_size** Storlek på IP-MTU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1863">**mtu_size** IP MTU size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1864">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1864">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1865">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett MTU-värdet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1865">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set MTU value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1866">Gränssnitts indexet för **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1866">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1867">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare för IP Control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1867">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>

```c
/* Set the MTU size of specified interface. */

                                 PRIMARY_INTERFACE, mtu_size);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the MTU size was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1887">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1887">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1888">Hämta den fysiska adressen för en nätverks enhet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1888">Get the physical address of a network device</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1889">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1889">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1890">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1890">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1891">Den här tjänsten hämtar den fysiska adressen för ett nätverks gränssnitt från IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1891">This service retrieves the physical address of a network interface from the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1892">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1892">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1893">**ip_ptr** Pekare för IP Control Block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1893">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1894">**interface_index** Index för nätverks gränssnittet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1894">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1895">**physical_msw** Pekare till målet för de 16 främsta bitarna i enhetens MAC-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1895">**physical_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1896">**physical_lsw** Pekare till målet för nedre 32 bitar av enhetens MAC-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1896">**physical_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1897">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1897">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1898">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1898">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1899">Gränssnitts indexet för **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1899">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1900">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare eller fysisk adress pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1900">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or physical address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1901">Tjänsten **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) anropas inte från system initiering eller tråd kontext.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1901">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1902">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1902">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1903">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1903">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1904">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1904">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1905">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1905">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1906">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1906">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG   physical_msw;
ULONG   physical_lsw;

/* Get the physical address of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get(&ip_0,
                                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                              &physical_msw,
                                              &physical_lsw);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the physical address was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1920">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1920">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1921">Ange den fysiska adressen för ett angivet nätverks gränssnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1921">Set the physical address for a specified network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1922">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1922">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw,
    UINT update_driver);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1923">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1924">Den här tjänsten används av programmet eller en enhets driv rutin för att konfigurera den fysiska adressen för MAC-adressen för det angivna nätverks gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1924">This service is used by the application or a device driver to configure the physical address of the MAC address of the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1925">Den nya MAC-adressen tillämpas på kontroll blocket i gränssnitts strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1925">The new MAC address is applied to the control block of the interface structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1926">Om ***update_driver*** -flaggan har angetts utfärdas ett kommando på en driv rutins nivå så att driv rutinen kan uppdatera Mac-adressen program varan till Ethernet-styrenheten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1926">If the ***update_driver*** flag is set, a driver-level command is issued so the device driver is able to update its MAC address programmed into the Ethernet controller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1927">I en typisk situation anropas den här tjänsten från gränssnittets driv rutin under initierings fasen för att meddela IP-stacken för MAC-adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1927">In a typical situation, this service is called from the interface device driver during initialization phase to notify the IP stack of its MAC address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1928">I det här fallet bör ***update_driver*** -flaggan inte anges.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1928">In this case, the ***update_driver*** flag should not be set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1929">Den här rutinen kan också anropas från användar programmet för att konfigurera om gränssnittets MAC-adress vid körning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1929">This routine can also be called from user application to reconfigure the interface MAC address at run time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1930">I det här användnings fallet ska ***update_driver*** flagga anges, så den nya Mac-adressen kan tillämpas på enhets driv rutinen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1930">In this use case, the ***update_driver*** flag should be set, so the new MAC address can be applied to the device driver.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1931">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1931">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1932">**ip_ptr** Pekare för IP Control Block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1932">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1933">**interface_index** Index till nätverks gränssnittet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1933">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1934">**physical_msw** Pekare till målet för de 16 främsta bitarna i enhetens MAC-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1934">**physical_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1935">**physical_lsw** Pekare till målet för nedre 32 bitar av enhetens MAC-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1935">**physical_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1936">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1937">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) har angetts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1937">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1938">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0X4B) kommando känns inte igen av driv rutinen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1938">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x4B) Command not recognized by the driver</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1939">Gränssnitts indexet för **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1939">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1940">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare för IP Control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1940">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1941">Tjänsten **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) anropas inte från system initiering eller tråd kontext.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1941">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1942">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1942">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1943">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1943">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1944">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1944">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1945">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1945">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1946">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1946">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       physical_msw = 0x00CF;
ULONG       physical_lsw = 0x01020304;

/* Set the physical address of specified device. */
status = nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set(&ip_0,
                                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                              physical_msw,
                                              physical_lsw,
                                              NX_TRUE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the physical address was successfully
   set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_status_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1960">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1960">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1961">Kontrol lera status för en IP-instans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1961">Check status of an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1962">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1962">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_status_check(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index
    ULONG needed_status,
    ULONG *actual_status,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1963">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1963">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-1964">Den här tjänsten kontrollerar och väntar på den angivna statusen för nätverks gränssnittet för en tidigare skapad IP-instans.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1964">This service checks and optionally waits for the specified status of the network interface of a previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1965">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1965">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1966">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1966">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1967">**interface_index** Gränssnitts index nummer needed_status IP-status begärd, definierad i bit-Map-formulär enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1967">**interface_index** Interface index number needed_status IP status requested, defined in bit-map form as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1968">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1968">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1969">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1969">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1970">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1970">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1971">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1971">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1972">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1972">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1973">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1973">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1974">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1974">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1975">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1975">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1976">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1976">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1977">**actual_status** Pekare till målet för faktisk BITS-uppsättning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1977">**actual_status** Pointer to destination of actual bits set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1978">wait_option definierar hur tjänsten fungerar om de begärda status bitarna inte är tillgängliga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1978">wait_option Defines how the service behaves if the requested status bits are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1979">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1979">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1980">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1980">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1981">**timeout-värde** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1981">**timeout value** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1982">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1982">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1983">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1983">Return Values</span></span>
