- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1985">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0X43) status förfrågan uppfylldes inte inom den angivna tids gränsen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1985">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Status request was not satisfied within the timeout specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1986">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP-pekaren är eller har blivit ogiltig eller så är den faktiska status pekaren ogiltig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1986">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP pointer is or has become invalid, or actual status pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1987">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) ogiltigt status alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1987">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid needed status option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1988">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1988">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1989">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface_index är utanför intervallet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1989">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface_index is out of range.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-1990">eller så är gränssnittet ogiltigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1990">or the interface is not valid.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-1995">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-1995">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 10 ticks for the link up status on the previously created IP
   instance. */
status = nx_ip_interface_status_check(&ip_0, 1, NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED,
                                      &actual_status, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the secondary link for the specified IP
   instance is up. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2009">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2009">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2010">Ange funktionen länk status ändring meddela motringning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2010">Set the link status change notify callback function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2011">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2011">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID(*link_status_change_notify)(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT interface_index, UINT link_up));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2012">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2012">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2013">Den här tjänsten konfigurerar funktionen länk status ändring meddela motringning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2013">This service configures the link status change notify callback function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2014">Den användardefinierade *link_status_change_notify* rutinen anropas när antingen den primära eller sekundära gränssnitts statusen ändras (till exempel om IP-adressen har ändrats). Om *link_status_change_notify* är null, är länk status ändring meddela motringning funktion inaktive rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2014">The user-supplied *link_status_change_notify* routine is invoked when either the primary or secondary interface status is changed (such as IP address is changed.) If *link_status_change_notify* is NULL, the link status change notify callback feature is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2015">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2015">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2016">**ip_ptr** Pekare för IP Control Block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2016">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2017">**link_status_change_notify** Återanrops funktion som användaren har angett för att anropas vid en ändring i det fysiska gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2017">**link_status_change_notify** User-supplied callback function to be called upon a change to the physical interface.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2018">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2018">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2019">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) har angetts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2019">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2020">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare eller ny fysisk adress pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2020">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or new physical address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2021">Tjänsten **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) anropas inte från system initiering eller tråd kontext.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2021">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2022">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2022">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2023">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2023">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2024">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2024">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2025">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2025">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2026">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2026">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Configure a callback function to be used when the physical
   interface status is changed. */
status = nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set(&ip_0,
                                             my_change_cb);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the link status change notify function
   is set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_max_payload_size_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2040">nx_ip_max_payload_size_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2040">nx_ip_max_payload_size_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2041">Beräkna högsta paket data nytto Last</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2041">Compute maximum packet data payload</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2042">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2042">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_max_payload_size_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *dest_address,
    UINT if_index,
    UINT src_port,
    UINT dest_port,
    ULONG protocol,
    ULONG *start_offset_ptr,
    ULONG *payload_length_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2043">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2043">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2044">Den här tjänsten hittar den maximala storleken för program nytto last som inte kräver IP-fragmentering för att uppnå målet. t. ex. är nytto lasten i eller unders tiger den lokala gränssnittets MTU-storlek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2044">This service finds the maximum application payload size that will not require IP fragmentation to reach the destination; e.g., payload is at or below the local interface MTU size.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2045">(eller MTU-värdet för sökvägen som hämtats via IPv6-sökvägens MTU-identifiering).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2045">(or the Path MTU value obtained via IPv6 Path MTU discovery).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2046">IP-huvud och övre program huvud storlek (TCP eller UDP) subtraheras från den totala nytto lasten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2046">IP header and upper application header size (TCP or UDP) are subtracted from the total payload.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2047">Om NetX Duo IPsec-säkerhetsprincipen gäller för den här slut punkten, så subtraheras IPsec-huvudena (ESP/AH) och tillhör ande kostnader, till exempel inledande vektor, även från MTU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2047">If NetX Duo IPsec Security Policy applies to this end-point, the IPsec headers (ESP/AH) and associated overhead, such as Initial Vector, are also subtracted from the MTU.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2048">Den här tjänsten gäller för både IPv4-och IPv6-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2048">This service is applicable for both IPv4 and IPv6 packets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2049">Parametern *if_index* anger det gränssnitt som ska användas för att skicka ut paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2049">The parameter *if_index* specifies the interface to use for sending out the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2050">För ett multihome-system måste anroparen ange *if_index* parametern om målet är en broadcast (endast IPv4), en multicast-eller IPv6-länk lokal adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2050">For a multihome system, the caller needs to specify the *if_index* parameter if the destination is a broadcast (IPv4 only), multicast, or IPv6 link-local address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2051">Den här tjänsten returnerar två värden till anroparen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2051">This service returns two values to the caller:</span></span>

1) <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2052">start_offset_ptr: det här är platsen efter TCP/UDP/IP/IPsec-huvudena;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2052">start_offset_ptr: This is the location after the TCP/UDP/IP/IPsec headers;</span></span>
2) <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2053">payload_length_ptr: mängden data program kan överföras utan att överskrida MTU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2053">payload_length_ptr: the amount of data application may transfer without exceeding MTU.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2054">Det finns ingen motsvarande NetX-tjänst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2054">There is no equivalent NetX service.</span></span>

### <a name="restrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2055">Begränsningar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2055">Restrictions</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2056">IP-instansen måste ha skapats tidigare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2056">The IP instance must be previously created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2057">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2057">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2058">**ip_ptr** Pekare till IP-instans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2058">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2059">**dest_address** Pekare till paketets mål adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2059">**dest_address** Pointer to packet destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2060">**if_index** Anger index för det gränssnitt som ska användas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2060">**if_index** Indicates the index of the interface to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2061">**src_port** Käll port nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2061">**src_port** Source port number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2062">**dest_port** Mål port nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2062">**dest_port** Destination port number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2063">**protokoll** Övre lager protokoll som ska användas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2063">**protocol** Upper layer protocol to be used</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2064">**start_offset_ptr** Pekar till början av data för högsta paket nytto Last</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2064">**start_offset_ptr** Pointer to the start of data for maximum packet payload</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2065">**payload_length_ptr** Pekare till nytto Last storlek exklusive sidhuvud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2065">**payload_length_ptr** Pointer to payload size excluding headers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2066">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2066">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2068">Gränssnitts indexet för **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) är ogiltigt eller så är gränssnittet ogiltigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2068">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is invalid, or the interface is not valid.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2070">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare eller ogiltig mål adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2070">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer, or invalid destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2071">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig adress angavs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2071">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid address supplied</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2072">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) ogiltigt protokoll (inte UDP eller TCP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2072">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Invalid protocol (not UDP or TCP)</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2078">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2078">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following example determines the maximum payload for UDP
   packet to remote host. */
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
status = nx_ip_max_payload_size_find(&ip_0,
                                     &dest_ipv6_address,
                                     PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                     source_port,
                                     dest_port, NX_PROTOCOL_UDP,
                                     &start_offset,
                                     &payload_length);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates the packet payload
   payload_length starting at the offset start_offset is
   successfully computed. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2103">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2103">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2104">Inaktivera sändning/mottagning av RAW-paket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2104">Disable raw packet sending/receiving</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2105">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2105">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2106">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2107">Den här tjänsten inaktiverar överföring och mottagning av obehandlade IP-paket för den här IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2107">This service disables transmission and reception of raw IP packets for this IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2108">Om RAW Packet service tidigare har Aktiver ATS och det finns RAW-paket i Receive-kön, kommer den här tjänsten att släppa eventuella mottagna rå paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2108">If the raw packet service was previously enabled, and there are raw packets in the receive queue, this service will release any received raw packets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2109">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2109">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2110">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2110">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2111">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2111">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2112">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) genomförde IP RAW-paket inaktivera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2112">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2113">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2113">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2114">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2114">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2115">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2116">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2116">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2117">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2117">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2118">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2118">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2119">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2119">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable raw packet sending/receiving for this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_disable(&ip_0);
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, raw IP packet sending/receiving has
   been disabled for the previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2129">nx_ip_raw_packet_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2129">nx_ip_raw_packet_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2130">Aktivera rå paket bearbetning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2130">Enable raw packet processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2131">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2131">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2132">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2132">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2133">Den här tjänsten möjliggör överföring och mottagning av RAW IP-paket för den här IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2133">This service enables transmission and reception of raw IP packets for this IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2134">Inkommande TCP-, UDP-, ICMP-och IGMP-paket bearbetas fortfarande av NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2134">Incoming TCP, UDP, ICMP, and IGMP packets are still processed by NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2135">Paket med okända protokoll typer för övre skikt bearbetas av rutinen för mottagning av rå paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2135">Packets with unknown upper layer protocol types are processed by raw packet reception routine.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2136">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2136">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2137">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2137">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2138">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2138">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2139">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckade IP RAW-paket aktivera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2139">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2140">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2140">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2141">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2141">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2142">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2142">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2143">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2143">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2144">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2144">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2145">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2145">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2146">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2146">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable raw packet sending/receiving for this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, raw IP packet sending/receiving has
   been enabled for the previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2156">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2156">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2157">Ange filter för RAW IP-paket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2157">Set raw IP packet filter</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2158">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2158">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT (*raw_packet_filter)(NX_IP *, ULONG, NX_PACKET *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2159">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2159">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2160">Den här tjänsten konfigurerar filtret för IP-rå paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2160">This service configures the IP raw packet filter.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2161">Funktionen RAW Packet filter, som implementeras av användar program, gör att ett program kan ta emot rå paket baserat på användar villkor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2161">The raw packet filter function, implemented by user application, allows an application to receive raw packets based on user-supplied criteria.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2162">Observera att NetX Duo BSD-skiktet använder funktionen RAW Packet filter för att hantera RAW socket i BSD-skiktet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2162">Note that NetX Duo BSD wrapper layer uses the raw packet filter feature to handle raw socket in the BSD layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2163">Om du vill använda den här tjänsten måste NetX Duo-biblioteket skapas med alternativet ***NX_ENABLE_IP_RAW_PACKET_FILTER*** definierat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2163">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IP_RAW_PACKET_FILTER*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2164">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2164">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2165">**ip_ptr** Pekare för IP Control Block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2165">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2166">**raw_packet_filter** Funktions pekare för RAW Packet filter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2166">**raw_packet_filter** Function pointer of the raw packet filter</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2167">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2167">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2168">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har ställt in rutinen för rå paket filter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2168">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the raw packet filter routine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2169">Stöd för **NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) för rå data är inte tillgängligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2169">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) Raw packet support is not available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2170">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare för IP Control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2170">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2171">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2171">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2172">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2172">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2173">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2173">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2174">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2174">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2175">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2175">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2176">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2176">Example</span></span>

```c
UINT raw_packet_filter(NX_IP *ip_ptr, ULONG protocol,
                       NX_PACKET *packet_ptr)
{

/* Simply filter protocol. */
if(protocol == NX_IP_RAW)
   return NX_SUCCESS;
else
   return NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL;
}

void raw_packet_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

/* Set the raw packet filter of IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set(&ip_0,
                                     raw_packet_filter);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the raw packet filter of IP instance
   was successfully set. */
}
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2186">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2186">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2187">Ta emot RAW IP-paket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2187">Receive raw IP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2188">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2188">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_receive(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2189">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2189">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2190">Den här tjänsten tar emot ett RAW IP-paket från den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2190">This service receives a raw IP packet from the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2191">Om det finns IP-paket i kön för mottagna obearbetade paket returneras det första (äldsta) paketet till anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2191">If there are IP packets on the raw packet receive queue, the first (oldest) packet is returned to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2192">Annars, om inga paket är tillgängliga, kan anroparen pausa så som anges av alternativet vänta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2192">Otherwise, if no packets are available, the caller may suspend as specified by the wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]   
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2193">*Om NX_SUCCESS returneras, ansvarar programmet för att släppa det mottagna paketet när det inte längre behövs*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2193">*If NX_SUCCESS, is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2194">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2194">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2195">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2195">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2196">**packet_ptr** Pekare till pekaren för att placera det mottagna RAW IP-paketet i.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2196">**packet_ptr** Pointer to pointer to place the received raw IP packet in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2197">**wait_option** Definierar hur tjänsten fungerar om paket inte är tillgängliga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2197">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if packets are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2198">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2198">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2199">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2199">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2200">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2200">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2201">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2201">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2202">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2202">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2203">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Det gick inte att ta emot IP RAW-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2203">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2204">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0X01) inget paket var tillgängligt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2204">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet was available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2205">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av ett anrop till tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2205">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2206">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2206">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2207">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP eller RETUR paket pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2207">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2208">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2208">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2209">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2209">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2210">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2210">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2211">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2211">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2212">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2212">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2213">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2213">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a raw IP packet for this IP instance, wait for a maximum
   of 4 timer ticks. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_receive(&ip_0, &packet_ptr, 4);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the raw IP packet pointer is in the
   variable packet_ptr. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2218">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2218">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2219">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2219">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2220">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2220">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2221">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2221">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2222">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2222">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2223">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2223">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2224">Skicka RAW IP-paket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2224">Send raw IP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2225">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2225">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG destination_ip,
    ULONG type_of_service);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2226">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2227">Den här tjänsten skickar ett RAW IPv4-paket till målets IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2227">This service sends a raw IPv4 packet to the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2228">Observera att den här rutinen returnerar omedelbart och är därför inte känd om IP-paketet faktiskt har skickats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2228">Note that this routine returns immediately, and it is therefore not known whether the IP packet has actually been sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2229">Nätverks driv rutinen kommer att ansvara för att släppa paketet när överföringen är klar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2229">The network driver will be responsible for releasing the packet when the transmission is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2230">För ett multihome-system använder NetX Duo målets IP-adress för att hitta ett lämpligt nätverks gränssnitt och använder gränssnittets IP-adress som käll adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2230">For a multihome system, NetX Duo uses the destination IP address to find an appropriate network interface and uses the IP address of the interface as the source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2231">Om mål-IP-adressen är broadcast eller multicast används det första giltiga gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2231">If the destination IP address is broadcast or multicast, the first valid interface is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2232">Programmen använder ***nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send*** i det här fallet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2232">Applications use the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send*** in this case.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2233">Om du vill skicka ett RAW IPv6-paket använder programmet tjänsten ***nxd_ip_raw_packet_send,** _ eller _ *_nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send._**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2233">To send a raw IPv6 packet, application shall use the service ***nxd_ip_raw_packet_send,** _ or _ *_nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send._**</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2234">*Om ett fel returneras ska programmet inte släppa paketet efter det här anropet. På så sätt kan oväntade resultat uppstå, eftersom nätverks driv rutinen kommer att släppa paketet efter överföringen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2234">*Unless an error is returned, the application should not release the packet after this call. Doing so will cause unpredictable results because the network driver will release the packet after transmission*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2235">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2235">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2236">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2236">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2237">**packet_ptr** Pekare till det RAW IP-paket som ska skickas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2237">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the raw IP packet to send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2238">**destination_ip** Målets IP-adress, som kan vara en speciell värd-IP-adress, en nätverks sändning, en intern loop eller en multicast-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2238">**destination_ip** Destination IP address, which can be a specific host IP address, a network broadcast, an internal loop-back, or a multicast address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2239">**type_of_service** Definierar typ av tjänst för överföringen, de juridiska värdena är följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2239">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2240">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2240">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2241">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2241">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2242">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2242">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2243">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2243">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2244">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2244">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2245">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2245">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2246">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckade IP RAW-paket sändning initierad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2246">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet send initiated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2247">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2247">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2248">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) RAW IP-funktionen är inte aktive rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2248">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP feature is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2249">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) ogiltig typ av tjänst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2249">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type of service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2250">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (protokollnumret 0x02) inte tillräckligt med utrymme för att lägga ett IP-huvud i paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2250">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room to prepend an IP header on the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2251">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) paket tilläggs pekare är ogiltig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2251">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2252">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-eller paket pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2252">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2253">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2253">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2254">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2254">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2255">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2255">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2256">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2256">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2257">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2257">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2258">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2258">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Send a raw IP packet to IP address 1.2.3.5. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr,
                               IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5),
                               NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the raw IP packet pointed to by
   packet_ptr has been sent. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2268">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2268">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2269">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2269">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2270">Skicka RAW IP-paket via angivet nätverks gränssnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2270">Send raw IP packet through specified network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2271">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2271">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG destination_ip,
    UINT address_index,
    ULONG type_of_service);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2272">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2272">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2273">Den här tjänsten skickar ett RAW IP-paket till mål-IP-adressen med den angivna lokala IPv4-adressen som käll adress och via det associerade nätverks gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2273">This service sends a raw IP packet to the destination IP address using the specified local IPv4 address as the source address, and through the associated network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2274">Observera att den här rutinen returnerar omedelbart och är därför inte känd om IP-paketet faktiskt har skickats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2274">Note that this routine returns immediately, and it is, therefore, not known if the IP packet has actually been sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2275">Nätverks driv rutinen kommer att ansvara för att släppa paketet när överföringen är klar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2275">The network driver will be responsible for releasing the packet when the transmission is complete.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2276">Den här tjänsten skiljer sig från andra tjänster eftersom det inte finns något sätt att veta om paketet faktiskt har skickats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2276">This service differs from other services in that there is no way of knowing if the packet was actually sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2277">Det kan gå förlorat på Internet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2277">It could get lost on the Internet.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2278">*Observera att RAW IP-bearbetning måste vara aktiverat*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2278">*Note that raw IP processing must be enabled*.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2279">*Den här tjänsten liknar **nx_ip_raw_packet_send,** förutom att den här tjänsten tillåter att ett program skickar obehandlade IPv4-paket från ett angivet fysiskt gränssnitt*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2279">*This service is similar to **nx_ip_raw_packet_send,** except that this service allows an application to send raw IPv4 packet from a specified physical interfaces*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2280">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2280">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2281">**ip_ptr** Pekare till en tidigare skapad IP-aktivitet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2281">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP task.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2282">**packet_ptr** Pekare till paket att överföra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2282">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2283">**destination_ip** IP-adress för att skicka paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2283">**destination_ip** IP address to send packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2284">**address_index** Index för den gränssnitts adress som paketet ska skickas till.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2284">**address_index** Index of the address of the interface to send packet out on.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2285">**type_of_service** Typ av tjänst för paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2285">**type_of_service** Type of service for packet.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2286">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2286">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2287">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) paket har skickats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2287">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet successfully transmitted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2288">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) inget lämpligt utgående gränssnitt är tillgängligt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2288">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) No suitable outgoing interface available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2289">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) RAW IP-paketfiltrering är inte aktiverat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2289">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP packet processing not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2290">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2290">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2291">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare inmatade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2291">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2292">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) ogiltig tjänst typ har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2292">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type of service specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2293">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) ogiltig lägga pekare för paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2293">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2294">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (protokollnumret 0x02) ogiltig lägga pekare för paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2294">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2295">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) ogiltigt gränssnitts index angavs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2295">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index specified.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2296">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2296">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2297">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2297">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2298">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2298">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2299">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2299">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2300">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2300">Example</span></span>

```c
#define ADDRESS_IDNEX 1

/* Send packet out on interface 1 with normal type of service. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send(ip_ptr, packet_ptr,
                                      destination_ip,
                                      ADDRESS_INDEX,
                                      NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the packet was successfully
   transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2310">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2310">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2311">Ange maximal storlek på rå mottagnings kön</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2311">Set maximum raw receive queue size</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2312">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2312">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG queue_max);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2313">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2313">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2314">Den här tjänsten konfigurerar det maximala djupet för mottagnings kön för IP-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2314">This service configures the maximum depth of the IP raw packet receive queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2315">Observera att kön för mottagna paket i RAW-paket delas med både IPv4-och IPv6-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2315">Note that the IP raw packet receive queue is shared with both IPv4 and IPv6 packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2316">När kön för mottagna köer når det maximala userconfigured-djupet, släpps nyligen mottagna obearbetade paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2316">When the raw packet receive queue reaches the userconfigured maximum depth, newly received raw packets are dropped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2317">Standardvärdet för mottagna köalias för IP RAW-paket är 20.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2317">The default IP raw packet receive queue depth is 20.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2318">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2318">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2319">**ip_ptr** Pekare för IP Control Block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2319">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2320">**queue_max** Nytt värde för kös Tor lek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2320">**queue_max** New value for the queue size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2321">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2321">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2322">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har ställt in högsta djup för mottagnings kön</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2322">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set raw receive queue maximum depth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare för IP Control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2325">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2325">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2326">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2326">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2327">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2327">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2328">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2328">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2329">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2329">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG queue_max = 10;

/* Set the maximum size of the IP raw packet receive queue. */
status = nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set (&ip_0,
                                          queue_max);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the maximum size of the IP raw packet
   receive queue was successfully set. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2336">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2336">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_static_route_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2339">nx_ip_static_route_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2339">nx_ip_static_route_add</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2340">Lägg till statisk väg i routningstabellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2340">Add static route to the routing table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2341">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2341">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_static_route_add(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG network_address,
    ULONG net_mask,
    ULONG next_hop);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2342">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2343">Den här tjänsten lägger till en post i tabellen för statisk routning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2343">This service adds an entry to the static routing table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2344">Observera att den *next_hop* adressen måste vara direkt åtkomlig från en av de lokala nätverks enheterna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2344">Note that the *next_hop* address must be directly accessible from one of the local network devices.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2345">*Observera att ip_ptr måste peka på en giltig netx Duo-IP-struktur och netx Duo-biblioteket måste skapas med NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING som har definierats för att använda den här tjänsten. Som standard har NetX Duo skapats utan att NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING definierats*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2345">*Note that ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure and the NetX Duo library must be built with NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined to use this service. By default NetX Duo is built without NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2346">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2346">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2347">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2347">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2348">**network_address** Mål nätverks adress, i byte ordning för värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2348">**network_address** Target network address, in host byte order</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2349">**net_mask** Mål nätverks mask, i byte ordning för värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2349">**net_mask** Target network mask, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2350">**next_hop** Nästa hopp adress för mål nätverket, i byte ordning för värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2350">**next_hop** Next hop address for the target network, in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2351">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2351">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2352">**NX_SUCCESSs** posten (0x00) läggs till i tabellen med statiska vägar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry is added to the static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2353">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) statisk routningstabell är full.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2353">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Static routing table is full.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2354">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) den här funktionen är inte kompilerad i.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2354">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) This feature is not compiled in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2355">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) nästa hopp är inte direkt tillgängligt via lokala gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2355">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Next hop is not directly accessible via local interfaces.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2356">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2356">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2357">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig ip_ptr pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2357">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2358">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2358">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2359">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2359">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2360">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2360">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2361">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2361">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2362">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2362">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Specify the next hop for 192.168.1.68 through the gateway
   192.168.1.1. */
status = nx_ip_static_route_add(ip_ptr, IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,0),
                                0xFFFFFF00UL,
                                IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,1));

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the route was successfully added to the
   static routing table. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_static_route_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2374">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2374">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2375">Ta bort statisk väg från routningstabell</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2375">Delete static route from routing table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2376">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2376">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_static_route_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG network_address,
    ULONG net_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2377">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2378">Den här tjänsten tar bort en post från tabellen för statisk routning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2378">This service deletes an entry from the static routing table.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2379">*Observera att ip_ptr måste peka på en giltig netx Duo-IP-struktur och netx Duo-biblioteket måste skapas med NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING som har definierats för att använda den här tjänsten. Som standard har NetX Duo skapats utan att NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING definierats*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2379">*Note that ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure and the NetX Duo library must be built with NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined to use this service. By default NetX Duo is built without NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2380">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2380">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2381">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2381">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2382">**network_address** Mål nätverks adress i byte ordning för värden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2382">**network_address** Target network address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2383">**net_mask** Mål nätverks mask i byte ordning för värden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2383">**net_mask** Target network mask, in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2384">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2384">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2385">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) borttagningen har slutförts från tabellen med statiska vägar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2385">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful deletion from the static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2386">Det går inte att hitta **NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43)-posten i routningstabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2386">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Entry cannot be found in the routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2387">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) den här funktionen är inte kompilerad i.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2387">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) This feature is not compiled in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2388">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig ip_ptr pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2388">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2389">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2389">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2390">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2390">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2391">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2391">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2392">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2392">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2393">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2393">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2394">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2394">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Remove the static route for 192.168.1.68 from the routing
   table.*/
status = nx_ip_static_route_delete(ip_ptr,
                                   IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,0),
                                   0xFFFFFF00UL,);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the route was successfully removed from
   the static routing table. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_status_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2406">nx_ip_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2406">nx_ip_status_check</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2407">Kontrol lera status för en IP-instans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2407">Check status of an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2408">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2408">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_status_check(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG needed_status,
    ULONG *actual_status,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2409">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2409">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2410">Den här tjänsten kontrollerar och väntar på den angivna statusen för det primära nätverks gränssnittet för en tidigare skapad IP-instans.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2410">This service checks and optionally waits for the specified status of the primary network interface of a previously created IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2411">För att få status för sekundära gränssnitt, ska program använda tjänsten ***nx_ip_interface_status_check.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2411">To obtain status on secondary interfaces, applications shall use the service ***nx_ip_interface_status_check.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2412">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2412">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2413">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2413">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2414">**needed_status** IP-status begärd, definierad i bit-Map-formulär enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2414">**needed_status** IP status requested, defined in bit-map form as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2415">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2415">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2416">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2416">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2417">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2417">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2418">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2418">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2419">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2419">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2420">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2420">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2421">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2421">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2422">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2422">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2423">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2423">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2424">**actual_status** Pekare till målet för faktisk BITS-uppsättning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2424">**actual_status** Pointer to destination of actual bits set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2425">**wait_option** Definierar hur tjänsten fungerar om de begärda status bitarna inte är tillgängliga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2425">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the requested status bits are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2426">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2426">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2427">**NX_NO_WAIT** 0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2427">**NX_NO_WAIT** 0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2428">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2428">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2429">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2429">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2430">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2430">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2431">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) kontroll av IP-status har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2431">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP status check.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2432">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0X43) status förfrågan uppfylldes inte inom den angivna tids gränsen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2432">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Status request was not satisfied within the timeout specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2433">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP-pekaren är eller har blivit ogiltig eller så är den faktiska status pekaren ogiltig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2433">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP pointer is or has become invalid, or actual status pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2434">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) ogiltigt status alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2434">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid needed status option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2436">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2436">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2437">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2437">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2438">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2438">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2439">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2439">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2440">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2440">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 10 ticks for the link up status on the previously created IP
   instance. */
status = nx_ip_status_check(&ip_0, NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED,
                            &actual_status, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link for the specified IP instance
   is up. */
```
