## <a name="nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2465">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2465">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2466">Ansluta IP-instans till angiven multicast-grupp via ett gränssnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2466">Join IP instance to specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2467">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2467">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2468">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2468">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2469">Den här tjänsten ansluter en IP-instans till den angivna multicast-gruppen via ett angivet nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2469">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2470">När IP-instansen ansluter till en multicast-grupp börjar IP Receive-logiken att vidarebefordra data paket från den ge multicast-gruppen till det övre skiktet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2470">Once the IP instance joins a multicast group, the IP receive logic starts to forward data packets from the give multicast group to the upper layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2471">Observera att den här tjänsten ansluter till en multicast-grupp utan att skicka IGMP-rapporter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2471">Note that this service joins a multicast group without sending IGMP reports.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2472">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2472">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2473">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2473">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2474">**group_address** Klass D IP multicast-gruppadress att ansluta till i värdens byte ordning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2474">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2475">**interface_index** Index för det gränssnitt som är kopplat till NetX Duo-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2475">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2476">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2476">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2477">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) multicast-gruppanslutningen är klar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2477">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2478">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Det går inte att ansluta fler multicast-grupper, maximalt antal har överskridits.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2478">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare till IP-instans eller så är IP-instansen ogiltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP instance, or the IP instance is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2481">**NX_NOT_EANABLED** (0X14) IGMP är inte aktiverat i den här IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2481">**NX_NOT_EANABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled in this IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2482">Den tillhandahållna **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) multicast-gruppadressen är inte en giltig klass D-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2482">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2483">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) enhets index pekar på ett ogiltigt nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2483">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2484">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2484">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2485">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2485">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2486">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2486">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2487">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2487">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2488">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2488">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance joins the multicast group
   224.0.0.200, via the interface at index 1 in the IP interface
   list. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join
                                 (&ip IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200),
                                  INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully joined
   the multicast group. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2494">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2494">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2495">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2495">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2496">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2496">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2497">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2497">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2498">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2498">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2499">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2499">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2500">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2500">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2501">Lämna den angivna multicast-gruppen via ett gränssnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2501">Leave specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2502">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2502">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2503">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2503">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2504">Den här tjänsten lämnar den angivna multicast-gruppen via ett angivet nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2504">This service leaves the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2505">När du har lämnat gruppen utlöser inte den här tjänsten IGMP-meddelanden som genereras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2505">After leaving the group, this service does not trigger IGMP messages being generated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2506">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2506">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2507">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2507">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2508">**group_address** Klass D IP multicast-gruppens adress att lämna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2508">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to leave.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2509">IP-adressen är i byte-ordning för värden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2509">The IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2510">**interface_index** Index för det gränssnitt som är kopplat till NetX Duo-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2510">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2511">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2511">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2512">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) multicast-gruppanslutningen är klar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2512">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2513">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0X16) Det gick inte att hitta den angivna multicast-gruppadressen i den lokala multicast-tabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2513">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) The specified multicast group address cannot be found in the local multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2514">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) enhets index pekar på ett ogiltigt nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2514">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2515">Den tillhandahållna **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) multicast-gruppadressen är inte en giltig klass D-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2515">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2516">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2516">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2517">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare till IP-instans eller så är IP-instansen ogiltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2517">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP instance, or the IP instance is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2518">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2518">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2519">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2519">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2520">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2520">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2521">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2521">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2522">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2522">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Leave the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave
                                (&ip, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200),
                                 INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully leaves
   the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2536">Allokera paket från angiven pool</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2536">Allocate packet from specified pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2537">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2537">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_allocate(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG packet_type,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2538">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2539">Den här tjänsten allokerar ett paket från den angivna poolen och justerar lägga-pekaren i paketet enligt den typ av paket som angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2539">This service allocates a packet from the specified pool and adjusts the prepend pointer in the packet according to the type of packet specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2540">Om inget paket är tillgängligt pausas tjänsten enligt det angivna vänte alternativet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2540">If no packet is available, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2541">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2542">**pool_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade lagringspoolen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2542">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2543">**packet_ptr** Pekare till pekaren över den allokerade paket pekaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2543">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the Pointer of the allocated packet Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2544">**packet_type** Definierar den typ av paket som begärs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2544">**packet_type** Defines the type of packet requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2545">Se "paket pooler" på sidan 63 i kapitel 3 för en lista över paket typer som stöds.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2545">See “Packet Pools” on page 63 in Chapter 3 for a list of supported packet types.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2546">**wait_option** Definierar vänte tiden i Tick om det inte finns några tillgängliga paket i modempoolen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2546">**wait_option** Defines the wait time in ticks if there are no packets available in the packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2547">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2547">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2550">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2550">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2551">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2551">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2552">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) paket tilldelningen lyckades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2552">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet allocate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0X01) inget paket tillgängligt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2554">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av ett anrop till tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2554">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2555">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERSs** paket storlek (0X4D) stöder inte protokollet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2555">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2556">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) ogiltig pakettyp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2556">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid packet type.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pool eller paket retur pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or packet return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltigt wait-alternativ från icke-tråd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2559">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2559">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2560">Initiering, trådar, timers och ISR: er (program nätverks driv rutiner).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2560">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2561">Alternativet wait måste vara *NX_NO_WAIT* när det används i ISR eller i timer-kontext.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2561">Wait option must be *NX_NO_WAIT* when used in ISR or in timer context.</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2562">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2562">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2563">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2563">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2564">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2564">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Allocate a new UDP packet from the previously created packet pool
   and suspend for a maximum of 5 timer ticks if the pool is
   empty. */
status = nx_packet_allocate(&pool_0, &packet_ptr,
                            NX_UDP_PACKET, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the newly allocated packet pointer is
   found in the variable packet_ptr. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_copy"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2578">nx_packet_copy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2578">nx_packet_copy</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2579">Kopiera paket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2579">Copy packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2580">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2580">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_copy(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **new_packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2581">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2581">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2582">Den här tjänsten kopierar informationen i det angivna paketet till ett eller flera nya paket som tilldelas från den angivna poolen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2582">This service copies the information in the supplied packet to one or more new packets that are allocated from the supplied packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2583">Om det lyckas returneras pekaren till det nya paketet i destinationen som **new_packet_ptr**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2583">If successful, the pointer to the new packet is returned in destination pointed to by **new_packet_ptr**.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2584">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2584">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2585">**packet_ptr** Pekare till käll paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2585">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2586">**new_packet_ptr** Pekar till målet där pekaren återgår till den nya kopian av paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2586">**new_packet_ptr** Pointer to the destination of where to return the pointer to the new copy of the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2587">**pool_ptr** Visar en pekare till den tidigare skapade Packet-poolen som används för att allokera ett eller flera paket för kopian.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2587">**pool_ptr** Pointer to the previously created packet pool that is used to allocate one or more packets for the copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2588">**wait_option** Definierar hur tjänsten väntar om det inte finns några tillgängliga paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2588">**wait_option** Defines how the service waits if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2589">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2589">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2592">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2592">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2593">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2593">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2594">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) paket kopiering har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2594">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2595">**NX_NO_PACKET** -paket (0x01) är inte tillgängligt för kopiering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2595">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Packet not available for copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2596">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0X12) tomt käll paket eller kopia misslyckades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2596">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Empty source packet or copy failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2597">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av ett anrop till tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2597">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2598">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERSs** paket storlek (0X4D) stöder inte protokollet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2598">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pool, paket eller destinations pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (protokollnumret 0x02) ogiltig lägga pekare för paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) ogiltig paket tilläggs pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet append pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ett wait-alternativ angavs i initiering eller i en ISR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) A wait option was specified in initialization or in an ISR.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2603">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2603">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2604">Initiering, trådar, timers och ISR: er</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2604">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2605">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2605">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2606">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2606">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2607">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2607">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET *new_copy_ptr;

/* Copy packet pointed to by "old_packet_ptr" using packets from
   previously created packet pool_0. */
status = nx_packet_copy(old_packet, &new_copy_ptr, &pool_0, 20);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, new_copy_ptr points to the packet copy. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_append"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2622">Lägg till data i slutet av paketet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2622">Append data to end of packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2623">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2623">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_append(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *data_start, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2624">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2624">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2625">Den här tjänsten lägger till data i slutet av det angivna paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2625">This service appends data to the end of the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2626">Det angivna data utrymmet kopieras till paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2626">The supplied data area is copied into the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2627">Om det inte finns tillräckligt med minne tillgängligt och funktionen länkat paket är aktive rad allokeras ett eller flera paket för att uppfylla begäran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2627">If there is not enough memory available, and the chained packet feature is enabled, one or more packets will be allocated to satisfy the request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2628">Om funktionen för länkat paket inte är aktive rad returneras *NX_SIZE_ERROR* .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2628">If the chained packet feature is not enabled, *NX_SIZE_ERROR* is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2629">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2629">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2630">**packet_ptr** Paket pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2630">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2631">**data_start** Pekar till början av användarens data områden som ska läggas till i paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2631">**data_start** Pointer to the start of the user’s data area to append to the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2632">**data_size** Storlek på användarens data områden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2632">**data_size** Size of user’s data area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2633">**pool_ptr** Pekare till Packet bassäng från vilken du vill allokera ett annat paket om det inte finns tillräckligt med utrymme i det aktuella paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2633">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool from which to allocate another packet if there is not enough room in the current packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2634">**wait_option** Definierar hur tjänsten fungerar om det inte finns några tillgängliga paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2634">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2635">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2635">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2638">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2638">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2639">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2640">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutfört paket tillägg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2640">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet append.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0X01) inget paket tillgängligt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av ett anrop till tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2643">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERSs** paket storlek (0X4D) stöder inte protokollet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2643">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2644">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (protokollnumret 0x02) lägga-pekaren är mindre än start av nytto Last.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2644">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2645">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) Lägg till-pekare är större än nytto Last slutet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2645">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pool, paket eller data pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or data Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2647">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0X09) ogiltig data storlek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2647">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid data size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltigt wait-alternativ från icke-tråd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2649">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2649">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2650">Initiering, trådar, timers och ISR: er (program nätverks driv rutiner)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2650">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2651">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2651">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2652">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2652">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2653">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2653">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Append "abcd" to the specified packet. */
status = nx_packet_data_append(packet_ptr, "abcd", 4, &pool_0, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the additional four bytes "abcd" have
   been appended to the packet. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_extract_offset"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2668">Extrahera data från paket via en förskjutning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2668">Extract data from packet via an offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2669">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2669">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_extract_offset(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG offset,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG buffer_length,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2670">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2670">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2671">Den här tjänsten kopierar data från ett NetX Duo-paket (eller paket kedja) som börjar vid den angivna förskjutningen från paketets lägga-pekare i byte till den angivna bufferten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2671">This service copies data from a NetX Duo packet (or packet chain) starting at the specified offset from the packet prepend pointer of the specified size in bytes into the specified buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2672">Antalet byte som faktiskt kopieras returneras i *bytes_copied.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2672">The number of bytes actually copied is returned in *bytes_copied.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2673">Den här tjänsten tar inte bort data från paketet eller justerar inte lägga-pekaren eller annan information om internt tillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2673">This service does not remove data from the packet, nor does it adjust the prepend pointer or other internal state information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2674">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2674">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2675">**packet_ptr** Pekare till paket att extrahera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2675">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2676">**förskjutning** Offset från den aktuella lägga-pekaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2676">**offset** Offset from the current prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2677">**buffer_start** Pekare till början av Spara buffert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2677">**buffer_start** Pointer to start of save buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2678">**buffer_length** Antal byte som ska kopieras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2678">**buffer_length** Number of bytes to copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2679">**bytes_copied** Antal byte som faktiskt har kopierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2679">**bytes_copied** Number of bytes actually copied</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2680">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2680">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2681">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) paket kopiering har slutförts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2681">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2682">**NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR** (0X53) ogiltigt offset-värde angavs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2682">**NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR** (0x53) Invalid offset value was supplied</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig paket pekare eller buffert pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer or buffer pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2684">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2684">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2685">Initiering, trådar, timers och ISR: er</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2685">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2686">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2686">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2687">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2687">No</span></span>

```c
/* Extract 10 bytes from the start of the received packet buffer
   into the specified memory area. */
status = nx_packet_data_extract_offset(my_packet, 0, &data[0], 10,
                                       &bytes_copied) ;
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, 10 bytes were successfully copied into
   the data buffer. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_retrieve"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2702">Hämta data från paket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2702">Retrieve data from packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2703">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2703">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_retrieve(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2704">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2705">Den här tjänsten kopierar data från det angivna paketet till den angivna bufferten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2705">This service copies data from the supplied packet into the supplied buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2706">Det faktiska antalet kopierade byte returneras i målet som pekas av **bytes_copied**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2706">The actual number of bytes copied is returned in the destination pointed to by **bytes_copied**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2707">Observera att den här tjänsten inte ändrar paketets interna tillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2707">Note that this service does not change internal state of the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2708">De data som hämtas är fortfarande tillgängliga i paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2708">The data being retrieved is still available in the packet.</span></span> 

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2709">*Måldomänkontrollanten måste vara tillräckligt stor för att rymma paketets innehåll. Om inte, kommer minnet att skadas orsaka oförutsägbara resultat*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2709">*The destination buffer must be large enough to hold the packet's contents. If not, memory will be corrupted causing unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2710">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2710">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2711">**packet_ptr** Pekare till käll paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2711">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2712">**buffer_start** Pekar till början av mellanlagringsområdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2712">**buffer_start** Pointer to the start of the buffer area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2713">**bytes_copied** Pekar mot målet för antalet kopierade byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2713">**bytes_copied** Pointer to the destination for the number of bytes copied.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2714">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2714">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2715">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) paket data hämtades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2715">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet data retrieve.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2716">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0X12) ogiltigt paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2716">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Invalid packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig paket, StartStart eller kopierade byte-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet, buffer start, or bytes copied pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2718">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2718">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2719">Initiering, trådar, timers och ISR: er</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2719">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2720">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2720">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2721">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2721">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2722">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2722">Example</span></span>

```c
UCHAR                 buffer[512];
ULONG                 bytes_copied;

/* Retrieve data from packet pointed to by "packet_ptr". */
status = nx_packet_data_retrieve(packet_ptr, buffer, &bytes_copied);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, buffer contains the contents of the
   packet, the size of which is contained in "bytes_copied." */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_length_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2737">Hämta längd på paket data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2737">Get length of packet data</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2738">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2738">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_length_get(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr, 
    ULONG *length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2739">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2739">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2740">Den här tjänsten hämtar längden på data i det angivna paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2740">This service gets the length of the data in the specified packet.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2741">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2741">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2742">**packet_ptr** Pekare till paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2742">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2743">**längd** Mål för paketets längd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2743">**length** Destination for the packet length.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2744">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2744">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2745">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) paket längden hämtades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2745">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet length get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig paket pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2747">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2747">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2748">Initiering, trådar, timers och ISR: er</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2748">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2749">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2749">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2750">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2750">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2751">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2751">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the length of the data in "my_packet." */
status = nx_packet_length_get(my_packet, &my_length);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, data length is in "my_length". */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2766">Skapa en modempool i angivet minnes området</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2766">Create packet pool in specified memory area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2767">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2767">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_create(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG payload_size,
    VOID *memory_ptr,
    ULONG memory_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2768">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2768">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2769">Den här tjänsten skapar en adresspool av den angivna paket storleken i det minnes utrymme som anges av användaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2769">This service creates a packet pool of the specified packet size in the memory area supplied by the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2770">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2770">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2771">**pool_ptr** Pekare till kontroll block för Packet-pool.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2771">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2772">**namn** Pekar till programmets namn för poolen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2772">**name** Pointer to application’s name for the packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2773">**payload_size** Antal byte i varje paket i poolen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2773">**payload_size** Number of bytes in each packet in the pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2774">Värdet måste vara minst 40 byte och måste också vara jämnt delbar med 4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2774">This value must be at least 40 bytes and must also be evenly divisible by 4.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2775">**memory_ptr** Pekar på minnes området för att placera mediepoolen i.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2775">**memory_ptr** Pointer to the memory area to place the packet pool in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2776">Pekaren ska vara justerad mot en ULONG-gränser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2776">The pointer should be aligned on an ULONG boundary.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2777">**memory_size** Storlek på poolens minnes området.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2777">**memory_size** Size of the pool memory area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2778">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2778">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2779">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) en paket bassäng har skapats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2779">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pool eller minnes pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0X09) ogiltigt block eller minnes storlek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid block or memory size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2783">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2783">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2784">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2784">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2785">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2785">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2786">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2786">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2787">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2787">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a packet pool of 32000 bytes starting at physical
   address 0x10000000. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, "Default Pool", 128,
                               (void *) 0x10000000, 32000);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet pool has been successfully
   created. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2802">Ta bort tidigare skapade paket pool</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2802">Delete previously created packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2803">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2803">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT  nx_packet_pool_delete(NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2804">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2804">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2805">Den här tjänsten tar bort en tidigare skapad paket pool.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2805">This service deletes a previously created packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2806">NetX Duo söker efter trådar som för närvarande är inaktiverade på paket i modempoolen och rensar uppskjutningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2806">NetX Duo checks for any threads currently suspended on packets in the packet pool and clears the suspension.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2807">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2807">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2808">**pool_ptr** Pekare för kontroll block för Packet-pool.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2808">**pool_ptr** Packet pool control block pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2809">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2809">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades ta bort paketets pool.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2811">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pool pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2811">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2813">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2813">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2814">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2814">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2815">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2815">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2816">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2816">Yes</span></span>

```c
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet pool has been successfully
   deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2832">Hämta information om en modempool</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2832">Retrieve information about a packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2833">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2833">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_info_get(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG *total_packets,
    ULONG *free_packets,
    ULONG *empty_pool_requests,
    ULONG *empty_pool_suspensions,
    ULONG *invalid_packet_releases);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2834">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2834">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2835">Den här tjänsten hämtar information om den angivna poolen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2835">This service retrieves information about the specified packet pool.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2836">*Om en mål pekare är NX_NULL returneras inte den informationen till anroparen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2836">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2837">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2838">**pool_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade lagringspoolen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2838">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2839">**total_packets** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet paket i poolen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2839">**total_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of packets in the pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2840">**free_packets** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet paket som för närvarande är kostnads fria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2840">**free_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of currently free packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2841">**empty_pool_requests** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet tilldelnings begär anden när poolen var tom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2841">**empty_pool_requests** Pointer to destination of the total number of allocation requests when the pool was empty.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet avstängningar av tomma pooler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** Pointer to destination of the total number of empty pool suspensions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet ogiltiga paket utgåvor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid packet releases.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2844">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2844">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2845">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) information om hämtning av paket bassäng lyckades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2845">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2848">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2849">Initiering, trådar och timers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2849">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2850">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2850">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2851">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2851">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2852">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2852">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve packet pool information. */
status = nx_packet_pool_info_get(&pool_0,
                                 &total_packets,
                                 &free_packets,
                                 &empty_pool_requests,
                                 &empty_pool_suspensions,
                                 &invalid_packet_releases);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, packet pool information was
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2867">Ange nedre gräns för paket pool</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2867">Set packet pool low watermark</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2868">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2868">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG low_watermark);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2869">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2869">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2870">Den här tjänsten konfigurerar den nedre vattenstämpeln för den angivna poolen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2870">This service configures the low watermark for the specified packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2871">När värdet för den nedre vattenstämpeln är inställt ställer TCP eller UDP inte upp de mottagna paketen om antalet tillgängliga paket i lagringspoolen är mindre än den nedre storleks gränsen för poolen, vilket förhindrar att modempoolen har paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2871">Once the low watermark value is set, TCP or UDP will not queue up the received packets if the number of available packets in the packet pool is less than the packet pool's low watermark, preventing the packet pool from being starved of packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2872">Den här tjänsten är tillgänglig om NetX Duo-biblioteket har skapats med alternativet ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** definierat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2872">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2873">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2873">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2874">**pool_ptr** Pekare till kontroll block för Packet-pool.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2874">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2875">**low_watermark** Lågt vatten märkes värde som ska konfigureras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2875">**low_watermark** Low watermark value to be configured</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2876">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2876">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett värdet för den nedre vattenstämpeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the low watermark value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) den nedre vattenstämpeln är inte inbyggd i netx Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The low watermark feature is not built into NetX Duo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pool pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2881">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2881">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2882">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2882">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2883">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2883">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2884">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2884">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2885">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2885">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set pool_0 low watermark value to 2. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, 2);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the low watermark value is set for
   pool_0.*/
```

## <a name="nx_packet_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2899">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2899">nx_packet_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2900">Frigör tidigare allokerat paket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2900">Release previously allocated packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2901">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2902">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2903">Den här tjänsten frigör ett paket, inklusive eventuella ytterligare paket som är länkade till det angivna paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2903">This service releases a packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2904">Om en annan tråd blockeras vid paket tilldelningen får den paketet och återupptas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2904">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2905">*Programmet måste förhindra att ett paket släpps mer än en gång, eftersom detta kan orsaka oförutsägbara resultat*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2905">*The application must prevent releasing a packet more than once, because doing so will cause unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2906">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2906">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2907">**packet_ptr** Paket pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2907">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2908">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2908">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) paket versionen har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig paket pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (protokollnumret 0x02) lägga-pekaren är mindre än start av nytto Last.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) Lägg till-pekare är större än nytto Last slutet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2913">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2913">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2914">Initiering, trådar, timers och ISR: er (program nätverks driv rutiner)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2914">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2915">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2915">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2916">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2916">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2917">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2917">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet. */
status = nx_packet_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet has been returned to the
   packet pool it was allocated from. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_transmit_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2932">Frisläpp ett överfört paket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2932">Release a transmitted packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2933">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2933">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_transmit_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2934">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2934">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2935">För icke-TCP-paket släpper den här tjänsten ett överfört paket, inklusive eventuella ytterligare paket som är länkade till det angivna paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2935">For non-TCP packets, this service releases a transmitted packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2936">Om en annan tråd blockeras vid paket tilldelningen får den paketet och återupptas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2936">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2937">För ett överfört TCP-paket markeras paketet som överfört, men släpps inte till paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2937">For a transmitted TCP packet, the packet is marked as being transmitted but not released till the packet is acknowledged.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2938">Den här tjänsten kallas vanligt vis för programmets nätverks driv rutin när ett paket har överförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2938">This service is typically called from the application's network driver after a packet is transmitted.</span></span>

> [!WARNING] 
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2939">*Nätverks driv rutinen bör ta bort det fysiska medie huvudet och justera Paketets längd innan du anropar den här tjänsten*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2939">*The network driver should remove the physical media header and adjust the length of the packet before calling this service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2940">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2940">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2941">**packet_ptr** Paket pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2941">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2942">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2942">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) utgåva av överförings paket lyckades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig paket pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (protokollnumret 0x02) lägga-pekaren är mindre än start av nytto Last.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) Lägg till-pekare är större än nytto Last slutet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2947">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2947">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2948">Initiering, trådar, timers, program nätverks driv rutiner (inklusive ISR: er)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2948">Initialization, threads, timers, Application network drivers (including ISRs)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2949">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2949">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2950">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2950">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2951">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2951">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet that was just transmitted
   from the application network driver. */
status = nx_packet_transmit_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the transmitted packet has been
   returned to the packet pool it was allocated from. */
```

## <a name="nx_rarp_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2965">nx_rarp_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2965">nx_rarp_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2966">Inaktivera RARP (reverse Address Resolution Protocol)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2966">Disable Reverse Address Resolution Protocol (RARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2967">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2967">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2968">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2968">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2969">Den här tjänsten inaktiverar RARP-komponenten för NetX Duo för den speciella IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2969">This service disables the RARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2970">För ett multihome-system inaktiverar den här tjänsten RARP på alla gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2970">For a multihome  system, this service disables RARP on all interfaces.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2971">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2971">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2972">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2972">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2973">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2973">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2974">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) RARP-inaktive ras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2974">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2975">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) RARP har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2975">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) RARP was not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2976">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2976">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2977">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2977">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2978">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2978">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2979">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2979">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2980">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2980">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2981">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2981">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2982">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2982">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable RARP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_rarp_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP is disabled. */
```
