## <a name="nx_rarp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2987">Aktivera omvänt adress matchnings protokoll (RARP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2987">Enable Reverse Address Resolution Protocol (RARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2988">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2988">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2989">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2989">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-2990">Den här tjänsten aktiverar RARP-komponenten för NetX Duo för den speciella IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2990">This service enables the RARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2991">RARP-komponenterna söker igenom alla anslutna nätverks gränssnitt för noll IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2991">The RARP components searches through all attached network interfaces for zero IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2992">En noll-IP-adress anger att gränssnittet inte har IP-adresstilldelning ännu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2992">A zero IP address indicates the interface does not have IP address assignment yet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2993">RARP försöker matcha IP-adressen genom att aktivera RARP-processen på det gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2993">RARP attempts to resolve the IP address by enabling RARP process on that interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2994">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2994">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2995">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2995">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-2996">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) RARP aktivera har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP-adressen är redan giltig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP address is already valid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) RARP har redan Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) RARP was already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3001">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3001">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3005">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3005">No</span></span>

## <a name="nx_rarp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3011">Hämta information om RARP-aktiviteter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3011">Retrieve information about RARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3012">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3012">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *rarp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *rarp_responses_received,
    ULONG *rarp_invalid_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3013">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3013">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3014">Den här tjänsten hämtar information om RARP-aktiviteter för den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3014">This service retrieves information about RARP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3015">*Om en mål pekare är NX_NULL returneras inte den informationen till anroparen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3015">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3016">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3016">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3017">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3017">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3018">**rarp_requests_sent** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet RARP-begäranden som skickats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3018">**rarp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP requests sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3019">**rarp_responses_received** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet RARP-svar som tagits emot.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3019">**rarp_responses_received** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet ogiltiga meddelanden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3021">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3022">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad RARP information hämtning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3022">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3025">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3025">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3026">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3026">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3027">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3027">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3028">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3028">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3029">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3029">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3030">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3030">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve RARP information from previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_rarp_info_get(&ip_0,
                          &rarp_requests_sent,
                          &rarp_responses_received,
                          &rarp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3075">Bind klient TCP-socket till TCP-port</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3075">Bind client TCP socket to TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3076">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3076">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3077">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3077">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3078">Den här tjänsten binder den tidigare skapade TCP-klientcachen till den angivna TCP-porten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3078">This service binds the previously created TCP client socket to the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3079">Giltiga TCP-Sockets sträcker sig från 0 till 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3079">Valid TCP sockets range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3080">Om den angivna TCP-porten inte är tillgänglig pausas tjänsten enligt det angivna vänte alternativet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3080">If the specified TCP port is unavailable, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3081">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3081">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3082">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade TCP-socket-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3082">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3083">**port port** nummer att binda (1 till 0xffff).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3083">**port Port** number to bind (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3084">Om Port numret är NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000) kommer IP-instansen att söka efter nästa lediga port och använda den för bindningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3084">If port number is NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000), the IP instance will search for the next free port and use that for the binding.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3085">**wait_option** Definierar hur tjänsten beter sig om porten redan är kopplad till en annan socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3085">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the port is already bound to another socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3086">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3086">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3089">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3089">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3090">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3090">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0X22) den här socketen är redan kopplad till en annan TCP-port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) This socket is already bound to another TCP port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3093">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** -porten (0x23) är redan kopplad till en annan socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3093">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) Port is already bound to a different socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0X45) ingen kostnads fri port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3095">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av ett anrop till tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3095">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3096">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0X46) ogiltig port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3096">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3098">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3098">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3101">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3101">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3102">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3102">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3103">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3103">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3104">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3104">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Bind a previously created client socket to port 12 and wait for 7
   timer ticks for the bind to complete. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(&client_socket, 12, 7);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created client_socket is
   bound to port 12 on the associated IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3129">Anslut klientens TCP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3129">Connect client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3130">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3130">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3131">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3131">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3132">Den här tjänsten ansluter den tidigare skapade och kopplade TCP-klientens socket till den angivna serverns port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3132">This service connects the previously created and bound TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3133">Giltiga TCP server-portar är mellan 0 och 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3133">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3134">Om anslutningen inte slutförs omedelbart pausas tjänsten enligt det angivna vänte alternativet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3134">If the connection does not complete immediately, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3135">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3136">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade TCP-socket-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3136">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3137">**server_ip** Serverns IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3137">**server_ip** Server’s IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3138">**SERVER_PORT** Server port nummer att ansluta till \* \* (1 till 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3138">**server_port** Server port number to connect to\*\* (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3139">**wait_option** Definierar hur tjänsten fungerar när anslutningen upprättas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3139">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3140">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3140">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3143">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3143">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3144">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3144">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) anslutningen lyckades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** -socketen (0x24) är inte kopplad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3147">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** -socketen (0x35) är inte i ett stängt tillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3147">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0X37) ingen väntan angavs, anslutnings försöket pågår.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, the connection attempt is in progress.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3149">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) ogiltigt gränssnitt har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3149">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface supplied.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3150">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av ett anrop till tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3150">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig Server-IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3152">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0X46) ogiltig port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3152">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3153">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3153">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3154">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3154">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3155">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3155">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3156">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3156">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3157">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3157">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3158">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3158">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3159">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3159">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3160">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3160">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Initiate a TCP connection from a previously created and bound
   client socket. The connection requested in this example is to
   port 12 on the server with the IP address of 1.2.3.5. This
   service will wait 300 timer ticks for the connection to take
   place before giving up. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(&client_socket,
                                      IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5),
                                      12, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created and bound
   client_socket is connected to port 12 on IP 1.2.3.5. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3185">Hämta port nummer kopplat till klienten TCP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3185">Get port number bound to client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3186">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3186">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT *port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3187">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3187">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3188">Den här tjänsten hämtar det port nummer som är associerat med socketen, vilket är användbart för att hitta den port som allokerats av NetX Duo i situationer där NX_ANY_PORT angavs vid den tidpunkt då socketen var kopplad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3188">This service retrieves the port number associated with the socket, which is useful to find the port allocated by NetX Duo in situations where the NX_ANY_PORT was specified at the time the socket was bound.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3189">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3190">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade TCP-socket-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3190">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3191">**port_ptr** Pekare till målet för retur port numret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3191">**port_ptr** Pointer to destination for the return port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3192">Giltiga port nummer är (1 till 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3192">Valid port numbers are (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3193">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3193">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3194">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) socket-bindning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3194">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3227">nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3227">nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3228">Bind TCP-klientens socket från TCP-port</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3228">Unbind TCP client socket from TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3229">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3229">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3230">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3230">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3231">Den här tjänsten frigör bindningen mellan TCP-klientens socket och en TCP-port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3231">This service releases the binding between the TCP client socket and a TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3232">Om det finns andra trådar som väntar på att binda en annan socket till samma port nummer, binds den första pausade tråden till den här porten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3232">If there are other threads waiting to bind another socket to the same port number, the first suspended thread is then bound to this port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3233">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3233">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3234">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade TCP-socket-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3234">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3235">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3235">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3236">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) uppkopplad socket-bindning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3236">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket unbind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3237">**NX_NOT_BOUND** -socketen var inte kopplad till någon port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3237">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3238">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** -socketen (0x35) har inte kopplats från.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3238">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket has not been disconnected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3239">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3239">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3240">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3240">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3241">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3241">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3242">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3243">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3243">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3244">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3244">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3245">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3245">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3246">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3246">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Unbind a previously created and bound client TCP socket. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind(&client_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is no longer
   bound. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3271">Aktivera TCP-komponenten NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3271">Enable TCP component of NetX Duo</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3272">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3272">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3273">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3273">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3274">Den här tjänsten aktiverar Transmission Control Protocol-komponenten (TCP) i NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3274">This service enables the Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) component of NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3275">När den har Aktiver ATS kan TCP-anslutningar upprättas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3275">After enabled, TCP connections may be established by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3276">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3276">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3277">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3277">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3278">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3278">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3279">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) TCP-aktivering har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3279">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) TCP har redan Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) TCP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3283">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3283">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3284">Initiering, trådar, timers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3284">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3285">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3285">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3286">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3286">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3287">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3287">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable TCP on a previously created IP instance ip_0. */
status = nx_tcp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP is enabled on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_free_port_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3312">Hitta nästa tillgängliga TCP-port</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3312">Find next available TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3313">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3313">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_free_port_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT port,
    UINT *free_port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3314">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3314">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3315">Den här tjänsten försöker hitta en kostnads fri TCP-port (obunden) med början från appens angivna port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3315">This service attempts to locate a free TCP port (unbound) starting from the application supplied port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3316">Sök logiken kommer att figursättas runt om sökningen sker för att uppnå det högsta port svärdet för 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3316">The search logic will wrap around if the search happens to reach the maximum port value of 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3317">Om sökningen lyckas returneras den kostnads fria porten i variabeln som pekar på *free_port_ptr*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3317">If  the search is successful, the free port is returned in the variable pointed to by *free_port_ptr*.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3318">*Den här tjänsten kan anropas från en annan tråd och har samma port returnerad. För att förhindra det här konkurrens tillståndet kanske programmet vill placera den här tjänsten och det faktiska klient-socket-bindningen under skyddet av en mutex*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3318">*This service can be called from another thread and have the same port returned. To prevent this race condition, the application may wish to place this service and the actual client socket bind under the protection of a mutex*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3319">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3319">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3320">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3320">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3321">**port** Port nummer för att starta sökningen vid (1 till 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3321">**port** Port number to start search at (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3322">**free_port_ptr** Pekar till målets lediga port retur värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3322">**free_port_ptr** Pointer to the destination free port return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3323">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3323">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3324">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) den kostnads fria porten hittades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3324">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful free port find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3325">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0X45) inga lediga portar hittades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3325">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free ports found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3326">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3326">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3327">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3327">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3328">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3328">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3329">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0X46) det angivna port numret är ogiltigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3329">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) The specified port number is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3330">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3330">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3331">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3331">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3332">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3332">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3333">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3333">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3334">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3334">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Locate a free TCP port, starting at port 12, on a previously
   created IP instance. */
status = nx_tcp_free_port_find(&ip_0, 12, &free_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, "free_port" contains the next free port
   on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3359">Hämta information om TCP-aktiviteter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3359">Retrieve information about TCP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3360">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3360">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_received,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *tcp_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *tcp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *tcp_connections,
    ULONG *tcp_disconnections,
    ULONG *tcp_connections_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_retransmit_packets);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3361">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3361">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3362">Den här tjänsten hämtar information om TCP-aktiviteter för den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3362">This service retrieves information about TCP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3363">*Om en mål pekare är NX_NULL returneras inte den informationen till anroparen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3363">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3364">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3364">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3365">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3365">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3366">**tcp_packets_sent** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet skickade TCP-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3366">**tcp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3367">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet TCP-byte som har skickats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3367">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3368">**tcp_packets_received** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet mottagna TCP-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3368">**tcp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3369">**tcp_bytes_received** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet mottagna TCP-byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3369">**tcp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3370">**tcp_invalid_packets** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet ogiltiga TCP-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3370">**tcp_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid TCP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3371">**tcp_receive_packets_dropped** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet TCP-mottagna paket som har tagits bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3371">**tcp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3372">**tcp_checksum_errors** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet TCP-paket med fel kontroll summor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3372">**tcp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets with checksum errors.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3373">**tcp_connections** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet TCP-anslutningar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3373">**tcp_connections** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP connections.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3374">**tcp_disconnections** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet TCP-anslutningar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3374">**tcp_disconnections** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP disconnections.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3375">**tcp_connections_dropped** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet avbrutna TCP-anslutningar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3375">**tcp_connections_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP connections dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3376">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet återsända TCP-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3376">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets retransmitted.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3377">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3377">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3378">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad hämtning av TCP-information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3378">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3379">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3379">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3380">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3380">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3381">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3381">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3382">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3382">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3383">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3383">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3384">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3384">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3385">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3385">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3386">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3386">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve TCP information from previously created IP Instance
   ip_0. */
status = nx_tcp_info_get(&ip_0,
                         &tcp_packets_sent,
                         &tcp_bytes_sent,
                         &tcp_packets_received,
                         &tcp_bytes_received,
                         &tcp_invalid_packets,
                         &tcp_receive_packets_dropped,
                         &tcp_checksum_errors,
                         &tcp_connections,
                         &tcp_disconnections
                         &tcp_connections_dropped,
                         &tcp_retransmit_packets);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_accept"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3411">Acceptera TCP-anslutning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3411">Accept TCP connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3412">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3412">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3413">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3413">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3414">Den här tjänsten accepterar (eller förbereder att godkänna) en begäran om TCP-anslutning till Socket för en port som tidigare har kon figurer ATS för lyssning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3414">This service accepts (or prepares to accept) a TCP client socket connection request for a port that was previously set up for listening.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3415">Den här tjänsten kan anropas omedelbart när programmet anropar lyssnings-eller återlyssnar-tjänsten eller efter att lyssnings rutinen för lyssning anropas när klient anslutningen faktiskt finns.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3415">This service may be called immediately after the application calls the listen or re-listen service or after the listen callback routine is called when the client connection is actually present.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3416">Om en anslutning inte kan upprättas direkt, pausas tjänsten enligt det angivna vänte alternativet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3416">If a connection cannot not be established right away, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3417">*Programmet måste anropa **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** när anslutningen inte längre behövs för att ta bort Server socketens bindning till Server porten*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3417">*The application must call **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** after the connection is no longer needed to remove the server socket's binding to the server port*.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3418">*Rutinen för återanrop av program anropas inifrån IP: s hjälp tråd*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3418">*Application callback routines are called from within the IP's helper thread*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3419">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3420">**socket_ptr** Pekar mot TCP-serverns socket Control-Block.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3420">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP server socket control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3421">**wait_option** Definierar hur tjänsten fungerar när anslutningen upprättas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3421">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3422">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3422">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3423">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3423">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3424">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3424">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3425">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3425">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3426">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3426">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3427">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad TCP-server-socket acceptera (passiv anslutning).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3427">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP server socket accept (passive connect).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3428">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0X36) den angivna Server-socketen är inte i ett lyssnings tillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3428">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) The server socket supplied is not in a listen state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3429">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0X37) ingen väntan angavs, anslutnings försöket pågår.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3429">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, the connection attempt is in progress.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3430">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av ett anrop till tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3430">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3431">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) socket Point-fel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3431">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Socket pointer error.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3432">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3432">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3433">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3433">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3435">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3435">Initialization, threads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3437">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3437">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3438">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3438">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{
    /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
    tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
    /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
       example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{
NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;
    /* Assuming that:
       "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an
        initial count of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the
        link is enabled "my_pool" packet pool has already been
        created
    */

    /* Create the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket,
                         "Port 12 Server Socket",
                          NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                          NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                          NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

    /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                port_12_connect_request);

    /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
       "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client and then disconnecting.*/
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
    {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
        request is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
           complete.*/
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

        /* Check for a successful connection. */
        if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
        {

            /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
               message */
            nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                         NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
            nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                  sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                  &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

            /* Check for an error. */
            if (status)
            {
               /* Error, release the packet. */
               nx_packet_release(my_packet);
            }

            /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called
            even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_listen"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3462">nx_tcp_server_socket_listen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3462">nx_tcp_server_socket_listen</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3463">Aktivera lyssning för klient anslutning på TCP-port</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3463">Enable listening for client connection on TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3464">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3464">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT port,
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT listen_queue_size,
    VOID (*listen_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3465">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3465">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3466">Med den här tjänsten kan du lyssna efter en klient anslutnings förfrågan på den angivna TCP-porten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3466">This service enables listening for a client connection request on the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3467">När en begäran om klient anslutning tas emot binds den angivna Server sockeln till den angivna porten och den angivna funktionen för lyssnings motringning anropas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3467">When a client connection request is received, the supplied server socket is bound to the specified port and the supplied listen callback function is called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3468">Bearbetningen av lyssnings rutinen för lyssning är helt upp i programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3468">The listen callback routine's processing is completely up to the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3469">Den kan innehålla logik för att väcka en program tråd som sedan utför en acceptera-åtgärd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3469">It may contain logic to wake up an application thread that subsequently performs an accept operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3470">Om programmet redan har en tråd inaktive rad för accepterad bearbetning för den här socketen kanske inte rutinen för lyssnings anrop behövs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3470">If the application already has a thread suspended on accept processing for this socket, the listen callback routine may not be needed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3471">Om programmet vill hantera ytterligare klient anslutningar på samma port måste ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** anropas med en tillgänglig socket (en socket i stängt tillstånd) för nästa anslutning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3471">If the application wishes to handle additional client connections on the same port, the ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** must be called with an available socket (a socket in the CLOSED state) for the next connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3472">Ytterligare klient anslutningar köas tills tjänsten relistener anropas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3472">Until the re-listen service is called, additional client connections are queued.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3473">När det maximala ködjup överskrids, släpps den äldsta anslutningsbegäran i stället för att köa den nya anslutningsbegäran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3473">When the maximum queue depth is exceeded, the oldest connection request is dropped in favor of queuing the new connection request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3474">Det maximala ködjup anges av den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3474">The maximum queue depth is specified by this service.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3475">*Rutinen för återanrop av program anropas från den interna IP-hjälpen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3475">*Application callback routines are called from the internal IP helper thread*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3476">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3477">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3477">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3478">**port** Port nummer att lyssna på (1 till 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3478">**port** Port number to listen on (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3479">**socket_ptr** Pekare till Socket som ska användas för anslutningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3479">**socket_ptr** Pointer to socket to use for the connection.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3480">**listen_queue_size** Antal klient anslutnings begär Anden som kan köas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3480">**listen_queue_size** Number of client connection requests that can be queued.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3481">**listen_callback** Program funktion som anropas när anslutningen tas emot.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3481">**listen_callback** Application function to call when the connection is received.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3482">Om du anger ett NULL-värde är funktionen lyssnande motringning inaktive rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3482">If a NULL is specified, the listen callback feature is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3483">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3483">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3484">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckade TCP-ports lyssning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3484">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP port listen enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3485">**NX_MAX_LISTEN** (0X33) inga fler lyssnar begär ande strukturer är tillgängliga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3485">**NX_MAX_LISTEN** (0x33) No more listen request structures are available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3486">Konstanten NX_MAX_LISTEN_REQUESTS i **_nx_api. h_** definierar hur många aktiva lyssnings begär Anden som är möjliga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3486">The constant NX_MAX_LISTEN_REQUESTS in **_nx_api.h_** defines how many active listen requests are possible.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3487">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0X35) den angivna Server socketen är inte i ett stängt tillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3487">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) The supplied server socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3488">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0X22) den angivna Server socketen är redan kopplad till en port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3488">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) The supplied server socket is already bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3489">**NX_DUPLICATE_LISTEN** (0X34) det finns redan en aktiv avlyssnings förfrågan för den här porten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3489">**NX_DUPLICATE_LISTEN** (0x34) There is already an active listen request for this port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3490">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0X46) ogiltig Port har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3490">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3492">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3492">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3493">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3493">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3498">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3498">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{
   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread.*/
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket.
   This example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{
NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;
   /* Assuming that:
      "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an
      initial count of 0 "my_ip" has already been created
      and the link is enabled "my_pool" packet pool has already
      been created.
   */

   /* Create the server socket. */
   nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server
                        Socket",
                        NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                        NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                        NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

   /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
   nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                               port_12_connect_request);

   /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
      "Hello_and_Goodbye" to
      each client and then disconnecting. */
   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
   {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
           request is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection
           to complete. */
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

        /* Check for a successful connection. */
           if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
        {

              /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
                 message. */
              nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                 NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

              /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
              nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                    sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                    &my_pool,
                                    NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {
                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

            /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }
         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called
            even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
         again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }
     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);
     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3522">nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3522">nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3523">Lyssna efter klient anslutning på TCP-port</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3523">Re-listen for client connection on TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3524">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3524">Prototype</span></span>

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3525">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3525">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3526">Den här tjänsten anropas efter att en anslutning har tagits emot på en port som tidigare har kon figurer ATS för lyssning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3526">This service is called after a connection has been received on a port that was setup previously for listening.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3527">Huvud syftet med den här tjänsten är att tillhandahålla en ny server-socket för nästa klient anslutning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3527">The main purpose of this service is to provide a new server socket for the next client connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3528">Om en anslutningsbegäran är i kö kommer anslutningen att bearbetas omedelbart under det här tjänst anropet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3528">If a connection request is queued, the connection will be processed immediately during this service call.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3529">*Samma återanrops rutin som anges av den ursprungliga lyssnar förfrågan kallas även när det finns en anslutning för denna nya server-socket*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3529">*The same callback routine specified by the original listen request is also called when a connection is present for this new server socket*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3530">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3530">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3531">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3531">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3532">**port** Port nummer att lyssna på igen (1 till 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3532">**port** Port number to re-listen on (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3533">**socket_ptr** Socket som ska användas för nästa klient anslutning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3533">**socket_ptr** Socket to use for the next client connection.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3534">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3534">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3535">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckade TCP-port-lyssna igen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3535">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP port re-listen.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3536">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0X35) den angivna Server socketen är inte i ett stängt tillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3536">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) The supplied server socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3537">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0X22) den angivna Server socketen är redan kopplad till en port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3537">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) The supplied server socket is already bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3538">**NX_INVALID_RELISTEN** (0X47) det finns redan en giltig socket-pekare för den här porten, eller så har den angivna porten ingen avlyssnings förfrågan aktiv.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3538">**NX_INVALID_RELISTEN** (0x47) There is already a valid socket pointer for this port or the port specified does not have a listen request active.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3539">**NX_CONNECTION_PENDING** (0X48) samma som NX_SUCCESS, förutom att det fanns en köade anslutningsbegäran och bearbetades under det här anropet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3539">**NX_CONNECTION_PENDING** (0x48) Same as NX_SUCCESS, except there was a queued connection request and it was processed during this call.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3540">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0X46) ogiltig Port har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3540">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3541">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-eller lyssnande återanrops pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3541">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or listen callback pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3542">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3542">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3543">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3543">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3548">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3548">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread.*/
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
      example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;

   /* Assuming that:
     "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial
     count of 0.
    "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled.
    "my_pool" packet pool has already been created. */

   /* Create the server socket. */
   nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server Socket",
                                 NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                                 NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                                 NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

   /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
   nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                               port_12_connect_request);

   /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
      "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client then disconnecting. */
   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
   {

       /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
          request is present. */
       tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

       /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
          complete. */
       status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

       /* Check for a successful connection. */
          if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
       {

             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
                message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                   sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                   &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is
            called even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```
