## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3572">nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3572">nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3573">Ta bort socket-associationen med lyssnings porten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3573">Remove socket association with listening port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3574">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3574">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3575">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3575">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3576">Den här tjänsten tar bort associationen mellan denna server-socket och den angivna Server porten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3576">This service removes the association between this server socket and the specified server port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3577">Programmet måste anropa tjänsten efter en från koppling eller efter ett misslyckat accept-anrop.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3577">The application must call this service after a disconnection or after an unsuccessful accept call.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3578">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3578">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3579">**socket_ptr** Pekare till tidigare konfigurerad server-socket-instans.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3579">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously setup server socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3580">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3580">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3581">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad Server-socket accepterades inte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3581">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful server socket unaccept.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3582">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36)-serverns socket är i ett felaktigt tillstånd och är förmodligen inte frånkopplad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3582">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) Server socket is in an improper state, and is probably not disconnected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3583">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3583">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3585">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3585">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3586">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3586">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3587">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3587">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3588">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3588">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3590">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3590">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL        my_pool;
NX_IP                 my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET         server_socket;
void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This example
   doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET  *my_packet;
UINT       status, i;

   /* Assuming that:
     "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial count
      of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled
     "my_pool" packet pool has already been created
   */

    /* Create the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server
                         Socket",NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                         NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,NX_NULL,
                         port_12_disconnect_request);

    /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                port_12_connect_request);

    /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending "Hello_and_Goodbye"
       to
       each client and then disconnecting. */
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
    {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection request
           is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
           complete.*/
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

       /* Check for a successful connection. */
          if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
       {
             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye" message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet,
                      "Hello_and_Goodbye",sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                      &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
       }

       /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called even
          if disconnect or accept fails. */
       nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

      /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket again. */
      nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
    }

    /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

    /* Delete the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3614">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3614">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3657">nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3657">nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3658">Hämtar antalet byte som är tillgängliga för hämtning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3658">Retrieves number of bytes available for retrieval</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3659">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3659">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *bytes_available);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3660">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3661">Den här tjänsten hämtar antalet byte som är tillgängliga för hämtning i den angivna TCP-socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3661">This service obtains the number of bytes available for retrieval in the specified TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3662">Observera att TCP-socketen måste vara ansluten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3662">Note that the TCP socket must already be connected.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3663">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3663">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3664">**socket_ptr** Pekare till tidigare skapad och ansluten TCP-socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3664">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created and connected TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3665">**bytes_available** Pekare till målet för tillgängliga byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3665">**bytes_available** Pointer to destination for bytes available.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3666">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3666">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3667">Tjänsten **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) har körts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3667">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Service executes successfully.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3668">Antalet byte som är tillgängliga för läsning returneras till anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3668">Number of bytes available for read is returned to the caller.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3669">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** -socketen (0x38) är inte i ett anslutet tillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3669">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is not in a connected state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3670">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltiga pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3670">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3671">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP är inte aktiverat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3671">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3672">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3672">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3673">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3673">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3674">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3674">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3675">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3675">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3677">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3677">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the bytes available for retrieval on the specified socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available(&my_socket,&bytes_available);

/* Is status = NX_SUCCESS, the available bytes is returned in
   bytes_available. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3701">nx_tcp_socket_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3701">nx_tcp_socket_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3702">Skapa TCP-klient eller Server-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3702">Create TCP client or server socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3703">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3703">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    CHAR *name, 
    ULONG type_of_service, 
    ULONG fragment,
    UINT time_to_live, 
    ULONG window_size,
    VOID (*urgent_data_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr),
    VOID (*disconnect_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3704">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3705">Den här tjänsten skapar en TCP-klient eller Server-socket för den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3705">This service creates a TCP client or server socket for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3706">*Rutinen för återanrop av program anropas från tråden som är kopplad till den här IP-instansen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3706">*Application callback routines are called from the thread associated with this IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3707">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3708">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3708">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3709">**socket_ptr** Pekare till nytt TCP socket Control-Block.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3709">**socket_ptr** Pointer to new TCP socket control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3710">**namn** Programmets namn för denna TCP-socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3710">**name** Application name for this TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3711">**type_of_service** Definierar typ av tjänst för överföringen, de juridiska värdena är följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3711">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3712">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3712">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3713">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3713">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3714">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3714">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3715">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3715">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3716">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3716">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3717">**fragment** Anger om IP-fragmentering tillåts eller inte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3717">**fragment** Specifies whether or not IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3718">Om NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY \* \* (0x0) anges tillåts IP-fragmentering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3718">If NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY\*\* (0x0) is specified, IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3719">Om NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) anges inaktive ras IP-fragmentering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3719">If NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) is specified, IP fragmenting is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3720">**time_to_live** Anger det 8-bitars värde som definierar hur många routrar det här paketet kan passera innan det utlöses.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3720">**time_to_live** Specifies the 8-bit value that defines how many routers this packet can pass before being thrown away.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3721">Standardvärdet anges av NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3721">The default value is specified by NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3722">**window_size** Definierar det maximala antalet byte som tillåts i mottagnings kön för denna socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3722">**window_size** Defines the maximum number of bytes allowed in the receive queue for this socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3723">**urgent_data_callback** Programfunktion som anropas när brådskande data identifieras i Receive-dataströmmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3723">**urgent_data_callback** Application function that is called whenever urgent data is detected in the receive stream.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3724">Om det här värdet är NX_NULL ignoreras brådskande data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3724">If this value is NX_NULL, urgent data is ignored.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3725">**disconnect_callback** Program funktion som anropas när en från koppling utfärdas av socketen i den andra änden av anslutningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3725">**disconnect_callback** Application function that is called whenever a disconnect is issued by the socket at the other end of the connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3726">Om det här värdet är NX_NULL inaktive ras funktionen för motringning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3726">If this value is NX_NULL, the disconnect callback function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3727">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3727">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3728">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) TCP-klient-socket har skapats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3728">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP client socket create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3729">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) ogiltigt alternativ för typ av tjänst, fragment, ogiltig fönster storlek eller tid tolive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3729">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type-of-service, fragment, invalid window size, or time-tolive option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-eller socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3732">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3732">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3733">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3733">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3734">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3734">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3735">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3735">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3736">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3736">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3737">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3737">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a TCP client socket on the previously created IP instance,
   with normal delivery, IP fragmentation enabled, 0x80 time to
   live, a 200-byte receive window, no urgent callback routine, and
   the "client_disconnect" routine to handle disconnection initiated
   from the other end of the connection. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_create(&ip_0, &client_socket,
                             "Client Socket",
                             NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                             0x80, 200, NX_NULL
                             client_disconnect);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is created and ready
   to be bound. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3761">nx_tcp_socket_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3761">nx_tcp_socket_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3762">Ta bort TCP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3762">Delete TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3763">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3763">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_delete(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3764">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3764">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3765">Den här tjänsten tar bort en tidigare skapad TCP-socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3765">This service deletes a previously created TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3766">Om socketen fortfarande är bunden eller ansluten, returnerar tjänsten en felkod.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3766">If the socket is still bound or connected, the service returns an error code.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3767">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3767">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3768">**socket_ptr** TCP-socket har skapats tidigare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3768">**socket_ptr** Previously created TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3769">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3769">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3770">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ta bort socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3770">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3771">Det gick inte att skapa **NX_NOT_CREATED** (0X27) socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3771">**NX_NOT_CREATED** (0x27) Socket was not created.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3772">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0X42) socket är fortfarande kopplad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3772">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) Socket is still bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3776">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3777">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3777">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3778">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3778">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3779">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3779">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3780">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3780">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created TCP client socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_delete(&client_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_disconnect"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3804">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3804">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3805">Koppla från klient-och Server anslutningar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3805">Disconnect client and server socket connections</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3806">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3806">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3807">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3807">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3808">Den här tjänsten kopplar från en upprättad klient eller Server-socket-anslutning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3808">This service disconnects an established client or server socket connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3809">En från koppling av en server-socket bör följas av en begäran om att ta emot begäran, medan en klient-socket som är frånkopplad är kvar i ett tillstånd som är redo för en annan anslutningsbegäran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3809">A disconnect of a server socket should be followed by an unaccept request, while a client socket that is disconnected is left in a state ready for another connection request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3810">Om från kopplings processen inte kan slutföras omedelbart pausas tjänsten enligt det angivna vänte alternativet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3810">If the disconnect process cannot finish immediately, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3811">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3811">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3812">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare anslutna klienten eller Server-socket-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3812">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3813">**wait_option** Definierar hur tjänsten fungerar när från koppling pågår.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3813">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the disconnection is in progress.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3814">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3814">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3815">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3815">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3816">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3816">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3817">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3817">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3818">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3818">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3819">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades socket från kopplingen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3819">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket disconnect.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3820">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) den angivna socketen är inte ansluten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3820">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Specified socket is not connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3821">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) från koppling pågår, ingen väntan har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3821">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) Disconnect is in progress, no wait was specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3822">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av ett anrop till tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3822">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3823">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3823">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3824">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3824">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3825">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3825">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3826">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3826">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3827">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3827">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3828">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3828">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3829">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3829">Yes</span></span> 

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3830">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3830">Example</span></span> 

```c
/* Disconnect from a previously established connection and wait a
   maximum of 400 timer ticks. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&client_socket, 400);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously connected socket (either
   as a result of the client socket connect or the server accept) is
   disconnected. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3854">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3854">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3855">Installera TCP från koppling Slutför meddela motringning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3855">Install TCP disconnect complete notify callback function</span></span>
 
### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3856">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3856">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_disconnect_complete_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3857">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3857">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3858">Den här tjänsten registrerar en callback-funktion som anropas när en socket-från koppling har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3858">This service registers a callback function which is invoked after a socket disconnect operation is completed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3859">Callback-funktionen för att koppla från TCP socket är tillgänglig om NetX Duo har skapats med alternativet ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** definierat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3859">The TCP socket disconnect complete callback function is available if NetX Duo is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3860">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3861">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare anslutna klienten eller Server-socket-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3861">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3862">**tcp_disconnect_complete_notify** Motringningsfunktionen som ska installeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3862">**tcp_disconnect_complete_notify** The callback function to be installed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3863">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3863">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3864">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) registrerade återanrops funktionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3864">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully registered the callback function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3865">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) funktionen för utökad avisering är inte inbyggd i netx Duo Library NX_PTR_ERROR \* \* (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3865">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The extended notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library NX_PTR_ERROR\*\* (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3866">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3866">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3867">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP-funktionen är inte aktive rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3867">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3885">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3885">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3886">Ange TCP-upprättning av funktionen meddela motringning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3886">Set TCP establish notify callback function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3887">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3887">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_establish_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3888">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3888">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3889">Den här tjänsten registrerar en callback-funktion som anropas när en TCP-socket upprättar en anslutning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3889">This service registers a callback function, which is called after a TCP socket makes a connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3890">TCP-socketen för att skapa en motringning är tillgänglig om NetX Duo har skapats med alternativet ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** definierat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3890">The TCP socket establish callback function is available if NetX Duo is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3891">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3892">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare anslutna klienten eller Server-socket-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3892">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3893">**tcp_establish_notify** Callback-funktionen anropas efter att en TCP-anslutning har upprättats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3893">**tcp_establish_notify** Callback function invoked after a TCP connection is established.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3894">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3894">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3895">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett funktionen notify.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3895">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully sets the notify function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3896">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) funktionen för utökad avisering är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3896">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The extended notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3897">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3897">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3898">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3898">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3899">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP har inte Aktiver ATS av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3899">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP has not been enabled by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3900">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3900">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3901">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3901">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3902">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3902">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3903">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3903">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3904">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3904">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the function pointer "callback" as the notify function NetX
   Duo will call when the connection is in the established state. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify(&client_socket, callback);
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3918">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3918">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3919">Hämta information om TCP-socket-aktiviteter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3919">Retrieve information about TCP socket activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3920">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3920">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_info_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_received,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *tcp_retransmit_packets,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_queued,
    ULONG *tcp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *tcp_socket_state,
    ULONG *tcp_transmit_queue_depth,
    ULONG *tcp_transmit_window,
    ULONG *tcp_receive_window);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3921">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3921">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3922">Den här tjänsten hämtar information om TCP-socket-aktiviteter för den angivna TCP socket-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3922">This service retrieves information about TCP socket activities for the specified TCP socket instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3923">*Om en mål pekare är NX_NULL returneras inte den informationen till anroparen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3923">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3924">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3924">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3925">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade TCP-socket-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3925">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3926">**tcp_packets_sent** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet TCP-paket som skickats på socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3926">**tcp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP packets sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3927">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet TCP-byte som skickats på socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3927">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP bytes sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3928">**tcp_packets_received** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet TCP-paket som tagits emot på socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3928">**tcp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3929">**tcp_bytes_received** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet TCP-byte som tagits emot vid socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3929">**tcp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP bytes received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3930">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet återöverföringar av TCP-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3930">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packet retransmissions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3931">**tcp_packets_queued** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet köade TCP-paket på socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3931">**tcp_packets_queued** Pointer to destination of the total number of queued TCP packets on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3932">**tcp_checksum_errors** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet TCP-paket med fel kontroll summor på socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3932">**tcp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets with checksum errors on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3933">**tcp_socket_state** Pekare till målet för socketens aktuella tillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3933">**tcp_socket_state** Pointer to destination of the socket’s current state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3934">**tcp_transmit_queue_depth** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet överförings paket som fortfarande står i kö i väntan på bekräftelse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3934">**tcp_transmit_queue_depth** Pointer to destination of the total number of transmit packets still queued waiting for ACK.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3935">**tcp_transmit_window** Pekare till målet för den aktuella överförings fönster storleken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3935">**tcp_transmit_window** Pointer to destination of the current transmit window size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3936">**tcp_receive_window** Pekare till målet för den aktuella storleken för mottagnings fönster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3936">**tcp_receive_window** Pointer to destination of the current receive window size.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3937">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3937">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3938">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades Hämta TCP-socket-information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3938">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP socket information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3939">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3939">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3940">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3940">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3941">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3941">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3942">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3942">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3943">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3943">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3944">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3944">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3945">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3945">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3946">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3946">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve TCP socket information from previously created
   socket_0.*/
status = nx_tcp_socket_info_get(&socket_0,
                                &tcp_packets_sent,
                                &tcp_bytes_sent,
                                &tcp_packets_received,
                                &tcp_bytes_received,
                                &tcp_retransmit_packets,
                                &tcp_packets_queued,
                                &tcp_checksum_errors,
                                &tcp_socket_state,
                                &tcp_transmit_queue_depth,
                                &tcp_transmit_window,
                                &tcp_receive_window);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP socket information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3970">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3970">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3971">Hämta MSS för socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3971">Get MSS of socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3972">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3972">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    ULONG *mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3973">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3973">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3974">Den här tjänsten hämtar den angivna socketens lokala maximala segment storlek (MSS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3974">This service retrieves the specified socket's local Maximum Segment Size (MSS).</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3975">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3975">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3976">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3976">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3977">**MSS** Mål för returnerad MSS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3977">**mss** Destination for returning MSS.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3978">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3978">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3979">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) godkänd MSS Hämta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3979">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful MSS get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3980">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig mål pekare för socket eller MSS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3980">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or MSS destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3981">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP är inte aktiverat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3981">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-3982">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) anroparen är inte en tråd eller initiering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3982">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3983">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3983">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3984">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3984">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3985">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3985">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-3986">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3986">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-3987">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-3987">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the MSS for the socket "my_socket". */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_get(&my_socket, &mss_value);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "mss_value" variable contains the
   socket's current MSS value. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4001">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4001">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4002">Hämta MSS för peer TCP-socketen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4002">Get MSS of the peer TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4003">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4003">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4004">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4004">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4005">Den här tjänsten hämtar den maximala segment storleken (MSS) som annonseras av peer-socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4005">This service retrieves the Maximum Segment Size (MSS) advertised by the peer socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4006">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4006">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4007">**socket_ptr** Pekare till tidigare skapad och ansluten socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4007">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created and connected socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4008">**MSS** Mål för att returnera MSS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4008">**mss** Destination for returning the MSS.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4009">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4009">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4010">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad peer-MSS Hämta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4010">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful peer MSS get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4011">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig mål pekare för socket eller MSS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4011">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or MSS destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4012">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP är inte aktiverat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4012">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4013">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) anroparen är inte en tråd eller initiering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4013">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4014">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4014">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4015">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4015">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4016">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4016">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4017">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4017">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4018">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4018">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the MSS of the connected peer to the socket "my_socket". */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get(&my_socket, &mss_value);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "mss_value" variable contains the
   socket peer’s advertised MSS value. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4032">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4032">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4033">Ange MSS för socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4033">Set MSS of socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4034">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4034">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_set(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    ULONG mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4035">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4035">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4036">Den här tjänsten anger den angivna socketens största segment storlek (MSS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4036">This service sets the specified socket's Maximum Segment Size (MSS).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4037">Observera att MSS-värdet måste ligga inom nätverks gränssnittets IP-MTU, vilket ger utrymme för IP-och TCP-huvuden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4037">Note the MSS value must be within the network interface IP MTU, allowing room for IP and TCP headers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4038">Den här tjänsten ska användas innan en TCP-socket startar anslutnings processen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4038">This service should be used before a TCP socket starts the connection process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4039">Om tjänsten används när en TCP-anslutning har upprättats har det nya värdet ingen påverkan på anslutningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4039">If the service is used after a TCP connection is established, the new value has no effect on the connection.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4040">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4040">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4041">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4041">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4042">**MSS** Värdet för MSS som ska anges.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4042">**mss** Value of MSS to set.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4043">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4043">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4044">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) godkänd MSS-uppsättning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4044">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful MSS set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4045">Det angivna MSS-värdet för **NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) är för stort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4045">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Specified MSS value is too large.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4046">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0X38) TCP-anslutning har inte upprättats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4046">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) TCP connection has not been established</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4047">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4047">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4048">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP är inte aktiverat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4048">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4049">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) anroparen är inte en tråd eller initiering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4049">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4050">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4050">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4051">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4051">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4052">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4052">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4053">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4053">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4054">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4054">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the MSS of the socket "my_socket" to 1000 bytes. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_set(&my_socket, 1000);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the MSS of "my_socket" is 1000 bytes. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4068">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4068">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4069">Hämta information om peer TCP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4069">Retrieve information about peer TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4070">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4070">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *peer_ip_address,
    ULONG *peer_port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4071">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4072">Den här tjänsten hämtar peer-IP-adress och portinformation för den anslutna TCP-socket över IPv4-nätverket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4072">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over IPv4 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4073">Motsvarande tjänst som också stöder IPv6-nätverk är ***nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4073">The equivalent service that also supports IPv6 network is ***nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4074">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4074">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4075">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade TCP-socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4075">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4076">**peer_ip_address** Pekare till mål för peer-IP-adress i byte ordning för värden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4076">**peer_ip_address** Pointer to destination for peer IP address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4077">**peer_port** Pekar till mål för peer-portnummer i byte ordning för värden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4077">**peer_port** Pointer to destination for peer port number, in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4078">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4078">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4079">Tjänsten **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) har körts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4079">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Service executes successfully.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4080">Peer-IP-adress och port nummer returneras till anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4080">Peer IP address and port number are returned to the caller.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4081">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** -socketen (0x38) är inte i ett anslutet tillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4081">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is not in a connected state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltiga pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4083">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP är inte aktiverat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4083">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4084">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4084">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4085">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4085">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4086">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4086">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4087">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4087">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4088">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4088">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4089">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4089">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Obtain peer IP address and port on the specified TCP socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(&my_socket, &peer_ip_address,
                                     &peer_port);

/* If status = NX_SUCCESS, the data was successfully obtained. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4103">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4103">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4104">Ange aviserings funktionen för TCP-överförings kön</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4104">Set the TCP transmit queue notify function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4105">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4105">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set(
              NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
              VOID(*tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4106">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4107">Den här tjänsten anger aviserings funktionen för djup uppdatering i överförings kön som anges av programmet, som anropas när den angivna socketen fastställer att den har släppt paket från överförings kön, så att ködjup inte längre överskrider gränsen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4107">This service sets the transmit queue depth update notify function specified by the application, which is called whenever the specified socket determines that it has released packets from the transmit queue such that the queue depth is no longer exceeding its limit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4108">Om ett program skulle blockeras vid överföring på grund av ködjup, fungerar motringningsfunktionen som ett meddelande till programmet som det kan börja överföra igen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4108">If an application would be blocked on transmit due to queue depth, the callback function serves as a notification to the application that it may start transmitting again.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4109">Den här tjänsten är bara tillgänglig om NetX Duo-biblioteket har skapats med alternativet ***NX_ENABLE_TCP_QUEUE_DEPTH_UPDATE_NOTIFY*** definierat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4109">This service is available only if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_TCP_QUEUE_DEPTH_UPDATE_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4110">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4110">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4111">**socket_ptr** Pekare till Socket-strukturen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4111">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the socket structure</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4112">**tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify** Funktionen notify som ska installeras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4112">**tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify** The notify function to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4113">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4113">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4114">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har installerat funktionen meddela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4114">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed the notify function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4115">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) aviserings funktionen för TCP-socket-ködjup är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4115">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The TCP socket queue depth notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4116">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare till Socket Control-blocket eller funktionen notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4116">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to the socket control block or the notify function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4117">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4117">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4118">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP-funktionen är inte aktive rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4118">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4119">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4119">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4120">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4120">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4121">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4121">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4122">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4122">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4123">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4123">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* Notify the application to resume sending. */

}
/* Install the TCP transmit queue notify function .*/
status = nxd_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set(&tcp_socket,
                                  tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the callback function is successfully
   installed. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4137">nx_tcp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4137">nx_tcp_socket_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4138">Ta emot data från TCP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4138">Receive data from TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4139">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4139">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_receive(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4140">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4140">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4141">Den här tjänsten tar emot TCP-data från den angivna socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4141">This service receives TCP data from the specified socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4142">Om inga data har placerats i kö på den angivna socketen, pausas anroparen utifrån det angivna wait-alternativet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4142">If no data is queued on the specified socket, the caller suspends based on the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4143">*Om NX_SUCCESS returneras ansvarar programmet för att släppa det mottagna paketet när det inte längre behövs*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4143">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4144">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4144">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4145">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade TCP-socket-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4145">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4146">**packet_ptr** Pekare till TCP-paketfiltrering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4146">**packet_ptr** Pointer to TCP packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4147">**wait_option** Definierar hur tjänsten beter sig om data för närvarande finns i kö på denna socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4147">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if do data are currently queued on this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4148">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4148">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4149">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4149">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4150">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4150">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4151">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4151">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4152">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4152">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4153">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades ta emot socket-data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4153">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket data receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4154">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24)-socketen är inte kopplad än.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4154">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound yet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4155">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0X01) inga data togs emot.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4155">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No data received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4156">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av ett anrop till tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4156">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4157">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) socketen är inte längre ansluten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4157">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) The socket is no longer connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4158">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket eller RETUR paket pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4158">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or return packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4159">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4159">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4160">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4160">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4161">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4161">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4162">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4162">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4163">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4163">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4164">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4164">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4165">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4165">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a packet from the previously created and connected TCP
   client socket. If no packet is available, wait for 200 timer
   ticks before giving up. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_receive(&client_socket, &packet_ptr, 200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the received packet is pointed to by
   "packet_ptr". */
```
