## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4189">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4189">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4190">Meddela program om mottagna paket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4190">Notify application of received packets</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4191">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4191">Prototype</span></span>   

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    VOID (*tcp_receive_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4192">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4192">Description</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4193">Den här tjänsten konfigurerar funktionen ta emot aviserings funktion med återanrops funktionen som anges av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4193">This service configures the receive notify function pointer with the callback function specified by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4194">Den här återanrops funktionen anropas sedan när ett eller flera paket tas emot på socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4194">This callback function is then called whenever one or more packets are received on the socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4195">Om en NX_NULL-pekare har angetts inaktive ras funktionen notify.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4195">If a NX_NULL pointer is supplied, the notify function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4196">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4196">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4197">**socket_ptr** Pekare till TCP-socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4197">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4198">**tcp_receive_notify** Funktionen motringning till program som anropas när ett eller flera paket tas emot på socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4198">**tcp_receive_notify** Application callback function pointer that is called when one or more packets are received on the socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4199">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4199">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4200">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad socket Receive-avisering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4200">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket receive notify.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4201">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4201">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4202">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4202">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4203">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP-funktionen är inte aktive rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4203">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4204">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4204">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4205">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4205">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4206">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4206">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4207">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4207">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4208">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4208">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a receive packet callback function for the "client_socket"
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify(&client_socket,
                                      my_receive_notify);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, NetX Duo will call the function named
   "my_receive_notify" whenever one or more packets are received for
   "client_socket". */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4222">nx_tcp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4222">nx_tcp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4223">Skicka data via en TCP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4223">Send data through a TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4224">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4224">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_send(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4225">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4225">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4226">Den här tjänsten skickar TCP-data via en tidigare ansluten TCP-socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4226">This service sends TCP data through a previously connected TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4227">Om mottagarens senaste annonserade fönster storlek är mindre än den här begäran, så pausas tjänsten om den inte har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4227">If the receiver's last advertised window size is less than this request, the service optionally suspends based on the wait option specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4228">Den här tjänsten garanterar att inga paket data som är större än MSS skickas till IP-skiktet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4228">This service guarantees that no packet data larger than MSS is sent to the IP layer.</span></span> 

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4229">*Om ett fel returneras ska programmet inte släppa paketet efter det här anropet. Om du gör det kan det orsaka oförutsägbara resultat, eftersom nätverks driv rutinen även försöker frigöra paketet efter överföringen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4229">*Unless an error is returned, the application should not release the packet after this call. Doing so will cause unpredictable results because the network driver will also try to release the packet after transmission*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4230">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4231">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare anslutna TCP-socket-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4231">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4232">**packet_ptr** TCP data paket pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4232">**packet_ptr** TCP data packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4233">**wait_option** Definierar hur tjänsten fungerar om begäran är större än mottagarens fönster storlek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4233">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the request is greater than the window size of the receiver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4234">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4234">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4235">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4235">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4236">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4236">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4237">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4237">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4238">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4238">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) skickade socket-sändning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4240">**NX_NOT_BOUND** -socketen var inte kopplad till någon port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4240">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4241">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0X50) inget lämpligt utgående gränssnitt hittades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4241">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4242">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** -socketen (0x38) är inte längre ansluten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4242">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is no longer connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4243">**NX_WINDOW_OVERFLOW** -begäran (0x39) är större än mottagarens annonserade fönster storlek i byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4243">**NX_WINDOW_OVERFLOW** (0x39) Request is greater than receiver’s advertised window size in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4244">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av ett anrop till tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4244">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4245">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** -paketet (0x12) har inte allokerats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4245">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is not allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4246">**NX_TX_QUEUE_DEPTH** (0X49) högsta tillåtna djup för överförings kön har uppnåtts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4246">**NX_TX_QUEUE_DEPTH** (0x49) Maximum transmit queue depth has been reached.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4247">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) paket tilläggs pekare är ogiltig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4247">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4248">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4248">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4249">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4249">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4250">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4250">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4251">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (protokollnumret 0x02) paket lägga pekare är ogiltig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4251">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Packet prepend pointer is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4252">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4252">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4253">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4253">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4254">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4254">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4255">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4255">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4256">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4256">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Send a packet out on the previously created and connected TCP
   socket. If the receive window on the other side of the connection
   is less than the packet size, wait 200 timer ticks before giving
   up. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr, 200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet has been sent! */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_state_wait"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4280">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4280">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4281">Vänta tills TCP-socketen har angett ett angivet tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4281">Wait for TCP socket to enter specific state</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4282">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4282">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_state_wait(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT desired_state,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4283">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4283">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4284">Den här tjänsten väntar på att socketen ska ange önskat tillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4284">This service waits for the socket to enter the desired state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4285">Om socketen inte har önskat tillstånd pausas tjänsten enligt det angivna wait-alternativet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4285">If the socket is not in the desired state, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4286">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4286">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4287">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare anslutna TCP-socket-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4287">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4288">**desired_state** Önskat TCP-tillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4288">**desired_state** Desired TCP state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4289">Giltiga TCP-socket-tillstånd definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4289">Valid TCP socket states are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4290">**NX_TCP_CLOSED** (0x01)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4290">**NX_TCP_CLOSED** (0x01)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4291">**NX_TCP_LISTEN_STATE** (protokollnumret 0x02)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4291">**NX_TCP_LISTEN_STATE** (0x02)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4292">**NX_TCP_SYN_SENT** (0x03)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4292">**NX_TCP_SYN_SENT** (0x03)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4293">**NX_TCP_SYN_RECEIVED** (0x04)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4293">**NX_TCP_SYN_RECEIVED** (0x04)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4294">**NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED** (0x05)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4294">**NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED** (0x05)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4295">**NX_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT** (0x06)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4295">**NX_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT** (0x06)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4296">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_1** (0x07)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4296">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_1** (0x07)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4297">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_2** (0x08)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4297">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_2** (0x08)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4298">**NX_TCP_CLOSING** (0x09)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4298">**NX_TCP_CLOSING** (0x09)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4299">**NX_TCP_TIMED_WAIT** (0x0A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4299">**NX_TCP_TIMED_WAIT** (0x0A)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4300">**NX_TCP_LAST_ACK** (0x0B)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4300">**NX_TCP_LAST_ACK** (0x0B)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4301">**wait_option** Definierar hur tjänsten fungerar om det begärda läget inte finns.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4301">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the requested state is not present.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4302">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4302">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4303">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4303">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4304">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4304">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4305">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4305">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4306">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) tillstånd väntar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4306">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful state wait.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4307">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4307">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4308">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0X43) status finns inte inom angiven vänte tid.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4308">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) State not present within the specified wait time.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4309">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av ett anrop till tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4309">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4310">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4310">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4311">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4311">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4312">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) det önskade socket-läget är ogiltigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4312">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) The desired socket state is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4313">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4314">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4314">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4315">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4315">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4316">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4316">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4317">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4317">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 300 timer ticks for the previously created socket to enter
   the established state in the TCP state machine. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_state_wait(&client_socket,
                                  NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the socket is now in the established
   state! */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4341">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4341">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4342">Installera motringning för vänte läge med vänte tid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4342">Install callback for timed wait state</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4343">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4343">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_timed_wait_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4344">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4344">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4345">Den här tjänsten registrerar en callback-funktion som anropas när TCP-socketen är i vänte läge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4345">This service registers a callback function which is invoked when the TCP socket is in timed wait state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4346">Om du vill använda den här tjänsten måste NetX Duo-biblioteket skapas med alternativet ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY*** definierat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4346">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4347">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4347">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4348">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare anslutna klienten eller Server-socket-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4348">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4349">**tcp_timed_wait_callback** Funktionen vänte tid för motringning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4349">**tcp_timed_wait_callback** The timed wait callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4350">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4350">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4351">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) registrerar återanrops funktionens socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4351">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully registers the callback function socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4352">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) netx Duo Library skapas utan den utökade meddelande funktionen aktive rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4352">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) NetX Duo library is built without the extended notify feature enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP-funktionen är inte aktive rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4356">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4357">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4357">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4358">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4358">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4359">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4359">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4360">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4360">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Install the timed wait callback function */
nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback(&client_socket, callback);
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4374">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4374">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4375">Konfigurera överförings parametrar för socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4375">Configure socket's transmit parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4376">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4376">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG max_queue_depth,
    ULONG timeout,
    ULONG max_retries,
    ULONG timeout_shift);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4377">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4378">Den här tjänsten konfigurerar olika överförings parametrar för den angivna TCP-socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4378">This service configures various transmit parameters of the specified TCP socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4379">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4379">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4380">**socket_ptr** Pekare till TCP-socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4380">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4381">**max_queue_depth** Högsta antal paket som får placeras i kö för överföring.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4381">**max_queue_depth** Maximum number of packets allowed to be queued for transmission.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4382">**tids gräns** Antal ThreadX timer-Tick som en ACK väntar innan paketet skickas igen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4382">**timeout** Number of ThreadX timer ticks an ACK is waited for before the packet is sent again.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4383">**max_retries** Maximalt antal tillåtna försök.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4383">**max_retries** Maximum number of retries allowed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4384">**timeout_shift** Värde för att skifta tids gränsen för varje efterföljande försök.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4384">**timeout_shift** Value to shift the timeout for each subsequent retry.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4385">Värdet 0, resulterar i samma tids gräns mellan efterföljande försök.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4385">A value of 0, results in the same timeout between successive retries.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4386">Värdet 1, dubblar tids gränsen mellan återförsök.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4386">A value of 1, doubles the timeout between retries.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4387">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4387">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) konfiguration av överförings-socket har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit socket configure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4389">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4389">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4390">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) ogiltigt ködjup-alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4390">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid queue depth option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP-funktionen är inte aktive rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4394">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4394">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4395">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4395">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4397">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4397">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Configure the "client_socket" for a maximum transmit queue depth of
   12, 100 tick timeouts, a maximum of 20 retries, and a timeout double
   on each successive retry. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure(&client_socket,12,100,20,1);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the socket’s transmit retry has been
   configured. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4411">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4411">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4412">Meddela programmet om uppdateringar av fönster storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4412">Notify application of window size updates</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4413">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4413">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_window_update_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4414">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4414">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4415">Den här tjänsten installerar ett socket-fönster uppdatera motringning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4415">This service installs a socket window update callback routine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4416">Den här rutinen anropas automatiskt när den angivna socketen tar emot ett paket som anger en ökning av fönster storleken för fjärrvärden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4416">This routine is called automatically whenever the specified socket receives a packet indicating an increase in the window size of the remote host.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4417">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4417">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4418">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade TCP-socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4418">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4419">**tcp_window_update_notify** Callback-rutin som anropas när fönstrets storlek ändras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4419">**tcp_window_update_notify** Callback routine to be called when the window size changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4420">Värdet NULL inaktiverar uppdatering av fönster ändringar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4420">A value of NULL disables the window change update.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4421">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4421">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4422">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) återanrops rutinen är installerad på socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4422">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Callback routine is installed on the socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4423">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4423">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltiga pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4425">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP-funktionen är inte aktive rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4425">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4426">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4426">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4427">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4427">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4428">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4428">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4429">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4429">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4430">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4430">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the function pointer to the windows update callback after creating the
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set(&data_socket,
                                                my_windows_update_callback);

/* Define the window callback function in the host application. */
void my_windows_update_callback(&data_socket)
{

/* Process update on increase TCP transmit socket window size. */
   return;
}
```

## <a name="nx_udp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4444">nx_udp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4444">nx_udp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4445">Aktivera UDP-komponenten för NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4445">Enable UDP component of NetX Duo</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4446">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4446">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4447">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4447">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4448">Den här tjänsten aktiverar UDP-komponenten (User Datagram Protocol) för NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4448">This service enables the User Datagram Protocol (UDP) component of NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4449">När den har Aktiver ATS kan UDP-datagram skickas och tas emot av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4449">After enabled, UDP datagrams may be sent and received by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4450">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4450">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4451">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4451">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4452">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4452">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4453">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad UDP-aktivering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4453">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4454">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4454">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4455">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4455">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4456">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) den här komponenten har redan Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4456">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4457">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4457">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4458">Initiering, trådar, timers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4458">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4459">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4459">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4460">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4460">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4461">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4461">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable UDP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_udp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP is now enabled on the specified IP
   instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_free_port_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4484">nx_udp_free_port_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4484">nx_udp_free_port_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4485">Hitta nästa tillgängliga UDP-port</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4485">Find next available UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4486">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4486">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_free_port_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    UINT *free_port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4487">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4487">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4488">Den här tjänsten söker efter en kostnads fri UDP-port (obunden) med början från det angivna port numret för programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4488">This service looks for a free UDP port (unbound) starting from the application supplied port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4489">Sök logiken kommer att figursättas runt om sökningen når det högsta port svärdet för 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4489">The search logic will wrap around if the search reaches the maximum port value of 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4490">Om sökningen lyckas returneras den kostnads fria porten i variabeln som pekar på free_port_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4490">If the search is successful, the free port is returned in the variable pointed to by free_port_ptr.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4491">*Den här tjänsten kan anropas från en annan tråd och kan ha samma port som returneras. För att förhindra det här konkurrens tillståndet kanske programmet vill placera den här tjänsten och faktiskt socket-bindning under skyddet av en mutex*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4491">*This service can be called from another thread and can have the same port returned. To prevent this race condition, the application may wish to place this service and the actual socket bind under the protection of a mutex*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4492">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4492">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4493">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4493">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4494">**port** Port nummer för att starta sökning (1 till 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4494">**port** Port number to start search (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4495">**free_port_ptr** Pekar på den lediga portens retur variabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4495">**free_port_ptr** Pointer to the destination free port return variable.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4496">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4496">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4497">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) den kostnads fria porten hittades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4497">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful free port find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4498">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0X45) inga lediga portar hittades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4498">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free ports found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4500">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4500">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4501">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4501">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4502">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) det angivna port numret är ogiltigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4502">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Specified port number is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4503">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4503">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4504">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4504">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4505">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4505">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4506">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4506">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4507">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4507">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Locate a free UDP port, starting at port 12, on a previously
   created IP instance. */
status = nx_udp_free_port_find(&ip_0, 12, &free_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS pointer, "free_port" identifies the next
   free UDP port on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4530">nx_udp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4530">nx_udp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4531">Hämta information om UDP-aktiviteter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4531">Retrieve information about UDP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4532">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4532">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *udp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *udp_packets_received,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *udp_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *udp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *udp_checksum_errors);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4533">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4533">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4534">Den här tjänsten hämtar information om UDP-aktiviteter för den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4534">This service retrieves information about UDP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4535">*Om en mål pekare är NX_NULL returneras inte den informationen till anroparen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4535">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4536">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4536">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4537">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4537">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4538">**udp_packets_sent** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet skickade UDP-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4538">**udp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4539">**udp_bytes_sent** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet UDP-byte som har skickats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4539">**udp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4540">**udp_packets_received** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet mottagna UDP-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4540">**udp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4541">**udp_bytes_received** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet mottagna UDP-byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4541">**udp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4542">**udp_invalid_packets** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet ogiltiga UDP-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4542">**udp_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid UDP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4543">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet mottagna UDP-paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4543">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4544">**udp_checksum_errors** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet UDP-paket med fel kontroll summor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4544">**udp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets with checksum errors.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4545">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4545">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4546">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades hämtning av UDP-information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4546">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4547">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4547">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4548">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4548">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4549">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4549">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4550">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4551">Initiering, trådar och timers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4551">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4552">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4552">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4553">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4553">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4554">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4554">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve UDP information from previously created IP Instance
   ip_0. */
status = nx_udp_info_get(&ip_0, &udp_packets_sent,
                         &udp_bytes_sent,
                         &udp_packets_received,
                         &udp_bytes_received,
                         &udp_invalid_packets,
                         &udp_receive_packets_dropped,
                         &udp_checksum_errors);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_packet_info_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4577">nx_udp_packet_info_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4577">nx_udp_packet_info_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4578">Extrahera nätverks parametrar från UDP-paket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4578">Extract network parameters from UDP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4579">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4579">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_packet_info_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    UINT *protocol,
    UINT *port,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4580">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4580">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4581">Den här tjänsten extraherar nätverks parametrar, till exempel IPv4-adress, peer-portnummer, protokoll typ (den här tjänsten returnerar alltid UDP-typ) från ett paket som tas emot i ett inkommande gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4581">This service extracts network parameters, such as IPv4 address, peer port number, protocol type (this service always returns UDP type) from a packet received on an incoming interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4582">För att få information om ett paket som kommer från IPv4 eller IPv6-nätverk, ska programmet använda tjänsten ***nxd_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4582">To obtain information on a packet coming from IPv4 or IPv6 network, application shall use the service ***nxd_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4583">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4583">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4584">**packet_ptr** Pekar mot paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4584">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4585">**ip_address** Pekare till avsändar-IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4585">**ip_address** Pointer to sender IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4586">**protokoll** Pekare till protokoll (UDP).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4586">**protocol** Pointer to protocol (UDP).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4587">**port** Pekare till avsändarens port nummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4587">**port** Pointer to sender’s port number.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4588">**interface_index** Pekare för att ta emot gränssnitts index.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4588">**interface_index** Pointer to receiving interface index.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4589">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4589">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4590">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) paket gränssnitts data har extraherats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4590">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet interface data successfully extracted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4591">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** -paketet (0x12) innehåller ingen IPv4-ram.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4591">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet does not contain IPv4 frame.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4592">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltigt inmatade pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4592">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4593">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4593">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

```c
/* Extract network data from UDP packet interface.*/
status = nx_udp_packet_info_extract(packet_ptr, &ip_address,
                                     &protocol, &port,
                                     &interface_index);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet data was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4621">nx_udp_socket_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4621">nx_udp_socket_bind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4622">Bind UDP-socket till UDP-port</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4622">Bind UDP socket to UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4623">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4623">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_bind(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4624">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4624">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4625">Den här tjänsten binder den tidigare skapade UDP-socketen till den angivna UDP-porten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4625">This service binds the previously created UDP socket to the specified UDP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4626">Giltiga UDP-socketar sträcker sig från 0 till 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4626">Valid UDP sockets range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4627">Om det begärda port numret är kopplat till en annan socket, väntar den här tjänsten på den angivna tids perioden för att socketen ska kunna bindas från Port numret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4627">If the requested port number is bound to another socket, this service waits for specified period of time for the socket to unbind from the port number.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4628">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4628">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4629">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade UDP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4629">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4630">**port** Port nummer att binda till \* \* (1 till 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4630">**port** Port number to bind to\*\* (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4631">Om Port numret är NX_ANY_PORT \* \* (0x0000) kommer IP-instansen att söka efter nästa lediga port och använda den för bindningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4631">If port number is NX_ANY_PORT\*\* (0x0000), the IP instance will search for the next free port and use that for the binding.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4632">**wait_option** Definierar hur tjänsten beter sig om porten redan är kopplad till en annan socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4632">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the port is already bound to another socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4633">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4633">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4634">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4634">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4635">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4635">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4636">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4636">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4637">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4637">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4638">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) socket-bindning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4638">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4639">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0X22) den här socketen är redan kopplad till en annan port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4639">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) This socket is already bound to another port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4640">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** -porten (0x23) är redan kopplad till en annan socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4640">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) Port is already bound to a different socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4641">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0X45) ingen kostnads fri port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4641">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av ett anrop till tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4643">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0X46) ogiltig Port har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4643">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4644">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4644">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4645">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4645">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4646">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4646">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4647">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4647">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4648">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4648">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4649">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4649">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4650">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4650">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4651">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4651">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Bind the previously created UDP socket to port 12 on the
   previously created IP instance. If the port is already bound,
   wait for 300 timer ticks before giving up. */
status = nx_udp_socket_bind(&udp_socket, 12, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the UDP socket is now bound to
   port 12.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_bytes_available"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4674">nx_udp_socket_bytes_available</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4674">nx_udp_socket_bytes_available</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4675">Hämtar antalet byte som är tillgängliga för hämtning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4675">Retrieves number of bytes available for retrieval</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4676">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4676">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_bytes_available(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *bytes_available);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4677">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4677">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4678">Den här tjänsten hämtar antalet byte som är tillgängliga för mottagning i den angivna UDP-socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4678">This service retrieves number of bytes available for reception in the specified UDP socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4679">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4679">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4680">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade UDP-socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4680">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4681">**bytes_available** Pekare till målet för tillgängliga byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4681">**bytes_available** Pointer to destination for bytes available.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4682">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4682">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4683">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) hämtade bytes tillgängliga byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4683">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful bytes available retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4684">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** -socketen (0x43) är inte kopplad till en port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4684">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Socket not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4685">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltiga pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4685">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4686">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) UDP-funktionen är inte aktive rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4686">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP feature is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4687">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4687">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4688">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4688">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4689">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4689">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4690">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4690">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4691">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4691">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4692">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4692">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the bytes available for retrieval from the UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_bytes_available(&my_socket,
                                       &bytes_available);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the number of bytes was successfully
   retrieved.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4715">nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4715">nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4716">Inaktivera kontroll summa för UDP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4716">Disable checksum for UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4717">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4717">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4718">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4718">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4719">Den här tjänsten inaktiverar kontroll summan för att skicka och ta emot paket på den angivna UDP-socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4719">This service disables the checksum logic for sending and receiving packets on the specified UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4720">När logiken för kontroll summa är inaktive rad läses värdet noll in i UDP-huvudets fält för kontroll summa för alla paket som skickas via denna socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4720">When the checksum logic is disabled, a value of zero is loaded into the UDP header's checksum field for all packets sent through this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4721">Ett värde för en kontroll summa med noll värde i UDP-huvudet signalerar mottagaren om att kontroll summan inte har beräknats för det här paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4721">A zero-value checksum value in the UDP header signals the  receiver that checksum is not computed for this packet.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4722">Observera också att detta inte har någon påverkan om **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** och **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** definieras när UDP-paket tas emot och skickas,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4722">Also note that this has no effect if **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** and **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** are defined when receiving and sending UDP packets respectively,</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4723">Observera att den här tjänsten inte har någon inverkan på paket i IPv6-nätverket sedan UDP-kontrollsumma är obligatorisk för IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4723">Note that this service has no effect on packets on the IPv6 network since UDP checksum is mandatory for IPv6.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4724">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4724">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4725">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade UDP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4725">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4726">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4726">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) inaktive ring av kontroll summa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket checksum disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4728">**NX_NOT_BOUND** -socketen (0x24) är inte kopplad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4728">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4729">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4729">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4730">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4730">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4731">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4731">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4732">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4733">Initiering, trådar, timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4733">Initialization, threads, timer</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4734">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4734">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4735">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4735">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4736">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4736">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable the UDP checksum logic for packets sent on this socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, outgoing packets will not have a checksum
   calculated. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4759">nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4759">nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4760">Aktivera kontroll summa för UDP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4760">Enable checksum for UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4761">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4761">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4762">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4762">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4763">Den här tjänsten aktiverar den logiska kontroll summan för att skicka och ta emot paket på den angivna UDP-socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4763">This service enables the checksum logic for sending and receiving packets on the specified UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4764">Kontroll summan täcker hela UDP-dataområdet samt ett IP-huvud för pseudo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4764">The checksum covers the entire UDP data area as well as a pseudo IP header.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4765">Observera också att detta inte har någon påverkan om **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** och **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** definieras när UDP-paket tas emot och skickas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4765">Also note that this has no effect if **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** and **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** are defined when receiving and sending UDP packets respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4766">Observera att den här tjänsten inte har någon inverkan på paket i IPv6-nätverket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4766">Note that this service has no effect on packets on the IPv6 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4767">UDP-kontrollsumma är obligatorisk i IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4767">UDP checksum is mandatory in IPv6.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4768">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4768">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4769">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade UDP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4769">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4770">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4770">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4771">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Enabled-kontroll Summa aktivera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4771">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket checksum enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4772">**NX_NOT_BOUND** -socketen (0x24) är inte kopplad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4772">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4776">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4777">Initiering, trådar, timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4777">Initialization, threads, timer</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4778">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4778">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4779">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4779">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4780">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4780">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable the UDP checksum logic for packets sent on this socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, outgoing packets will have a checksum
   calculated. */
```
