## <a name="nx_udp_socket_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4803">nx_udp_socket_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4803">nx_udp_socket_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4804">Skapa UDP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4804">Create UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4805">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4805">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG type_of_service, 
    ULONG fragment,
    UINT time_to_live, 
    ULONG queue_maximum);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4806">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4806">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4807">Den här tjänsten skapar en UDP-socket för den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4807">This service creates a UDP socket for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4808">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4808">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4809">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4809">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4810">**socket_ptr** Pekar på ny Bloc för UDP-socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4810">**socket_ptr** Pointer to new UDP socket control bloc.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4811">**namn** Program namn för denna UDP-socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4811">**name** Application name for this UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4812">**type_of_service** Definierar typ av tjänst för överföringen, de juridiska värdena är följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4812">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4813">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4813">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4814">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4814">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4815">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4815">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4816">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4816">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4817">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4817">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4818">**fragment anger** om IP-fragmentering ska tillåtas eller inte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4818">**fragment Specifies** whether or not IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4819">Om NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY (0x0) anges tillåts IP-fragmentering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4819">If NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY (0x0) is specified, IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4820">Om NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) anges inaktive ras IP-fragmentering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4820">If NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) is specified, IP fragmenting is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4821">**time_to_live** Anger det 8-bitars värde som definierar hur många routrar det här paketet kan passera innan det utlöses.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4821">**time_to_live** Specifies the 8-bit value that defines how many routers this packet can pass before being thrown away.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4822">Standardvärdet anges av NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4822">The default value is specified by NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4823">**queue_maximum** Definierar det maximala antalet UDP-datagram som kan köas för denna socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4823">**queue_maximum** Defines the maximum number of UDP datagrams that can be queued for this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4824">När gränsen för kön har uppnåtts frigörs det äldsta UDP-paketet för varje nytt paket som togs emot.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4824">After the queue limit is reached, for every new packet received the oldest UDP packet is released.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4825">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4825">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4826">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Det gick inte att skapa UDP-socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4826">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4827">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) ogiltigt alternativ typ-of-service, fragment eller Time-to-Live.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4827">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type-of-service, fragment, or time-to-live option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4828">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-eller socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4828">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4829">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4829">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4830">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4830">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4831">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4831">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4832">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4832">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4833">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4833">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4834">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4834">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4835">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4835">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a UDP socket with a maximum receive queue of 30 packets.*/
status = nx_udp_socket_create(&ip_0, &udp_socket, "Sample UDP Socket",
                              NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY, 0x80,
                              30);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the new UDP socket has been created and
   is ready for binding. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4858">nx_udp_socket_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4858">nx_udp_socket_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4859">Ta bort UDP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4859">Delete UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4860">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4860">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_delete(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4861">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4861">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4862">Den här tjänsten tar bort en UDP-socket som skapats tidigare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4862">This service deletes a previously created UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4863">Om socketen var kopplad till en port måste socketen vara obunden först.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4863">If the socket was bound to a port, the socket must be unbound first.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4864">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4864">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4865">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade UDP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4865">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4866">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4866">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4867">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ta bort socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4867">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4868">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0X42) socket är fortfarande kopplad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4868">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) Socket is still bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4869">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4869">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4870">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4870">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4871">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4871">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4872">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4872">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4873">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4873">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4874">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4874">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4875">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4875">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4876">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4876">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_delete(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created UDP socket has
   been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4899">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4899">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4900">Hämta information om UDP-socket-aktiviteter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4900">Retrieve information about UDP socket activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4901">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_info_get(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *udp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *udp_packets_received,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *udp_packets_queued,
    ULONG *udp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *udp_checksum_errors);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4902">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4903">Den här tjänsten hämtar information om UDP-socket-aktiviteter för den angivna UDP-socket-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4903">This service retrieves information about UDP socket activities for the specified UDP socket instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4904">*Om en mål pekare är NX_NULL returneras inte den informationen till anroparen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4904">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4905">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4905">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4906">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade UDP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4906">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4907">**udp_packets_sent** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet UDP-paket som skickats på socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4907">**udp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP packets sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4908">**udp_bytes_sent** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet UDP-byte som skickats på socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4908">**udp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP bytes sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4909">**udp_packets_received** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet UDP-paket som tagits emot på socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4909">**udp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4910">**udp_bytes_received** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet UDP-byte som tagits emot vid socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4910">**udp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP bytes received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4911">**udp_packets_queued** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet köade UDP-paket på socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4911">**udp_packets_queued** Pointer to destination of the total number of queued UDP packets on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4912">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet UDP-mottagna paket som har tagits bort för socket på grund av att köns storlek överskrids.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4912">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP receive packets dropped for socket due to queue size being exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4913">**udp_checksum_errors** Pekare till målet för det totala antalet UDP-paket med fel kontroll summor på socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4913">**udp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets with checksum errors on socket.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4915">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades hämtning av UDP-socket-information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4915">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4916">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4916">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4917">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4917">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4918">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4918">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4923">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4923">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve UDP socket information from socket 0.*/
status = nx_udp_socket_info_get(&socket_0,
                                &udp_packets_sent,
                                &udp_bytes_sent,
                                &udp_packets_received,
                                &udp_bytes_received,
                                &udp_queued_packets,
                                &udp_receive_packets_dropped,
                                &udp_checksum_errors);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP socket information was retrieved.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_port_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4946">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4946">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4947">Hämta port nummer som är kopplat till UDP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4947">Pick up port number bound to UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4948">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4948">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_port_get(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT *port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4949">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4949">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4950">Den här tjänsten hämtar det port nummer som är associerat med socketen, vilket är användbart för att hitta den port som allokerats av NetX Duo i situationer där NX_ANY_PORT angavs vid den tidpunkt då socketen var kopplad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4950">This service retrieves the port number associated with the socket, which is useful to find the port allocated by NetX Duo in situations where the NX_ANY_PORT was specified at the time the socket was bound.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4951">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4951">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4952">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade UDP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4952">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4953">**port_ptr** Pekare till målet för retur port numret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4953">**port_ptr** Pointer to destination for the return port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4954">Giltiga port nummer är (1 – 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4954">Valid port numbers are (1- 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4955">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4955">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4956">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) socket-bindning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4956">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4957">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0X24) den här socketen är inte kopplad till någon port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4957">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) This socket is not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4958">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket pekare eller port retur pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4958">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer or port return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4959">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4959">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4960">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4960">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4961">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4961">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4962">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4962">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4963">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4963">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4964">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4964">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4965">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4965">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the port number of created and bound UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_port_get(&udp_socket, &port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the port variable contains the port this
   socket is bound to. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4988">nx_udp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4988">nx_udp_socket_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4989">Ta emot datagram från UDP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4989">Receive datagram from UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4990">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4990">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_receive(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4991">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-4992">Den här tjänsten tar emot ett UDP-datagram från den angivna socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4992">This service receives an UDP datagram from the specified socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4993">Om inget datagram har placerats i kö på den angivna socketen, pausas anroparen utifrån det angivna wait-alternativet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4993">If no datagram is queued on the specified socket, the caller suspends based on the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4994">*Om NX_SUCCESS returneras ansvarar programmet för att släppa det mottagna paketet när det inte längre behövs*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4994">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-4995">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4995">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4996">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade UDP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4996">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4997">**packet_ptr** Pekare till paket pekare för UDP-datagram.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4997">**packet_ptr** Pointer to UDP datagram packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4998">**wait_option** Definierar hur tjänsten fungerar om ett datagram inte är i kö för närvarande i kö.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4998">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if a datagram is not currently queued on this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-4999">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-4999">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5000">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5000">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5001">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5001">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5002">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5002">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5003">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5003">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5004">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades ta emot socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5004">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5005">**NX_NOT_BOUND** -socketen var inte kopplad till någon port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5005">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5006">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0X01) det fanns inget UDP-datagram att ta emot.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5006">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) There was no UDP datagram to receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5007">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av ett anrop till tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5007">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5008">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket eller paket retur pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5008">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or packet return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5009">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5009">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5010">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5010">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5011">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5011">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5012">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5012">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5013">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5013">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5014">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5014">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5015">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5015">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a packet from a previously created and bound UDP socket.
   If no packets are currently available, wait for 500 timer ticks
   before giving up. */
status = nx_udp_socket_receive(&udp_socket, &packet_ptr, 500);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the received UDP packet is pointed to by
   packet_ptr. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_receive_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5038">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5038">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5039">Meddela program om varje mottaget paket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5039">Notify application of each received packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5040">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5040">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_receive_notify(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*udp_receive_notify)(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5041">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5041">Description</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5042">Den här tjänsten ställer in en aviserings funktions pekare för funktionen motringning till funktionen motringning som anges av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5042">This service sets the receive notify function pointer to the callback function specified by the  application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5043">Den här återanrops funktionen anropas sedan när ett paket tas emot på socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5043">This callback function is then called whenever a packet is received on the socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5044">Om det finns en NX_NULL-pekare är funktionen Receive notify inaktive rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5044">If a NX_NULL pointer is supplied, the receive notify function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5045">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5045">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5046">**socket_ptr** Pekare till UDP-socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5046">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5047">**udp_receive_notify** Funktionen motringning till program som anropas när ett paket tas emot på socketen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5047">**udp_receive_notify** Application callback function pointer that is called when a packet is received on the socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5048">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5048">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5049">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har ställt in funktionen för mottagnings meddelande för socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5049">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set socket receive notify function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5050">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5050">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5051">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5051">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5052">Initiering, trådar, timers och ISR: er</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5052">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5053">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5053">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5054">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5054">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5055">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5055">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a receive packet callback function for the "udp_socket"
   socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_receive_notify(&udp_socket,
                                      my_receive_notify);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, NetX Duo will call the function named
   "my_receive_notify" whenever a packet is received for
   "udp_socket". */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5078">nx_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5078">nx_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5079">Skicka ett UDP-datagram</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5079">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5080">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5080">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address, 
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5081">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5081">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5082">Den här tjänsten skickar ett UDP-datagram via en tidigare skapad och kopplad UDP-socket för IPv4-nätverk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5082">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for IPv4 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5083">NetX Duo hittar en lämplig lokal IP-adress som käll adress baserat på mål-IP-adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5083">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5084">Om du vill ange ett särskilt gränssnitt och en käll-IP-adress ska programmet använda tjänsten  **nxd_udp_socket_source_send** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5084">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the  **nxd_udp_socket_source_send** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5085">Observera att den här tjänsten returnerar omedelbart oavsett om UDP-datagramet har skickats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5085">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5086">NetX Duo (IPv4/IPv6) motsvarande tjänst är ***nxd_udp_socket_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5086">The NetX Duo (IPv4/IPv6) equivalent service is ***nxd_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5087">Socketen måste vara kopplad till en lokal port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5087">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5088">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5088">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5089">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade UDP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5089">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5090">**packet_ptr** Paket pekare för UDP-datagram</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5090">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5091">**ip_address** Mål adress för IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5091">**ip_address** Destination IPv4 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5092">**port** Giltigt mål port nummer mellan 1 och 0Xffffffff) i värdens byte ordning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5092">**port** Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5093">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5093">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5094">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades UDP socket Send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5094">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5095">**NX_NOT_BOUND** -sockel (0x24) är inte kopplad till någon port</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5095">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5096">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) Det går inte att hitta något lämpligt utgående gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5096">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5097">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig Server-IP-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5097">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5098">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (protokollnumret 0x02) inte tillräckligt med utrymme för UDP-huvudet i paketet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5098">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5099">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) paket tilläggs pekare är ogiltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5099">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5100">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5100">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5101">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5101">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5102">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) UDP har inte Aktiver ATS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5102">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5103">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0X46) port numret är inte inom ett giltigt intervall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5103">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within a valid range</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5104">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5104">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5105">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5105">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5106">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5106">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5107">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5107">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5108">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5108">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IP address. */
server_address = IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5);

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nx_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                            server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the application successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to its peer. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5131">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5131">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5132">Skicka datagram via UDP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5132">Send datagram through UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5133">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5133">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_source_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    UINT port,
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5134">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5134">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5135">Den här tjänsten skickar ett UDP-datagram via en tidigare skapad och kopplad UDP-socket via nätverks gränssnittet med den angivna IP-adressen som käll adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5135">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket through the network interface with the specified IP address as the source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5136">Observera att tjänsten returnerar omedelbart, oavsett om UDP-datagramet har skickats eller inte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5136">Note that service returns immediately, regardless of whether or not the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5137">***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** fungerar för både IPv4-och IPv6-nätverk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5137">***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** works for both IPv4 and IPv6 networks.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5138">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5138">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5139">**socket_ptr** Socket för att överföra paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5139">**socket_ptr** Socket to transmit the packet out on.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5140">**packet_ptr** Pekare till paket att överföra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5140">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5141">**ip_address** Mål-IP-adress att skicka paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5141">**ip_address** Destination IP address to send packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5142">**port** Målport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5142">**port** Destination port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5143">**address_index** Index för den adress som är associerad med det gränssnitt som ska användas för att skicka paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5143">**address_index** Index of the address associated with the interface to send packet on.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5144">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5144">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5145">**NX_SUCCESSs** paket (0x00) har skickats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet successfully sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** -socketen (0x24) är inte kopplad till en port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5147">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5147">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5148">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) UDP-bearbetning är inte aktiverat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5148">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP processing not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5149">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5149">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5150">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) ogiltig paket tilläggs pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5150">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet append pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5151">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (protokollnumret 0x02) ogiltig lägga pekare för paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5151">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5152">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5152">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5153">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) ogiltigt adress index.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5153">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid address index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5154">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0X46) port numret överskrider det högsta port numret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5154">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number exceeds maximum port number.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5155">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5155">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5156">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5156">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5157">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5157">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5158">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5158">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5159">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5159">Example</span></span>

```c
#define ADDRESS_INDEX 1

/* Send packet out on port 80 to the specified destination IP on the
   interface at index 1 in the IP task interface list. */
status = nx_udp_socket_source_send(socket_ptr, packet_ptr,
                                   destination_ip, 80,
                                   ADDRESS_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet was successfully transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_unbind"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5182">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5182">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5183">Unbind UDP-socket från UDP-port</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5183">Unbind UDP socket from UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5184">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5184">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_unbind(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5185">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5185">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5186">Den här tjänsten frigör bindningen mellan UDP-socketen och en UDP-port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5186">This service releases the binding between the UDP socket and a UDP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5187">Alla mottagna paket som lagras i mottagnings kön frigörs som en del av Unbind-åtgärden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5187">Any received packets stored in the receive queue are released as part of the unbind operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5188">Om det finns andra trådar som väntar på att binda en annan socket till den obundna porten, binds den första pausade tråden till den nyligen obundna porten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5188">If there are other threads waiting to bind another socket to the unbound port, the first suspended thread is then bound to the newly unbound port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5189">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5190">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade UDP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5190">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5191">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5191">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5192">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) uppkopplad socket-bindning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5192">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket unbind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5193">**NX_NOT_BOUND** -socketen var inte kopplad till någon port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5193">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5194">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5194">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5195">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5195">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5196">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) den här komponenten har inte Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5196">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5197">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5197">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5198">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5198">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5199">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5199">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5200">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5200">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5201">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5201">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Unbind the previously bound UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_unbind(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously bound socket is now
   unbound. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_source_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5224">nx_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5224">nx_udp_source_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5225">Extrahera IP och skicka port från UDP-datagram</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5225">Extract IP and sending port from UDP datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5226">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_source_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address, 
    UINT *port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5227">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5228">Den här tjänsten extraherar avsändarens IP-adress och port nummer från IP-och UDP-huvudena för det angivna UDP-datagrammet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5228">This service extracts the sender's IP and port number from the IP and UDP headers of the supplied UDP datagram.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5229">Observera att tjänsten ***nxd_udp_source_extract*** fungerar med paket från antingen IPv4-eller IPv6-nätverk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5229">Note that the service ***nxd_udp_source_extract*** works with packets from either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5230">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5231">**packet_ptr** Paket pekare för UDP-datagram.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5231">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5232">**ip_address** Giltig pekare till variabeln returnera IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5232">**ip_address** Valid pointer to the return IP address variable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5233">**port** Giltig pekare till retur port-variabeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5233">**port** Valid pointer to the return port variable.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5234">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5234">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5235">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad käll-IP/port-extrahering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5235">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful source IP/port extraction.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5236">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0X12) det angivna paketet är ogiltigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5236">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) The supplied packet is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5237">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltigt paket eller IP-eller port mål.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5237">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet or IP or port destination.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5238">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5238">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5239">Initiering, trådar, timers, ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5239">Initialization, threads, timers, ISR</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5240">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5240">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5241">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5242">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract the IP and port information from the sender of the UPD packet. */
status = nx_udp_source_extract(packet_ptr, &sender_ip_address, &sender_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the sender IP and port information has been stored
   in sender_ip_address and sender_port respectively.*/
```

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5255">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5255">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5263">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5263">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nxd_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5265">nxd_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5265">nxd_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5266">Aktivera ICMPv4-och ICMPv6-tjänster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5266">Enable ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 Services</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5267">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5267">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5268">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5268">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5269">Den här tjänsten aktiverar både ICMPv4-och ICMPv6-tjänster och kan bara anropas efter att IP-instansen har skapats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5269">This service enables both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 services and can only be called after the IP instance has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5270">Tjänsten kan aktive ras antingen före eller efter att IPv6 är aktiverat (se *nxd_ipv6_enable*).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5270">The service can be enabled either before or after IPv6 is enabled (see *nxd_ipv6_enable*).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5271">ICMPv4-tjänsterna inkluderar ekobegäran/Reply.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5271">ICMPv4 services include Echo Request/Reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5272">ICMPv6-tjänster inkluderar ekobegäran/svar, Neighbor Discovery, dubblettidentifiering, upptäckt av router och tillstånds lös automatisk adress konfiguration.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5272">ICMPv6 services include Echo Request/Reply, Neighbor Discovery, Duplicate Address Detection, Router Discovery, and Stateless Address Auto-configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5273">IPv4-motsvarigheten i NetX är *nx_icmp_enable*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5273">The IPv4 equivalent in NetX is *nx_icmp_enable*.</span></span>

> [!NOTE] 
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5274">*Om IPv6-adressen konfigureras manuellt innan du aktiverar ICMPv6, omfattas inte den manuellt konfigurerade IPv6-processen för att identifiera en dubblett av adressen*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5274">*If the IPv6 address is manually configured prior to enabling ICMPv6, the manually configured IPv6 is not subject to Duplicate Address Detection process*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5275">*nx_icmp_enable* startar ICMP-tjänster enbart för IPv4-åtgärder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5275">*nx_icmp_enable* starts ICMP services for IPv4 operations only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5276">Program som använder ICMPv6-tjänster måste använda *nxd_icmp_enable* i stället för *nx_icmp_enable*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5276">Applications using ICMPv6 services must use *nxd_icmp_enable* instead of *nx_icmp_enable*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5277">Om du vill använda IPv6-Routerinbjudning och automatisk adress konfiguration för IPv6 måste ICMPv6 vara aktiverat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5277">To utilize IPv6 router solicitation and IPv6 stateless auto-address configuration, ICMPv6 must be enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5278">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5278">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5279">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5279">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5280">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5280">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5281">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) ICMP-tjänster har Aktiver ATS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5281">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ICMP services are successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5282">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5282">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5283">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5283">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5284">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5284">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5285">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5285">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5286">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5286">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5287">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5287">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5288">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5288">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ICMP on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_icmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance is
   enabled for ICMP services. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5293">nxd_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5293">nxd_icmp_ping</span></span>

## <a name="nxd_icmp_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5296">nxd_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5296">nxd_icmp_ping</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5297">Utföra ICMPv4-eller ICMPv6-ekobegäranmeddelanden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5297">Perform ICMPv4 or ICMPv6 Echo Requests</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5298">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5298">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    CHAR *data_ptr, 
    ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr, 
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5299">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5299">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5300">Den här tjänsten skickar ut ett ICMP Echo Request-paket via ett lämpligt fysiskt gränssnitt och väntar på ett eko svar från mål värden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5300">This service sends out an ICMP Echo Request packet through an appropriate physical interface and waits for an Echo Reply from the destination host.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5301">NetX Duo bestämmer lämpligt gränssnitt, baserat på mål adressen, för att skicka ping-meddelandet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5301">NetX Duo determines the appropriate interface, based on the destination address, to send the ping message .</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5302">Program använder tjänsten ***nxd_icmp_source_ping*** för att ange det fysiska gränssnittet och en exakt käll-IP-adress som ska användas för paket överföring.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5302">Applications shall use the service ***nxd_icmp_source_ping*** to specify the physical interface and precise source IP address to use for packet transmission.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5303">IP-instansen måste ha skapats och ICMPv4/ICMPv6-tjänsterna måste vara aktiverade (se ***nxd_icmp_enable***).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5303">The IP instance must have been created, and the ICMPv4/ICMPv6 services must be enabled (see ***nxd_icmp_enable***).</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5304">Om NX_SUCCESS returneras ansvarar programmet för att släppa det mottagna paketet när det inte längre behövs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5304">If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5305">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5305">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5306">**ip_ptr** Pekare till IP-instans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5306">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5307">**ip_address** Mål-IP-adress att pinga i värdens byte ordning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5307">**ip_address** Destination IP address to ping, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5308">**data_ptr** Pekare för att pinga paket data områden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5308">**data_ptr** Pointer to ping packet data area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5309">**data_size** Antal byte med ping-data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5309">**data_size** Number of bytes of ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5310">**response_ptr** Pekare till paket pekare för svar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5310">**response_ptr** Pointer to response packet Pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5311">**wait_option** Vänte tid för svar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5311">**wait_option** Time to wait for a reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5312">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5312">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5313">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5313">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5314">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0x00000001 till</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5314">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through</span></span> 
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5315">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5315">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5316">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5316">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5317">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades skicka och ta emot ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5317">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sent and received ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5318">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6 är inte aktiverat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5318">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5319">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) ping-data överskrider paketets nytto Last</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5319">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Ping data exceeds packet payload</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5320">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0X29) mål värden svarade inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5320">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Destination host did not respond</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5321">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av tx_thread_wait_abort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5321">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5329">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5329">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5330">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5330">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5331">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5331">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following two examples illustrate how to use this API to send
   ping packets to IPv6 or IPv4 destinations. */

/* The first example: Send a ping packet to an IPv6 host
   2001:1234:5678::1 */
   
/* Declare variable address to hold the destination address. */
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;

char *buffer = “abcd”;
UINT prefix_length = 10;

/* Set the IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 1;

status = nxd_icmp_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address, buffer,
                       strlen(buffer),&response_ptr,
                       NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply has been
   received from IP address 2001:1234:5678::1 and the response
   packet is contained in the packet pointed to by response_ptr.It
   should have the same “abcd” four bytes of data. */

/* The second example: Send a ping packet to an IPv4 host 1.2.3.4 */

/* Program the IPv4 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V4;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4[0]    = 0x01020304;

status = nxd_icmp_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address, buffer,
                       strlen(buffer),&response_ptr, 10);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply was received
   from IP address 1.2.3.4 and the response packet is contained in
   the packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same
   “abcd” four bytes of data. */
```

## <a name="nxd_icmp_source_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5339">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5339">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5340">Utföra ICMPv4-eller ICMPv6-ekobegäranmeddelanden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5340">Perform ICMPv4 or ICMPv6 Echo Requests</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5341">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5341">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_source_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT address_index,
    CHAR *data_ptr, 
    ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5342">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5343">Den här tjänsten skickar ut ett ICMP Echo Request-paket med det angivna indexet för en IPv4-eller IPv6-adress och via nätverks gränssnittet som käll adressen är kopplad till och väntar på ett eko svar från mål värden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5343">This service sends out an ICMP Echo Request packet using the specified index of an IPv4 or IPv6 address, and through the network interface the source address is associated with, and waits for an Echo Reply from the destination host.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5344">Den här tjänsten fungerar med både IPv4-och IPv6-adresser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5344">This service works with both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5345">Parametern *address_index* anger vilken käll-IPv4-eller IPv6-adress som ska användas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5345">The parameter *address_index* indicates the source IPv4 or IPv6 address to use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5346">För IPv4-adress är *address_index* samma index för det anslutna nätverks gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5346">For IPv4 address, the *address_index* is the same index to the attached network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5347">För IPv6 anger *address_index* posten i IPv6-adress tabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5347">For IPv6, the *address_index* indicates the entry in the IPv6 address table.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5348">IP-instansen måste ha skapats och tjänsten ICMPv4 och ICMPv6 måste vara aktive rad (se *nxd_icmp_enable*).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5348">The IP instance must have been created, and the ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 services must be enabled (see *nxd_icmp_enable*).</span></span>

> [!CAUTION] 
> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5349">*Om NX_SUCCESS returneras ansvarar programmet för att släppa det mottagna paketet när det inte längre behövs*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5349">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5377">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5377">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following two examples illustrate how to use this API to send ping
   packets to IPv6 or IPv4 destinations. */

/* The first example: Send a ping packet to an IPv6 host
   FE80::411:7B23:40dc:f181 */

/* Declare variable address to hold the destination address. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
#define GLOBAL_IPv6_ADDRESS 1

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
char *buffer = “abcd”;
UINT prefix_length = 10;

/* Set the IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0xFE800000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x00000000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0x04117B23;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 0x40DCF181;

status = nxd_icmp_source_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                              GLOBAL_IPv6_ADDRESS,
                              buffer,
                              strlen(buffer),
                              &response_ptr,
                              NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply has been received
   from IP address FE80::411:7B23:40dc:f181 and the response packet is
   contained in the packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the
   same “abcd” four bytes of data. */

/* The second example: Send a ping packet to an IPv4 host 1.2.3.4 */

/* Program the IPv4 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V4;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4       = 0x01020304;

status = nxd_icmp_source_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                              buffer,
                              strlen(buffer),
                              &response_ptr,
                              NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply was received from
   IP address 1.2.3.4 and the response packet is contained in the packet
   pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same “abcd” four bytes
   of data. */
```


- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5393">**ra_callback** Motringnings funktion som användaren har fått</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5393">**ra_callback** User-supplied callback function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5396">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6 är inte aktiverat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5396">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5397">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5397">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5398">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5398">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5403">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5403">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID icmpv6_ra_flag_callback(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT ra_flag)
{
   /* RA flag has changed. The updated value is passed in via the
      ra_flag parameter. */
}

/* Configure the user-defined ICMPv6 RA flag change callback
   function. */
status = nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set(&ip_0,
                                         icmpv6_ra_flag_callback);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates the callback function has
   been successfully configured. */
```
