## <a name="nxd_ip_raw_packet_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5411">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5411">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5412">Skicka RAW IP-paket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5412">Send Raw IP Packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5413">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5413">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ip_raw_packet_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *destination
    ULONG protocol, 
    UINT ttl, 
    ULONG tos);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5414">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5414">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5415">Den här tjänsten skickar ett RAW-IPv4-eller IPv6-paket (inga protokoll rubriker i transport skiktet).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5415">This service sends a raw IPv4 or IPv6 packet (no transport-layer protocol headers).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5416">Om systemet inte kan fastställa ett lämpligt gränssnitt i ett multihome-system (till exempel om mål-IP-adressen är IPv4 broadcast, multicast eller IPv6 multicast-adress) väljs den primära enheten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5416">On a multihome system, if the system is unable to determine an appropriate interface (for example, if the destination IP address is IPv4 broadcast, multicast or IPv6 multicast address), the primary device is selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5417">Tjänsten \***nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send** _ kan användas för att ange ett utgående gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5417">The service \***nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send** _ can be used to specify an outgoing interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5418">NetX-motsvarigheten är _ *_nx_ip_raw_packet_send_.*\*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5418">The NetX equivalent is _ *_nx_ip_raw_packet_send_.*\*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5419">IP-instansen måste ha skapats tidigare och RAW IP-paketfiltrering måste aktive ras med tjänsten ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5419">The IP instance must be previously created and raw IP packet handling must be enabled using the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5420">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5420">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5421">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5421">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5422">**packet_ptr** Pekare till paket att överföra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5422">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5423">**destination_ip** Pekare till mål adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5423">**destination_ip** Pointer to destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5424">**protokoll** Paket protokoll som lagras i IP-huvudet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5424">**protocol** Packet protocol stored to the IP header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5425">**TTL** Värde för TTL-eller hopp gräns</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5425">**ttl** Value for TTL or hop limit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5426">**TOS** Värde för TOS-eller trafik klass och flödes etikett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5426">**tos** Value for TOS or traffic class and flow label</span></span>

### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5427">Returvärde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5427">Return Value</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5428">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) RAW IP-paket har skickats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5428">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Raw IP packet successfully sent</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5429">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) Det går inte att hitta något lämpligt utgående gränssnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5429">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5430">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) obehandlad IP-hantering är inte aktiverat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5430">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP handling not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5431">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IPv4-eller IPv6-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5431">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5432">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (protokollnumret 0x02) inte tillräckligt med utrymme för IPv4-eller IPv6-sidhuvudet i paketet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5432">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for IPv4 or IPv6 header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5433">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) paket tilläggs pekare är ogiltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5433">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5434">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare eller paket pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5434">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer or packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5436">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0X4D) ogiltig IPv6-adress indata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5436">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5437">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5437">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5438">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5438">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5439">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5439">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5440">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5440">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5441">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5441">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS dest_address;

/* Set the destination address,in this case an IPv6 address. */
dest_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0x20011234;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x56780000;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 1;

UINT ttl, tos;

ttl = 128;

tos = 0;

/* Enable RAW IP handling on the previously created IP instance.*/
status = nx_raw_ip_packet_enable(&ip_0);

/* Allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr from the IP packet
   pool. */
/* Then transmit the packet to the destination address. */

status = nxd_ip_raw_packet_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr, dest_address,
                                NX_PROTOCOL_UDP, ttl, tos);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates the packet was
   successfully transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5451">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5451">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5452">Skicka RAW-paket med den angivna käll adressen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5452">Send raw packet using specified source address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5453">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5453">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *destination_ip,
    UINT address_index,
    ULONG protocol,
    UINT ttl,
    ULONG tos);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5454">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5454">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5455">Den här tjänsten skickar ett RAW-IPv4-eller IPv6-paket med den angivna IPv4-eller IPv6-adressen som käll adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5455">This service sends a raw IPv4 or IPv6 packet using the specified IPv4 or IPv6 address as source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5456">Den här tjänsten används vanligt vis på ett multihome-system, om systemet inte kan fastställa ett lämpligt gränssnitt (till exempel om mål-IP-adressen är IPv4-broadcast, multicast eller IPv6 multicast-adress).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5456">This service is typically used on a multihome system, if the system is unable to determine an appropriate interface (for example, if the destination IP address is IPv4 broadcast, multicast or IPv6 multicast address).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5457">Parametern *address_index* tillåter att programmet anger käll adressen som ska användas vid sändning av det här RAW-paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5457">The parameter *address_index* allows the application to specify the source address to use when sending this raw packet.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5458">IP-instansen måste ha skapats tidigare och RAW IP-paketfiltrering måste aktive ras med tjänsten ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5458">The IP instance must be previously created and raw IP packet handling must be enabled using the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5459">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5459">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5460">**ip_ptr** IP-instans pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5460">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5461">**packet_ptr** Pekare till paket att skicka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5461">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5462">**destination_ip** Mål-IP-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5462">**destination_ip** Destination IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5463">**address_index** Indexera IPv4-eller IPv6-adresser som ska användas som käll adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5463">**address_index** Index to the IPv4 or IPv6 addresses to use as source address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5464">**protokoll** Värde för fältet protokoll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5464">**protocol** Value for the protocol field</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5465">**TTL** Värde för TTL-eller hopp gräns</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5465">**ttl** Value for ttl or hop limit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5466">**TOS** Värde för TOS-eller trafik klass och flödes etikett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5466">**tos** Value for tos or traffic class and flow label</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5467">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5467">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5468">**NX_SUCCESSs** paketet (0x00) har skickats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5468">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet is sent successfully</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5469">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (protokollnumret 0x02) inte tillräckligt med utrymme för IPv4-eller IPv6-sidhuvudet i paketet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5469">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for IPv4 or IPv6 header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5470">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) paket tilläggs pekare är ogiltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5470">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5471">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare till IP Control Block, paket eller destination_ip</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5471">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP control block, packet, or destination_ip</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5472">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5472">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5473">RAW-bearbetning av **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) har inte Aktiver ATS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5473">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw processing not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) adress fel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Address error</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5475">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) ogiltigt gränssnitts index</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5475">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5476">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0X4D) ogiltig IPv6-adress indata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5476">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5477">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5477">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5478">Trådtoken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5478">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5479">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5479">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5480">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5480">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5481">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5481">Example</span></span>

```c
#define SOURCE_ADDRESS_INDEX 2

/* Send a raw packet from specified interface. */
status = nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr,
                                       dest_ip,
                                       SOURCE_ADDRESS_INDEX,
                                       NX_IP_RAW,
                                       NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE,
                                       NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, raw packet has been sent out on the
   specified interface. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5491">nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5491">nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5492">Ange avisering om ändring av IPv6-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5492">Set ipv6 address change notify</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5493">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5493">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*ip_address_change_notify)(NX_IP *, UINT, UINT, UINT, ULONG *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5494">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5494">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5495">Den här tjänsten registrerar en rutin för återanrop i program som NetX Duo anropar varje gång IPv6-adressen ändras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5495">This service registers an application callback routine that NetX Duo calls whenever the IPv6 Address is changed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5496">Den här tjänsten är tillgänglig om NetX Duo-biblioteket skapas är alternativet ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_ADDRESS_CHANGE_NOTIFY*** definierat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5496">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built is the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_ADDRESS_CHANGE_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5497">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5497">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5510">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5510">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID ip_address_change_notify(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT status,
                              UINT interface_index,
                              UINT address_index,
                              ULONG *ip_address)
{

   /* Do something when ip address changed. */
}

void ip_address_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

   /* Set the ip address change notify of IP instance. */
   status = nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify (&ip_0, ip_address_change_notify);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the ip address change notify of IP
   instance was successfully set. */
}
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5535">nxd_ipv6_address_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5535">nxd_ipv6_address_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5536">Ta bort IPv6-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5536">Delete IPv6 Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5537">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5537">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5538">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5539">Den här tjänsten tar bort IPv6-adressen i det angivna indexet i IPv6-adress tabellen för den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5539">This service deletes the IPv6 address at the specified index in the IPv6 address table of the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5540">Det finns ingen NetX-motsvarighet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5540">There is no NetX equivalent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5541">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5541">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5542">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5542">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5543">**address_index** IPv6-adress tabell för index till IP-instans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5543">**address_index** Index to IP instance IPv6 address table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5544">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5544">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5545">**NX_SUCCESSs** adress (0x00) har tagits bort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5545">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Address successfully deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5546">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5546">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5547">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) Det går inte att hitta något lämpligt utgående gränssnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5547">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5548">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5548">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5549">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5549">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;

/* Delete the IPv6 address at the specified address table index. */
address_index = 1;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_delete(&ip_0, address_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance
   address is successfully deleted. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5579">nxd_ipv6_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5579">nxd_ipv6_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5580">Hämta IPv6-adress och prefix</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5580">Retrieve IPv6 Address and Prefix</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5581">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5581">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT address_index, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG *prefix_length,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5582">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5582">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5583">Den här tjänsten hämtar IPv6-adressen och prefixet vid det angivna indexet i adress tabellen för den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5583">This service retrieves the IPv6 address and prefix at the specified index in the address table of the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5584">Indexet för det fysiska gränssnitt som IPv6-adressen är associerad med returneras i *interface_indexs* pekaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5584">The index of the physical interface the IPv6 address is associated with is returned in the *interface_index* pointer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5585">NetX motsvarande tjänster är \***nx_ip_address_get** _ och _ *_nx_ip_interface_address_get_* \*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5585">The NetX equivalent services are ***nx_ip_address_get** _ and _*_nx_ip_interface_address_get_\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5586">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5586">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5587">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5587">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5588">**address_index** Adress tabell för index till IP-instans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5588">**address_index** Index to IP instance address table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5589">**ip_address** Pekare till den adress som ska anges</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5589">**ip_address** Pointer to the address to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5590">**prefix_length** Längd på adressprefixet (nätmask)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5590">**prefix_length** Length of the address prefix (subnet mask)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5591">**interface_index** Pekar mot indexet för gränssnittet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5591">**interface_index** Pointer to the index of the interface</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5592">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5592">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5593">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) IPv6 har Aktiver ATS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5593">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5594">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5594">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5595">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0X50) ingen gränssnitts adress eller ogiltig address_index</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5595">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No interface address, or invalid address_index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5596">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5596">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5597">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5597">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5598">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5598">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5599">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5599">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5600">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5600">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5601">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5601">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5602">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5602">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;
ULONG       prefix_length;
UINT        interface_index;

/* Get the IPv6 address at the specified address table index. If
   found, the address network interface is returned in the
   interface_index input, as well as the address prefix in the
   prefix_length input. */

address_index = 1;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_get(&ip_0, address_index, &ip_address,
                              &prefix_length, &interface_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance
   address is successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5627">nxd_ipv6_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5627">nxd_ipv6_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5628">Ange IPv6-adress och prefix</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5628">Set IPv6 Address and Prefix</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5629">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5629">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT interface_index,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG prefix_length,
    UINT *address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5630">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5630">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5631">Den här tjänsten anger den angivna IPv6-adressen och prefixet till den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5631">This service sets the supplied IPv6 address and prefix to the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5632">Om argumentet *address_index* inte är null returneras indexet till IPv6-adress tabellen där adressen infogas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5632">If the *address_index* argument is not null, the index into the IPv6 address table where the address is inserted is returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5633">NetX motsvarande tjänster är \***nx_ip_address_set** _ och _ *_nx_ip_interface_address_set_* \*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5633">The NetX equivalent services are ***nx_ip_address_set** _ and _*_nx_ip_interface_address_set_\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5634">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5634">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5635">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5635">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5636">**interface_index** Indexera det gränssnitt som IPv6-adressen är associerad med</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5636">**interface_index** Index to the interface the IPv6 address is associated with</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5637">**ip_address** Pekare till den adress som ska anges</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5637">**ip_address** Pointer to the address to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5638">**prefix_length** Längd på adressprefixet (nätmask)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5638">**prefix_length** Length of the address prefix (subnet mask)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5639">**address_index** Pekar till indexet i adress tabellen där adressen infogas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5639">**address_index** Pointer to the index into the address table where the address is inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5640">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5640">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) IPv6 har Aktiver ATS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5642">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x15) IP-tabellen är full</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5642">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x15) IP address table is full</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5643">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5643">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5644">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0X52) den angivna IP-adressen används redan på den här IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5644">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) The supplied IP address is already used on this IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5645">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5645">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5646">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5646">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5647">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IPv6-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5647">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5648">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** -gränssnittet (0x4C) pekar på ett ogiltigt nätverks gränssnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5648">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface points to an invalid network interface</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5653">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5653">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;
UINT        interface_index;

ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* First create an IP instance with packet pool, source address, and
   driver.*/
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance 0",
                     IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                     0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0,_nx_ram_network_driver,
                     pointer, 2048, 1);

/* Then enable IPv6 on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_enable(&ip_0);

/* Set the IPv6 address (a global address as indicated by the 64 bit
   prefix) using the IPv6 address just created on the primary device
   (index zero). The index into the address table is returned in
   address_index. */
interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&ip_0, interface_index, &ip_address,
                              64,&address_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IPv6 address is
   successfully assigned to the primary interface (interface 0). */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5678">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5678">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5679">Lägg till en IPv6-router i tabellen Standard router</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5679">Add an IPv6 Router to Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5680">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5680">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_add(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address,
    ULONG router_lifetime,
    UINT index_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5681">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5681">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5682">Den här tjänsten lägger till en IPv6-standardrouter på det angivna fysiska gränssnittet i standardrouter-tabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5682">This service adds an IPv6 default router on the specified physical interface to the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5683">Motsvarande NetX IPv4-tjänst är ***nx_ip_gateway_address_set***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5683">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_ip_gateway_address_set***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5684">*router_address* måste peka på en giltig IPv6-adress och routern måste vara direkt tillgänglig från det angivna fysiska gränssnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5684">*router_address* must point to a valid IPv6 address, and the router must be directly accessible from the specified physical interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5685">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5685">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5686">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5686">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5687">**router_address** Pekare till standardrouter-adressen i värdens byte ordning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5687">**router_address** Pointer to the default router address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5688">**router_lifetime** Standard livs längd för router, i sekunder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5688">**router_lifetime** Default router life time, in seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5689">Giltiga värden är:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5689">Valid values are:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5690">**0xffff:** Ingen tids gräns</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5690">**0xFFFF:** No time out</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5691">**0 – 0xFFFE:** Timeout-värde, i sekunder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5691">**0-0xFFFE:** Timeout value, in seconds</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5692">**index_index** Pekar på den giltiga minnes platsen för index indexet som routern kan nås via</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5692">**index_index** Pointer to the valid memory location for the network index index through which the router can be reached</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5693">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5693">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5694">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) default-router har lagts till</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5694">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Default router is successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5695">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0X17) inga fler poster är tillgängliga i standardrouter-tabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5695">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more entries available in the default router table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5696">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IPv6-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5696">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5697">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5697">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5698">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0X4D) ogiltig IPv6-adress indata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5698">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5699">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-instans eller lagrings utrymme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5699">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5700">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5700">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5701">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) ogiltigt gränssnitts index för router</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5701">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid router interface index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5702">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5702">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5703">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5703">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5704">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5704">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5705">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5705">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5706">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5706">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example adds a default router for the primary interface at
   fe80::1219:B9FF:FE37:ac to the default router table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;

/* Set the router address version to IPv6 */
router_address.nxd_ip_version   = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;

/* Set the IPv6 address, in host byte order. */
router_address.nxd_ip_address[0] = 0xfe800000;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[1] = 0x0;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[2] = 0x1219B9FF;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[3] = 0xFE3700AC;

/* Set IPv6 default router. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_add(ip_ptr, &router_address,
                                     0xFFFF, PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* Unless invalid pointer input is detected by the error checking
   Service, status return is always NX_SUCCESS. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5718">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5718">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span></span>

```c

    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5721">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5721">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5729">**router_address** Pekare till IPv6-standardgateway</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5729">**router_address** Pointer to the IPv6 default gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5730">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5730">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5731">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) har tagits bort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5731">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Router successfully deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5732">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5732">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5733">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0X4E) Det går inte att hitta router-posten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5733">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) The router entry cannot be found</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5741">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5741">Example</span></span>

```c
/*This example removes a default router:fe80::1219:B9FF:FE37:ac */

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;

/* Set the router_address version to IPv6 */
router_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;

/* Program the IPv6 address, in host byte order. */
router_address.nxd_ip_address[0] = 0xfe800000;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[1] = 0x0;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[2] = 0x1219B9FF;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[3] = 0xFE3700AC;

/* Delete the IPv6 default router. */
nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete(ip_ptr, &router_address);
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5761">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5761">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5762">Hämta standard router post</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5762">Get default router entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5763">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5763">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT entry_index,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_addr,
    ULONG *router_lifetime,
    ULONG *prefix_length,
    ULONG *configuration_method);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5764">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5764">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5765">Den här tjänsten hämtar en router post från standard IPv6-routningstabellen som är kopplad till en angiven nätverks enhet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5765">This service retrieves a router entry from the default IPv6 routing table that is attached to a specified network device.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5766">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5766">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5767">**ip_ptr** Pekare för IP Control Block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5767">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5768">**interface_index** Index för nätverks gränssnittet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5768">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5769">**entry_index** Post index</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5769">**entry_index** Entry Index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5770">**router_addr** Routerns IPv6-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5770">**router_addr** Router IPv6 Address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5771">**router_lifetime** Pekare till routerns livs längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5771">**router_lifetime** Pointer to router life time</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5772">**prefix_length** Pekare till prefixlängd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5772">**prefix_length** Pointer to prefix length</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5773">**configuration_method** Pekar till information om hur posten har kon figurer ATS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5773">**configuration_method** Pointer to the information on how the entry was configured</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5774">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5774">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5775">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5775">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5776">Det gick inte att hitta 0x4E-routerns post **NX_NOT_FOUND**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5776">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Router entry not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5777">Gränssnitts indexet för **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5777">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5778">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare för IP Control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5778">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5779">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5779">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5780">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5780">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5781">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5781">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5782">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5782">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5783">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5783">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5784">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5784">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
NXD_ADDRESS            router_addr;
ULONG                  router_lifetime;
ULONG                  prefix_length;
ULONG                  configuration_method;

/* Get the router entry of specified interface. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get (&ip_0,
                                            PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                            entry_index,
                                            &router_addr,
                                            &router_lifetime,
                                            &prefix_length,
                                            &configuration_method);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the router entry was successfully
   got. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5796">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5796">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5797">Hämta en IPv6-router från tabellen Standard router</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5797">Retrieve an IPv6 Router from Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5798">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5798">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT interface_index
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address,
    ULONG *router_lifetime,
    ULONG *prefix_length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5799">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5799">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5800">Den här tjänsten hämtar en IPv6-routers adress, livs längd och prefixlängd för det angivna fysiska gränssnittet från tabellen standardrouter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5800">This service retrieves an IPv6 default router address, lifetime and prefix length on the specified physical interface from the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5801">Motsvarande NetX IPv4-tjänst är \*\**nx_ip_gateway_address_get *.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5801">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is \***nx_ip_gateway_address_get\*.**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5802">*router_address* måste peka på en giltig NXD_ADDRESS struktur, så den här tjänsten kan fylla i IPv6-adressen för standardroutern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5802">*router_address* must point to a valid NXD_ADDRESS structure, so this service can fill in the IPv6 address of the default router.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5803">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5804">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5804">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5805">**interface_index** Indexet till nätverks gränssnittet som routern kan nås via</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5805">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the router is accessible through</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5806">**router_address** Pekar på lagrings utrymmet för returvärdet för standardrouter-adressen i värdens byte ordning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5806">**router_address** Pointer to the storage space for the return value of the default router address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5807">**router_lifetime** Pekare till routerns livs längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5807">**router_lifetime** Pointer to the router lifetime</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5808">**prefix_length** Pekare till routerns adressprefix längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5808">**prefix_length** Pointer to the router address prefix length</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5809">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5809">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) default-router har lagts till</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Default router is successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5811">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5811">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5812">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0X4E) standard router hittades inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5812">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Default router not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5813">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5813">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5814">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) ogiltigt gränssnitts index för router</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5814">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid router interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5815">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-instans eller lagrings utrymme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5815">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5816">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5816">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5817">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5817">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5818">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5818">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5819">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5819">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5820">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5820">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example retrieves a default router for the primary device
   from the default router table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;
ULONG       router_lifetime;
ULONG       prefix_length;

/* Get IPv6 default router. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_get(ip_ptr, PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                     &router_address,
                                     &router_lifetime,
                                     &prefix_length);

/* If status returns NX_SUCCESS, the router address and related
   information is returned successfully. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5832">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5832">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5833">Hämta antal IPv6-routrar som är standard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5833">Get number of default IPv6 routers</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5834">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5834">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT *num_entries);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5835">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5835">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5836">Den här tjänsten hämtar antalet IPv6-standardroutrar som kon figurer ATS i ett angivet nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5836">This service retrieves the number of IPv6 default routers configured on a given network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5837">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5838">**ip_ptr** Pekare för IP Control Block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5838">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5839">**interface_index** Index för nätverks gränssnittet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5839">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5840">**num_entries** Mål för antal IPv6-routrar på en angiven nätverks enhet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5840">**num_entries** Destination for number of IPv6 routers on a specified network device</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5841">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5841">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5842">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5842">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5843">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5843">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5844">Värdet för enhets indexet **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5844">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index value is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5845">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare eller num_entries pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5845">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or num_entries pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5846">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5846">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5847">Trådtoken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5847">Thread</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5849">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5849">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5850">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5850">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
UINT                   num_entries;

/* Get the router entries of specified interface. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get(&ip_0,
                                                       PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                                       &num_entries);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the router entries was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5862">nxd_ipv6_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5862">nxd_ipv6_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5863">Inaktivera IPv6-funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5863">Disable the IPv6 feature</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5864">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5864">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5865">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5865">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5866">Den här tjänsten inaktiverar IPv6 för den angivna IP-instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5866">This service disables the IPv6 for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5867">Dessutom raderas tabellen standardrouter, ND cache och IPv6-adress, så att alla multicast-grupper blir kvar och återställer variabler för router-inbjudningar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5867">It also clears the default router table, ND cache and IPv6 address table, leaves the all multicast groups, and resets the router solicitation variables.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5868">Den här tjänsten har ingen inverkan om IPv6 inte är aktiverat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5868">This service has no effect if IPv6 is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5869">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5869">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5870">**ip_ptr** IP-instans pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5870">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5871">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5871">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5872">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) har inaktiverats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5872">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful disable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5873">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5873">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5874">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare för IP Control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5874">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5875">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0X4B) IPv6-modulen har inte kompilerats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5875">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) IPv6 module is not compiled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5876">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5876">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5877">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5877">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5878">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5878">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5879">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5879">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5880">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5881">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5881">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable IPv6 feature on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, disables IPv6 feature on IP instance.*/
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5906">nxd_ipv6_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5906">nxd_ipv6_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5907">Aktivera IPv6-tjänster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5907">Enable IPv6 Services</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5908">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5908">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5909">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5909">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5910">Den här tjänsten aktiverar IPv6-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5910">This service enables IPv6 services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5911">När IPv6-tjänsterna är aktiverade ansluter IP-instansen multicast-gruppen all-Node (FF02:: 1).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5911">When the IPv6 services are enabled, the IP instance joins the all-node multicast group (FF02::1).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5912">Den här tjänsten anger inte länkens lokala adress eller globala adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5912">This service does not set the link local address or global address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5913">Program bör använda *nxd_ipv6_address_set* för att konfigurera enhetens nätverks adresser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5913">Applications should use *nxd_ipv6_address_set* to configure the device network addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5914">Det finns ingen NetX-motsvarighet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5914">There is no NetX equivalent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5915">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5915">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5916">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5916">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5917">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5917">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5918">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) IPv6 har Aktiver ATS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5918">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5919">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) IPv6 har redan Aktiver ATS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5919">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) IPv6 is already enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5920">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5920">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5921">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5921">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5922">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5922">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5923">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5923">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5924">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5924">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5925">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5925">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5926">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5926">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5927">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5927">Example</span></span>

```c
/* First create an IP instance with packet pool, source address, and
   driver.*/
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance 0",
                      IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                      0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0,_nx_ram_network_driver,
                      pointer, 2048, 1);

/* Then enable IPv6 on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_enable(&ip_0);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance is
   enabled for IPv6 services. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5952">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5952">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5953">Anslut till en IPv6-multicast-grupp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5953">Join an IPv6 multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5954">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5954">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5955">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5955">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5956">Den här tjänsten gör det möjligt för ett program att ansluta till en specifik IPv6 multicast-adress i ett speciellt nätverks gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5956">This service allows an application to join a specific IPv6 multicast address on a specific network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5957">Länk driv rutinen meddelas om att lägga till multicast-adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5957">The link driver is notified to add the multicast address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5958">Den här tjänsten är tillgänglig om NetX Duo-biblioteket har skapats med alternativet ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** definierat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5958">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5959">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5959">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5960">**ip_ptr** IP-instans pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5960">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5961">**group_address** Multicast-adress för IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5961">**group_address** IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5962">**interface_index** Indexet till nätverks gränssnittet som är kopplat till multicast-gruppen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5962">**interface_index** The index to the network interface associated with the multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5963">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5963">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5964">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) aktiverar mottagning av IPv6 multicast-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5964">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully enables receiving on IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5965">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0X17) inga fler poster i IPv6-multicast-tabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5965">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more entries in the IPv6 multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5966">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) inga fler grupp adresser är tillgängliga i enhets driv rutinen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5966">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) No more group addresses available in the device driver</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5967">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen eller IPv6 multicast-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5967">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 multicast feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5968">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare för IP Control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5968">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5969">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5969">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5970">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig IPv6-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5970">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5971">Gränssnitts indexet för **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5971">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5972">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5972">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5973">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5973">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5974">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5974">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5975">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5975">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5976">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5976">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Join multicast group on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join(&ip_0,
                                           &group_address,
                                           PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, interface of index on IP instance
   has joined the multicast group. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5988">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5988">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5989">Lämna en IPv6-multicast-grupp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5989">Leave an IPv6 multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5990">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5990">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5991">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-5992">Den här tjänsten tar bort den angivna IPv6-multicast-adressen från den angivna nätverks enheten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5992">This service removes the specific IPv6 multicast address from the specific network device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5993">Länk driv rutinen meddelas även om borttagning av IPv6-multicast-adressen. Den här tjänsten är tillgänglig om NetX Duo-biblioteket har skapats med alternativet ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** definierat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5993">The link driver is also notified of the removal of the IPv6 multicast address.This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5994">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5994">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5995">**ip_ptr** IP-instans pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5995">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5996">**group_address** Multicast-adress för IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5996">**group_address** IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5997">**interface_index** Indexet till det nätverks gränssnitt som är associerat med gruppen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5997">**interface_index** The index to the network interface associated with group</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-5998">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5998">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-5999">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad multicast-ledighet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-5999">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6000">Det gick inte att hitta **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16)-posten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6000">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Entry not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6001">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen eller IPv6 multicast-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6001">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 multicast feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6002">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare för IP Control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6002">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6003">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6003">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

   has left the multicast group. */
