## <a name="nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6023">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6023">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6024">Inaktivera automatisk adress konfiguration för tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6024">Disable stateless address autoconfiguration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6025">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6025">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6026">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6026">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6027">Den här tjänsten inaktiverar funktionen för automatisk konfiguration av IPv6-adresser på en angiven nätverks enhet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6027">This service disables the IPv6 stateless address auto configuration feature on a specified network device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6028">Den har ingen påverkan om IPv6-adressen har kon figurer ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6028">It has no effect if the IPv6 address has been configured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6029">Den här tjänsten är tillgänglig om NetX Duo-biblioteket har skapats med alternativet ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** definierat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6029">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6030">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6030">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6031">**ip_ptr** IP-instans pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6031">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6032">**interface_index** Indexet till nätverks gränssnittet som den autonoma adress konfigurationen för IPv6 ska inaktive ras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6032">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the IPv6 stateless address autoconfiguration should be disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6033">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6033">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6034">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) inaktiverar funktionen för automatiskt konfigurering av tillstånds lösa adresser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6034">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully disables stateless address autoconfigure feature.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6035">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen eller den tillstånds lösa funktionen för Address AutoConfig-kontroll är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6035">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 stateless address autoconfig control feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6036">Gränssnitts indexet för **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6036">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6037">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare för IP Control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6037">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6038">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6038">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6039">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6040">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6040">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6041">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6041">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6042">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6042">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6043">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6043">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Disable stateless address auto configuration on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable(&ip_0,
                                                       PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, disables stateless address auto
   configuration on IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6068">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6068">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6069">Aktivera automatisk adress konfiguration för tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6069">Enable stateless address autoconfiguration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6070">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6070">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6071">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6072">Den här tjänsten aktiverar funktionen för automatisk konfiguration av IPv6-adresser på en angiven nätverks enhet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6072">This service enables the IPv6 stateless address auto configuration feature on a specified network device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6073">Den här tjänsten är tillgänglig om NetX Duo-biblioteket har skapats med alternativet ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** definierat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6073">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6074">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6074">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6075">**ip_ptr** IP-instans pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6075">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6076">**interface_index** Indexet till nätverks gränssnittet som den autonoma adress konfigurationen för IPv6 ska vara aktive rad för.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6076">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the IPv6 stateless address autoconfiguration should be enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6077">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6077">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6078">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) aktiverar tillstånds lös adress AutoConfig funktion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6078">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully enables stateless address autoconfig feature.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6079">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) har redan Aktiver ATS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6079">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) Already enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6080">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen eller den tillstånds lösa funktionen för Address AutoConfig-kontroll är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6080">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 stateless address autoconfig control feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6081">Gränssnitts indexet för **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6081">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig kontroll block pekare för IP Control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6083">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6083">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6084">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6084">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6088">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6088">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE

/* Enable stateless address auto configuration on this
   IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable(&ip_0,
                                                      PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6113">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6113">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6114">Ta bort IPv6-adress post i närliggande cache</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6114">Delete IPv6 Address entry in the Neighbor Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6115">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6115">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6116">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6117">Den här tjänsten tar bort en IPv6 Neighbor Discovery-cachepost för den angivna IP-adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6117">This service deletes an IPv6 neighbor discovery cache entry for the supplied IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6118">Motsvarande NetX IPv4-funktion är ***nx_arp_static_entry_delete***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6118">The equivalent NetX IPv4 function is ***nx_arp_static_entry_delete***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6119">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6120">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6121">**ip_address** Pekare till IPv6-adress att ta bort i värdens byte ordning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6121">**ip_address** Pointer to IPv6 address to delete, in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6122">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6122">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6123">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) tog bort adressen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6123">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully deleted the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6124">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** -adressen (0x16) hittades inte i IPv6 närliggande cache</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6124">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Address not found in the IPv6 neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6125">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6125">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6126">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-instans eller lagrings utrymme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6126">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6127">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6127">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6128">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6128">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6129">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6129">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6130">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6130">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6131">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6131">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6132">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6132">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example deletes an entry from the neighbor cache table. */

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Delete an entry in the neighbor cache table with the specified IPv6
   address and hardware address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete(&ip_0,
                                   &ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the entry was deleted from the neighbor cache
   table. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6149">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6149">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6150">Lägga till en IPv6-adress/MAC-mappning till närliggande cache</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6150">Add an IPv6 Address/MAC Mapping to Neighbor Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6151">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6151">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *dest_ip,
    UINT interface_index, 
    char *mac);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6152">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6152">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6153">Den här tjänsten lägger till en post till identifierings-cachen för grannar för den angivna IP-adressen *ip_address* mappas till Mac-adressen för den angivna nätverks gränssnitts indexet (interface_index).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6153">This service adds an entry to the neighbor discovery cache for the specified IP address *ip_address* mapped to the hardware MAC address on the specified network interface index (interface_index).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6154">Motsvarande NetX IPv4-tjänst är ***nx_arp_static_entry_create***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6154">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_static_entry_create***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6155">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6155">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6156">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6156">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6157">**DEST_IP** Pekare till IPv6-tjänstinstans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6157">**dest_ip** Pointer to IPv6 address instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6158">**interface_index** Index som anger ett fysiskt nätverks gränssnitt där mål-IPv6-adressen kan nås</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6158">**interface_index** Index specifying physical network interface where the destination IPv6 address can be reached</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6159">**Mac** Pekare till maskin varu adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6159">**mac** Pointer to hardware address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6160">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6160">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6161">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) har lagts till</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6161">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6162">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0X43) ogiltigt cacheminne eller inga poster för närliggande cache är tillgängliga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6162">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Invalid cache or no neighbor cache entries available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6163">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6163">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6164">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-instans eller lagrings utrymme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6164">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6166">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) ogiltigt värde för gränssnitts index.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6166">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index value.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6167">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6167">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6168">Initiering, trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6168">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6169">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6169">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6170">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6170">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6171">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6171">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example adds an entry on the primary network interface to
   the neighbor cache table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTEFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UCHAR hw_address[6] = {0x0, 0xcf,0x01,0x02, 0x03, 0x04};
CHAR  *mac;

mac = (CHAR *)&hw_address[0];

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Create an entry in the neighbor cache table with the specified
   IPv6 address and hardware address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_entry_set(&ip_0,
                                &ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0],
                                PRIMARY_INTERFACE, mac);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the entry was added to the neighbor
   cache table. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6188">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6188">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6189">Hitta maskin varu adress för en IPv6-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6189">Locate Hardware Address for an IPv6 Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6190">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6190">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6191">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6191">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6192">Den här tjänsten försöker hitta en fysisk maskin varu adress i IPv6 Neighbor Discovery-cachen som är associerad med den angivna IPv6-adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6192">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied IPv6 address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6193">Indexet för det nätverks gränssnitt som grannen kan nås till returneras också i parametern *interface_index.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6193">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned in the parameter *interface_index.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6194">Motsvarande NetX IPv4-tjänst är ***nx_arp_hardware_address_find***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6194">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_hardware_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6195">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6195">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6196">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6196">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6197">**ip_address** Pekare till IP-adress att hitta, värdens byte ordning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6197">**ip_address** Pointer to IP address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6198">**physical_msw** Pekar mot de översta 16 bitarna (47-32) av den fysiska adressen i byte ordning för värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6198">**physical_msw** Pointer to the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address, in host byte order</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6199">**physical_lsw** Pekare till de lägre 32 bitarna (31-0) av den fysiska adressen i värdens byte ordning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6199">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6200">**interface_index** Pekar på den giltiga minnes platsen för gränssnitts indexet och anger den nätverks enhet som IPv6-adressen kan nås på.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6200">**interface_index** Pointer to the valid memory location for the interface index specifying the network device on which the IPv6 address can be reached.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6201">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6201">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6202">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) hittade adressen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6202">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully found the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6203">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** -mappning (0x16) inte i närliggande cache</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6203">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping not in the neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6204">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6204">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6205">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0X4D) den angivna IP-adressen är inte version 6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6205">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) The supplied IP address is not version 6.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6206">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-instans eller lagrings utrymme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6206">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6207">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6207">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6208">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6208">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6209">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6209">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6210">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6210">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6211">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6211">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6212">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6212">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs an IP address on the primary network in order
   to obtain the hardware address it is mapped to in the neighbor
   cache able. */

NXD_ADDRESS  ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw, physical_lsw;
UINT  interface_index;

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Obtain the hardware address mapped to the supplied global IPv6
   address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                            &physical_msw,
                                            &physical_lsw
                                            &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the hardware address returned in
   variables physical_msw and physical_lsw, the index of the network
   interface through which the neighbor can be reached is stored in
   interface_index. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_invalidate"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6229">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6229">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6230">Ogiltig cachelagring av Neighbor Discovery-cache</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6230">Invalidate the Neighbor Discovery Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6231">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6231">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_invalidate(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6232">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6232">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6233">Den här tjänsten invaliderar hela cacheminnet för IPv6-grann identifiering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6233">This service invalidates the entire IPv6 neighbor discovery cache.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6234">Den här tjänsten kan anropas antingen före eller efter att ICMPv6 har Aktiver ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6234">This service can be invoked either before or after ICMPv6 has been enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6235">Den här tjänsten gäller inte för IPv4-anslutningar, så det finns ingen NetX motsvarande tjänst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6235">This service is not applicable to IPv4 connectivity, so there is no NetX equivalent service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6236">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6236">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6237">**ip_ptr** Pekare till IP-instans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6237">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6238">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6238">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) cachen har ogiltig förklarats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cache successfully invalidated</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6240">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6240">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6241">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-instans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6241">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6242">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6242">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6243">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6243">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6244">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6244">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6245">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6245">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6246">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6246">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6247">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6247">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example invalidates the host neighbor cache table. */

/* Invalidate the cache table bound to the IP instance. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_invalidate (&ip_0);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, all entries in the neighbor cache table
   are invalidated. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6265">Hämta IPv6-adress för en fysisk adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6265">Retrieve IPv6 Address for a Physical Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6266">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6266">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6267">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6268">Den här tjänsten försöker hitta en IPv6-adress i IPv6 Neighbor Discovery-cachen som är associerad med den angivna fysiska adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6268">This service attempts to find an IPv6 address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6269">Indexet för det nätverks gränssnitt som grannen kan nås till returneras också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6269">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6270">Motsvarande NetX IPv4-tjänst är ***nx_arp_ip_address_find***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6270">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_ip_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6271">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6271">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6272">**ip_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade IP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6272">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6273">**ip_address** Pekare till giltig NXD_ADDRESS-struktur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6273">**ip_address** Pointer to valid NXD_ADDRESS structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6274">**physical_msw** De 16 främsta bitarna (47-32) av den fysiska adressen som ska hittas, värdens byte ordning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6274">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6275">**physical_lsw** Lägre 32 bitar (31-0) av den fysiska adressen som ska hittas, värdens byte ordning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6275">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6276">**interface_index** Pekar mot nätverks enhetens index genom vilket IPv6-adressen kan nås</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6276">**interface_index** Pointer to the network device index through which the IPv6 address can be reached</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6277">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6277">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6278">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) hittade adressen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6278">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully found the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6279">Det gick inte att hitta den fysiska adressen för **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) i närliggande cache</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6279">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Physical address not found in the neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6280">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6-funktionen är inte inbyggd i netx Duo-biblioteket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6280">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig IP-instans eller lagrings utrymme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6283">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0X4D) Mac-adressen är noll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6283">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) MAC address is zero.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6284">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6284">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6285">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6285">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6286">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6286">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6287">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6287">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6288">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6288">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs a hardware address to search on for the
   matching IPv6 global address in the neighbor cache table. */

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw = 0xcf;
ULONG physical_lsw = 0x01020304;
UINT  interface_index;

/* Obtain the IPv6 address mapped to the supplied hardware
   Address on the primary device. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                      physical_msw, physical_lsw,
                                      &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the global IPv6 address returned in
   variable ip_address. */
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6306">Upprätta en TCP-anslutning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6306">Make a TCP Connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6307">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6307">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr
    NXD_ADDRESSS *server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6308">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6308">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6309">Den här tjänsten gör TCP-anslutning med en tidigare skapad TCP-klient-socket till den angivna serverns port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6309">This service makes TCP connection using a previously created TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6310">Den här tjänsten fungerar antingen i IPv4-eller IPv6-nätverk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6310">This service works on either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6311">Giltiga TCP server-portar är mellan 0 och 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6311">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6312">NetX Duo avgör lämpligt fysiskt gränssnitt baserat på serverns IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6312">NetX Duo determines the appropriate physical interface based on the server IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6313">NetX IPv4-motsvarigheten är ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6313">The NetX IPv4 equivalent is ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6314">Socketen måste vara kopplad till en lokal port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6314">The socket must have been bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6315">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6316">**socket_ptr** Pekare till tidigare skapade TCP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6316">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6317">**server_ip** Pekare till IPv4-eller IPv6-mål adress i byte ordning för värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6317">**server_ip** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 destination address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6318">**SERVER_PORT** Server port nummer att ansluta till (1 till 0xFFFF) i byte ordning för värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6318">**server_port** Server port number to connect to (1 through 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6319">**wait_option** Alternativet vänta medan anslutningen upprättas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6319">**wait_option** Wait option while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6320">Vänte alternativen definieras enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6320">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6323">**timeout-värde i Tick** (0X00000001 till 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6323">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6324">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6325">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad socketanslutning Connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6325">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1a) den begärda Avstängningen avbröts av ett anrop till tx_thread_wait_abort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig Server-IPv4-eller IPv6-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND** -socket (0x24) är inte kopplad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35)-socketen är inte i ett stängt tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0X37) ingen väntan angavs, anslutnings försöket pågår</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, connection attempt is in progress</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) ogiltigt gränssnitts index.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) nätverks gränssnittet har ingen giltig IPv6-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) The network interface does not have valid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP är inte aktiverat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0X46) ogiltig port</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** -anslutning (0x38) Miss lyckas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Connection fails.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6338">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6338">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6339">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6339">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6340">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6340">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6341">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6341">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6342">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6342">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS peer_ip_address;
ULONG       peer_port;

/* Set Peer IPv6 address */
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 0x101;

/* Set peer port number */
peer_port = 2563;

/* Connect to the peer */
status = nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(socket_ptr,
                                       &peer_ip_address,
                                       peer_port, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6367">Hämtar IP-adress och port nummer för peer TCP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6367">Retrieves Peer TCP Socket IP Address and Port Number</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6368">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6368">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get
    (NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *peer_ip_address,
    ULONG *peer_port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6369">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6369">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6370">Den här tjänsten hämtar information om peer-IP-adress och port för den anslutna TCP-socketen via antingen IPv4-eller IPv6-nätverket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6370">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6371">Motsvarande NetX IPv4-tjänst är ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6371">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6372">Observera att *socket_ptr* måste peka på en TCP-socket som redan är ansluten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6372">Note that *socket_ptr* must point to a TCP socket that is already in the connected state.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6373">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6373">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6374">**socket_ptr** Pekare till TCP-socket ansluten till peer-värd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6374">**socket_ptr** Pointer to TCP socket connected to peer host</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6375">**peer_ip_address** Pekar mot IPv4-eller IPv6-peer-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6375">**peer_ip_address** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 peer address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6376">Den returnerade IP-adressen är i värdens byte-ordning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6376">The returned IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6377">**peer_port** Pekare till peer port nummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6377">**peer_port** Pointer to peer port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6378">Det returnerade port numret är i värdens byte-ordning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6378">The returned port number is in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6379">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6379">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6380">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) socket-information har hämtats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6380">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Socket information successfully retrieved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** -socket (0x38) är inte ansluten till peer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket not connected to peer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP är inte aktiverat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltigt inmatade pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6385">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6385">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6386">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6386">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6387">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6387">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6388">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6388">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6389">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6389">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS  peer_ip_address;
ULONG        peer_port;

/* Get TCP socket information. */
status = nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(socket_ptr, &peer_ip_address,
                                      &peer_port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the service returns valid peer info: */
if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V4)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4 */

if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V6)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6 */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_packet_info_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6414">Extrahera nätverks parametrar från UDP-paket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6414">Extract network parameters from UDP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6415">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6415">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT *protocol,
    UINT *port,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6416">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6416">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6417">Den här tjänsten extraherar nätverks parametrar från ett paket som tas emot i antingen IPv4-eller IPv6 UDP-nätverk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6417">This service extracts network parameters from a packet received on either IPv4 or IPv6 UDP networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6418">NetX motsvarande tjänst är ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6418">The NetX equivalent service is ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6419">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6420">**packet_ptr** Pekar mot paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6420">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6421">**ip_address** Pekare till avsändar-IP-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6421">**ip_address** Pointer to sender IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6422">**protokoll** Pekare till protokoll som ska returneras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6422">**protocol** Pointer to protocol to be returned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6423">**port** Pekare till avsändarens port nummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6423">**port** Pointer to sender’s port number.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6424">**interface_index** Pekar mot indexet för det nätverks gränssnitt som paketet tas emot från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6424">**interface_index** Pointer to the index of the network interface from which this packet is received</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6425">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6425">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6426">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) paket gränssnitts data har extraherats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6426">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet interface data successfully extracted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6427">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** -paketet (0x12) är varken IPv4 eller IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6427">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is neither IPv4 or IPv6.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6428">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltigt inmatade pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6428">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6429">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6429">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6430">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6430">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6431">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6431">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6432">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6432">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6433">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6433">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6434">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6434">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract network data from UDP packet interface.*/
status = nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(packet_ptr, &ip_address,
                                    &protocol, &port,
                                    &interface_index);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet data was successfully retrieved.*/
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6458">Skicka ett UDP-datagram</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6458">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6459">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6459">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6460">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6461">Den här tjänsten skickar ett UDP-datagram via en tidigare skapad och kopplad UDP-socket för antingen IPv4-eller IPv6-nätverk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6461">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6462">NetX Duo hittar en lämplig lokal IP-adress som käll adress baserat på mål-IP-adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6462">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6463">Om du vill ange ett särskilt gränssnitt och en käll-IP-adress ska programmet använda tjänsten ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6463">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6464">Observera att den här tjänsten returnerar omedelbart oavsett om UDP-datagramet har skickats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6464">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6465">NetX (IPv4) motsvarande tjänst är ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6465">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6466">Socketen måste vara kopplad till en lokal port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6466">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6467">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6467">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6468">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade UDP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6468">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6469">**packet_ptr** Paket pekare för UDP-datagram</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6469">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6470">**ip_address** Pekare till mål-IPv4-eller IPv6-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6470">**ip_address** Pointer to destination IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6471">**port** Giltigt mål port nummer mellan 1 och 0Xffffffff) i värdens byte ordning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6471">**port** Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6472">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6472">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6473">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades UDP socket Send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6473">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig Server-IPv4-eller IPv6-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6475">**NX_NOT_BOUND** -sockel (0x24) är inte kopplad till någon port</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6475">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6476">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) Det går inte att hitta något lämpligt utgående gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6476">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6477">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (protokollnumret 0x02) inte tillräckligt med utrymme för UDP-huvudet i paketet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6477">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6478">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) paket tilläggs pekare är ogiltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6478">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket pekare, adress pekare eller paket pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer, address pointer, or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6481">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) UDP har inte Aktiver ATS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6481">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6482">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0X46) port numret är inte inom ett giltigt intervall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6482">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within a valid range</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6483">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6483">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6484">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6484">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6485">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6485">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6486">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6486">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6487">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6487">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the
   IPv6 address just created on the primary device (index 0). We
   don’t need the index into the address table, so the last argument
   is set to null. */

interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, interface_index,
                              &ip_address, 64, NX_NULL);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                             &server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_socket_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6510">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6510">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6511">Skicka ett UDP-datagram</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6511">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6512">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6512">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_socket_source_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port, 
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6513">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6514">Den här tjänsten skickar ett UDP-datagram via en tidigare skapad och kopplad UDP-socket för antingen IPv4-eller IPv6-nätverk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6514">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6515">Parametern *address_index* anger den käll-IP-adress som ska användas för det utgående paketet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6515">The parameter *address_index* specifies the source IP address to use for the outgoing packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6516">Observera att funktionen returnerar direkt oavsett om UDP-datagramet har skickats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6516">Note that the function returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6517">Socketen måste vara kopplad till en lokal port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6517">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6518">NetX (IPv4) motsvarande tjänst är ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6518">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6519">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6519">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6520">**socket_ptr** Pekare till den tidigare skapade UDP-instansen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6520">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6521">**packet_ptr** Paket pekare för UDP-datagram</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6521">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6522">**ip_address** Pekare till målets IPv4-eller IPv6-adress port nummer mellan 1 och 0Xffffffff) i värdens byte ordning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6522">**ip_address** Pointer to destination IPv4 or IPv6 address port Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6523">**address_index** Index som anger käll adressen som ska användas för paketet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6523">**address_index** Index specifying the source address to use for the packet</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6524">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6524">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6525">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades UDP socket Send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6525">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6526">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) ogiltig Server-IPv4-eller IPv6-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6526">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6527">**NX_NOT_BOUND** -sockel (0x24) är inte kopplad till någon port</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6527">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6528">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) Det går inte att hitta något lämpligt utgående gränssnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6528">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6529">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Det går inte att hitta något lämpligt gränssnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6529">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) No suitable interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6530">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltigt uttag, adress eller paket pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6530">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer, address, or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6531">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6531">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6532">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) UDP har inte Aktiver ATS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6532">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6533">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0X46) port numret är inte inom giltigt intervall.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6533">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within valid range.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6534">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) angivet nätverks gränssnitt är giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6534">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6535">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (protokollnumret 0x02) inte tillräckligt med utrymme för UDP-huvudet i paketet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6535">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6536">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) paket tilläggs pekare är ogiltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6536">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6537">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6537">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6538">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6538">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6539">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6539">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6540">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6540">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6541">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6541">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;
UINT address_index;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the IPv6
   address just created on the primary device (index 0). The address index
   is needed for nxd_udp_socket_source_send. */

status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, 0,
                              &ip_address, 64, &address_index);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_source_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                                    &server_address, 12, address_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted the
   packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_source_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6565">Hämta information om paket källa för UPD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6565">Retrieve UPD Packet Source Information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6566">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6566">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_source_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address, 
    UINT *port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6567">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6567">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6568">Den här tjänsten extraherar Källans IP-adress och port nummer från ett UDP-paket som tas emot via värdens UDP-socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6568">This service extracts the source IP address and port number from a UDP packet received through the host UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6569">NetX (IPv4) motsvarande är ***nx_udp_source_extract***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6569">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent is ***nx_udp_source_extract***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6570">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6570">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6571">**packet_ptr** Pekare till mottaget UDP-paket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6571">**packet_ptr** Pointer to received UDP packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6572">**ip_address** Pekare till NXD_ADDRESS struktur för att lagra paket Källans IP-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6572">**ip_address** Pointer to NXD_ADDRESS structure to store packet source IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6573">**port** Pekare till port nummer för UDP-socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6573">**port** Pointer to UDP socket port number</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6574">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6574">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6575">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) käll extrahering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6575">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful source extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6576">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** -paketet (0x12) är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6576">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6577">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig socket-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6577">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="170ea-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här tjänsten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6579">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6579">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6580">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6580">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6581">Avstängningen möjlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6581">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="170ea-6582">Inga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6582">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="170ea-6583">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="170ea-6583">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT         port;

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket and
   allocate the packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Extract the IP address and port of the packet received on the UDP
   socket specified in the packet interface. */
status = nxd_udp_source_extract(&packet_ptr, &ip_address, &port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the source IP address and port of the
   packet received on the UDP socket was successfully extracted. */
```
